29a1(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
29a2(mdo sde): shes so/ des bdag 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// 
29a3(mdo sde): de bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dgal zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid gti mug
29a4(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med
29a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can rnam sa dang / gang zag gzhan dag la nyon mos pa thams/ cang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des 'dod chags dang / 
29a6(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chang ngo // 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman par yang dag par rjes su mi
29a7(mdo sde): mthong 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
29a8(mdo sde): dpa' gnyis su med pa'i mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa/ de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de ni sdang gi dbyings/ chos kyi
29b1(mdo sde): dbyings gang yin pa de gti mug gi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du'o zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni gar/ 
29b2(mdo sde): yang 'gro ba'ang med/ mi 'gro ba'ang med do// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings shes pa des chos dbyings kyang shes so// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag
29b3(mdo sde): gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu
29b4(mdo sde): snang ba'o// gang rab tu snang ba de bla gab med pa'o// gang bla grab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do// grang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas
29b5(mdo sde): pa ni nam mkha'o// gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// 
29b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis snang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang
29b7(mdo sde): mi nyams pa'o// ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ba'o// shes rab las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos thams cad rgyu ba
29b8(mdo sde): med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing / sems gnyis la yang mi gnas pa'o// rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams
30a1(mdo sde): cang la yang mi chags pa'o// stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi g.yo ba'o// mi 'jigs pa las sangs
30a2(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig du yang mi gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par mi
30a3(mdo sde): rtog pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang / gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// 
30a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes
30a5(mdo sde): su yang 'gro ba'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / la/ phung po dang / khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes
30a6(mdo sde): bas/ dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad med de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas// 
30a7(mdo sde): ldang ba med pa'o// gang de lta bu'i rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas
30a8(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa ni/ gang spyod lam thams cad du/ sangs rgyas la mngon par ma chags par mi byed/ 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / smra ba/ 
30b1(mdo sde): dang mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do// de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed do// de dran pa yidi la mi byed pas/ 
30b2(mdo sde): gzugs dang / mtshan dang chos nyid dulang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/ gong la mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa
30b3(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos shes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa'o// de la
30b4(mdo sde): gang chos tsa la chags kyang rung / de dag la chos rjes su dran pag dang yang med do// chos shes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o// / de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pag
30b5(mdo sde): yang med do// chos shes bya ba ni nye bar ni bste/ gang sems ngang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos shes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ste/ 
30b6(mdo sde): gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus byas su rab tu bzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la
30b7(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// yang chos rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpas
30b8(mdo sde): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so// gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa
31a1(mdo sde): de ni chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
31a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o// de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do// chos gang
31a3(mdo sde): yang kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ 
31a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa skyed de/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so// gang na lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kun tu spyod pa
31a5(mdo sde): med pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o// de la 'dus byas shes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do// 'dus ma byas pa ni gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'dzem pa'o// 
31a6(mdo sde): tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rig kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i
31a7(mdo sde): gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong ba zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des chos gang yang btang ba med do// 'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i
31a8(mdo sde): chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni gtong ba'i mchog go// gang 'dzin pa de ni mi gtong ngo // gang mi gtong ba de ni mi snyems so// gang mi
31b1(mdo sde): snyems pa de ni dmigs par mi byed do// dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do// rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o// gang la sems kyi rnam par rig pa med/ 
31b2(mdo sde): pade ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gdong ba
31b3(mdo sde): de ni thams cad mkhyen par sngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu'ang sngo ste/ 
31b4(mdo sde): de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rjes su dran pa med do// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang dachos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di
31b5(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa de la yid la byed pa ci yang med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba
31b6(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag
31b7(mdo sde): pa med pa smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin
31b8(mdo sde): gyi gnas te/ sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma
32a1(mdo sde): yin no// mkhas pas rab tu bsngags ste/ gzugs snang ngam yin no// nyon mongs pa ni bste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// 8/ 
32a2(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims
32a3(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 
32a4(mdo sde): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis tho dgas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na 'a da khong pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpas gnas
32a5(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no// yang skyeb gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus/ 
32a6(mdo sde): rjes su dran te/ bcu gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ mi nyams pa'i mngon
32a7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag
32a8(mdo sde): pa'i nang na don dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa
32b1(mdo sde): shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
32b2(mdo sde): 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo'o
32b3(mdo sde): chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros pas ma
32b4(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas/ lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang dba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar
32b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnya ma pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang / spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni
32b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor
32b7(mdo sde): ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol/ 
32b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyi rlabs shes rab dang ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting / 
33a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la mi gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu bskyed pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing / ye shes gang gis mya ngan las/ 
33a2(mdo sde): 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang / sems can yongs su smin
33a3(mdo sde): par bya ba yang mi 'chad do// de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes kyi sgo gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan
33a4(mdo sde): las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sem sa dpa'i spyad pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
33a5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di ni sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go// gang yang sems can thams
33a6(mdo sde): cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ 
33a7(mdo sde): shes kyis mi rig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i gang
33a8(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid ngam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ thadad pa'i mtshan nyid ngam/ mi dra
33b1(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal pa mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid/ 
33b2(mdo sde): dam dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 
33b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ nye ba'i rgyu'i
33b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de
33b5(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod/ pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan
33b6(mdo sde): 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
33b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la bzung ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do// ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi
33b8(mdo sde): zad cing mtha' med pa bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi
34a1(mdo sde): nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas/ gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa/ 
34a2(mdo sde): dang / 'chad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba de thams cad ni de bzhin no// ma nor ba de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par
34a3(mdo sde): zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor pa de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na gzhan
34a4(mdo sde): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yi/ na pa'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
34a5(mdo sde): dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam sa mang du thos pa/ kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang // de dag
34a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du yang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so// yang don gcig du bstan te/ ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
34a7(mdo sde): kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing / don thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ 
34a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon
34b1(mdo sde): mchog rab tu sgrogs pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no// yang rigs kyi bu chos/ 
34b2(mdo sde): gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du/ byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon
34b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul
34b4(mdo sde): gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis pa rab nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs
34b5(mdo sde): brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i/ ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtsha nam med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa med pa'i
34b6(mdo sde): tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo
34b7(mdo sde): nyid du de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rten nas/ de 'dra bar chos dengs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi
34b8(mdo sde): nus so// de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can
35a1(mdo sde): gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dgal bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dril ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems
35a2(mdo sde): can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems dpa'
35a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas/ sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ srog tu lta bar ma
35a4(mdo sde): yin/ gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log ste// rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid
35a5(mdo sde): pa dang sred pa 'dus pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu/ rtog pa la sems can zhes brjod snyam mo// de la byang / chub sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon
35a6(mdo sde): mongs pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to// sems can med cong sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par
35a7(mdo sde): byed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor
35a8(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub ce na/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba la 'jug pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu
35b1(mdo sde): mngon par grub bo// sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
35b2(mdo sde): byed do tshul khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de yang
35b3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa dang nges pa ni lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang ngag dang
35b4(mdo sde): sems brgyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan dpa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan pa dar 'dod pa/ bzod pa'i gnas de yang thams cad mkhyen par
35b5(mdo sde): sngos nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ra byed do// brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
35b6(mdo sde): brtsams nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen par sngos nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
35b7(mdo sde): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dga' ba dang / cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun tu skong ste/ zhi
35b8(mdo sde): gnas kyi tshogs de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
36a1(mdo sde): chen po ni dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing / dmigs pa med pa'i thos pa de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
36a2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de/ dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bstsags de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis 'grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang
36a3(mdo sde): rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yod la byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can
36a4(mdo sde): thams cad la bdag med do// ji ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams cad stong ngo // ji ltar bdag ming du btag/ sa pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang ming
36a5(mdo sde): du btags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni
36a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems/ 
36a7(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par shes pa las mnyams shing / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/ de la rigs kyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa bskyed/ 
36a8(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas
36b1(mdo sde): lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de/ ye shes dang ldan shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms/ 
36b2(mdo sde): par zhugs shing / lus dben sems dben te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/ yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i
36b3(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo/ nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa/ sna ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsngags pa
36b4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs bstsags/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsrug/ sa pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs bsngags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon
36b5(mdo sde): pa brtson 'grus kyi ya la bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su 'thun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas
36b6(mdo sde): pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa skyed de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing / de mngon par shes/ 
36b7(mdo sde): pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong / sgra thams cad thos/ sems can thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu
36b8(mdo sde): 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des
37a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang
37a2(mdo sde): byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ 
37a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ 
37a4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang dgazugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis rig pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i
37a5(mdo sde): rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyi rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
37a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kun nas/ 
37a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i sgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o// de la rten cing
37a8(mdo sde): 'brel bar 'thung ba 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas
37b1(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags
37b2(mdo sde): pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smra
37b3(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'gag par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi bu
37b4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o// sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu/ 
37b5(mdo sde): 'jug ste/ de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya/ ste/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad/ kyis ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs/ 
37b6(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul lo// rang gi ye shes
37b7(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams sbyor ba shes so// gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad
37b8(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni kun tu btsal kyang mi dmigs so// gang mi dmigs pa de ni zab mo'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so// de ci'i phyir/ 
38a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag ste/ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad rnam par dag go/ de ci'i phyir rnam par dag
38a2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma skyes ma bskyed ma 'gags ma 'gags pa ste/ de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa
38a3(mdo sde): rab rib med pa/ don dam pa zab mo gang lo mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/ de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no// gang yul ma yin
38a4(mdo sde): zhing yul med pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir zab mo na/ das bya'o// de la sems dang yang 'dzin pa med de/ gas par dka' ba mthong ba dka' ba/ khong du chud par // 
38a5(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing / sems can gzhan la yang rab tu stonate/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo
38a6(mdo sde): la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// // bam po gsum pa// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang
38a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
38a8(mdo sde): sems te/ gang brten pa de ni ci yang ma yin pa/ gang rten pa de ni dngos po med pa/ gang rten pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa/ gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ 
38b1(mdo sde): bdag med pa/ zhi ba/ gang brten de la ni bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang rten pa de la ni yang dag par
38b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang brten pa de la ni ci yang med pa/ rtsol ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dben pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba na chos kho na skye
38b3(mdo sde): 'gag pa na chos kho na 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shad bu med ces bya'o// chos gang dag
38b4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med cing bdag dpo med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi
38b5(mdo sde): rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba na/ skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag/ pa na yang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du/ nang gi chos rnams skye ba na yang skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na
38b6(mdo sde): yang 'gog par byed pa med de/ gzhan du na yang rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi/ rkyen ma tshang na 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo // de la mthar
38b7(mdo sde): lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/ gang de mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa na chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs
38b8(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de
39a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin
39a2(mdo sde): nyid dbyer med pa de ni phyag rgya ste/ phye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyod pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis// 
39a3(mdo sde): bskyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phyag rgyas des btab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin
39a4(mdo sde): tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ shi ngan tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu
39a5(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya// shin tu na mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rgya mi/ snang ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de yang
39a6(mdo sde): spyan lnga la mi snang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ji snyed du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab bzhin du
39a7(mdo sde): tha snyad 'dogs so// de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do// gang dag rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par mi byed/ 
39a8(mdo sde): chos tha dad du mi byed do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do// de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang 'bring dang / rab kyi chos
39b1(mdo sde): rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dad du mi byed do// gang ji snyed mang por brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid/ 
39b2(mdo sde): dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na sems can thams cad ni na mkha' la rnam par rgyu yang na mkha'i khams ni 'dres par mi byed do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin/ 
39b3(mdo sde): nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do// gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do// 
39b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'achos kyi dbyings da kyi tshul la zhugs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya
39b5(mdo sde): ba ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so// yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings so// ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i/ 
39b6(mdo sde): dbyings so// 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so// rga ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i dbyings so// 'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyingaso// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi
39b7(mdo sde): dbyingaso bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag gi dbyingaso// don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so// gnas med pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so// 'dre ba med
39b8(mdo sde): ba'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyingaso// nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyingaso// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir na mkha'i dbyings so// gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i
40a1(mdo sde): dbyings te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul
40a2(mdo sde): la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa de thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos
40a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// zhe sdang gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i/ 
40a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
40a5(mdo sde): bzhin can no// nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// 'dod
40a6(mdo sde): pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis
40a7(mdo sde): su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
40a8(mdo sde): med pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs/ 
40b1(mdo sde): kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni
40b2(mdo sde): gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi bar gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
40b3(mdo sde): yid kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi
40b4(mdo sde): dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// phung po'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// sa'i khams
40b5(mdo sde): dang chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang chu dang / me dang / rlung ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
40b6(mdo sde): bzhin can/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos thams cad kyi bar dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyisu med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad
40b7(mdo sde): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rab tu
40b8(mdo sde): shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ 
41a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa rdo rje ltar sgra ning mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis na/ 
41a2(mdo sde): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi phyed pa dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba mi phyed pa dang / 
41a3(mdo sde): sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mi phyed pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po
41a4(mdo sde): me phyed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi phyed ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi phyed pa dang / 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba mi phyed pa dang / dge ba'i
41a5(mdo sde): rtsabs mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang
41a6(mdo sde): srog 'dor ba mi byed po dang / sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mi byed pa ste/ 
41a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i tshe/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu/ 
41a8(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni mi 'bigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yang / sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal ba dang / 
41b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang / bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las mi phyed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra ning mi phyed de/ 
41b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongasu dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs
41b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa/ yul med pa yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas/ rang gi yul yongasu sbyong ste// 
41b4(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yi na no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i
41b5(mdo sde): yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni mig gi yul gang yang med do// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring
41b6(mdo sde): ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang med do// sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang // 
41b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni sna'i yul gang yang med do// lce'i
41b8(mdo sde): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ 
42a1(mdo sde): lce'i yul gang yang med po/ lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang nyeba'am rang ba ma yin no// tso'i phyi den/ sangs rgyas/ 
42a2(mdo sde): kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang med do// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma
42a3(mdo sde): yin no/ nga ci'i phyir zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang med do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang
42a4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa la yang dedebazhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dben par
42a5(mdo sde): 'jug go/ rang gi zhing yongs su dag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben par
42a6(mdo sde): 'jug go// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ de yul thams cad la yang mi chags mi thogs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs
42a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongasu dag pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la
42a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongasu sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni gzungs yong su sbyang ba
42b1(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa dang / chos la mos pa dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / 
42b2(mdo sde): chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la ston cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su
42b3(mdo sde): tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston pa tsam du shes shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa
42b4(mdo sde): dang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cing zang zing med par chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang / 
42b5(mdo sde): tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir/ mang du thos pa mu med par/ byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par bcas
42b6(mdo sde): pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug mi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba
42b7(mdo sde): dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems
42b8(mdo sde): nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yongs su yi mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba las sems zhum pa med pa dang
43a1(mdo sde): sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba dang / chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par
43a2(mdo sde): bya ba la yongasu mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungasu sbyang ba byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed
43a3(mdo sde): ba dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa
43a4(mdo sde): med cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs dpal 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtog sa pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa/ 
43a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan pa she sa pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa nges par shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjesu 'jug pa shes pa dang / 
43a6(mdo sde): yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'gong ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / 
43a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang 'thun pa shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / 
43a8(mdo sde): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug
43b1(mdo sde): shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skrad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda' ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer med par shes pa dang / tshig 'bru ma
43b2(mdo sde): zad pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig
43b3(mdo sde): dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba
43b4(mdo sde): la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs shes bya'o// lus dang ngag dang sems dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa
43b5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang // / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sang sa rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di ni/ gzungs
43b6(mdo sde): kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par
43b7(mdo sde): spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyi rlabs pa yin zhe na/ 
43b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa
44a1(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par
44a2(mdo sde): rgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / tshig su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang rtogs pa brjod
44a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang / mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig btsun
44a4(mdo sde): zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa 'bras bu yod dpa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig
44a5(mdo sde): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi
44a6(mdo sde): spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin to// rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
44a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi spobs pa yino// de dag kyang yongasu sbyang ba bya ba nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag mi gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyuraro// tshur shog
44a8(mdo sde): ces bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags pa med pas spobs pa thogs par 'gyur ro// de la ma chags par gnas
44b1(mdo sde): pas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyuraro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro// 
44b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro// chung ma legs par brgyan te/ rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems las
44b3(mdo sde): mi nyams pas zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par kun tu bsrungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
44b4(mdo sde): bdun dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas/ tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs par gyur ro// sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / 
44b5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjodapa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs par 'gyuraro// sdug bsnga la ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi
44b6(mdo sde): thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gter mi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro// tshig bden pa dang / thab med pa dang / ngag rtsub po med pa
44b7(mdo sde): ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro// bla ma'i tshig khyad du mi gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi tshig mi gcog pas tshig btsun zhing gzungs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// 
44b8(mdo sde): rang gi yon+dan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bsten pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bdag la mi stong pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po yongasu gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi
45a1(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyur ro// chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// 
45a2(mdo sde): bstan chos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la mi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la
45a3(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyur ro// pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang 'khrul pa la mi rtog pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad
45a4(mdo sde): la sems snyoms pa dang sems can thams cad la mtshungs pa ru sbyor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshig su bcad pa thams cad/ 
45a5(mdo sde): don du mi gnyer bas/ 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rjed/ nga / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur/ ro// bka' blo bde ba dang / nges pa dang / ji skad smras pa de
45a6(mdo sde): bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par mi byed pas/ skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman// 
45a7(mdo sde): ba mi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir/ 
45a8(mdo sde): spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan la nan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan gyi
45b1(mdo sde): sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi
45b2(mdo sde): 'chang la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa
45b3(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta
45b4(mdo sde): ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul
45b5(mdo sde): khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba shes pa dang / she sa rab dang / thabs zung du 'brel pa dang / mngon par shes
45b6(mdo sde): pa nyams 'thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor rtog pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying
45b7(mdo sde): rje chen po la nges par sems pa dang / chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho med par 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos
45b8(mdo sde): la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o// 
46a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas// sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag
46a2(mdo sde): thams cad ni rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye
46a3(mdo sde): ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams
46a4(mdo sde): cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// ji
46a5(mdo sde): ltar thos pa'i tshul tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mong/ sa pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// rten cing 'bre/ la par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gis bdud las
46a6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'da'o// byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang
46a7(mdo sde): zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang / sems can tha dad par
46a8(mdo sde): sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 
46b1(mdo sde): de la chags shing ro myong ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu mi sngo ba bdud kyil/ 
46b2(mdo sde): dang / nyon mongs pa las smod pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byas pa rgyun
46b3(mdo sde): gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud
46b4(mdo sde): kyi las dang / zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi la sa dang / thabs dang bral bas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud
46b5(mdo sde): kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la/ mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslabs pa'i
46b6(mdo sde): rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la
46b7(mdo sde): rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la mod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal la gnas
46b8(mdo sde): shing mi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing brlang ba dang / sdig pa la mi smod pa dang / chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang
47a1(mdo sde): thos pa cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / chos ma yin pa don tu gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par
47a2(mdo sde): mi gnon pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dag pa'i chos 'dor
47a3(mdo sde): bde thams cad ni bdud kyi las so// chos bzhis na bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang / dad
47a4(mdo sde): pa dang / brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thab sa mkhas pa la gnas te/ sems can yongasu smin pa ra byed pa dang / chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te/ dam pa'i
47a5(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin pas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam la sa yang dag par 'das shing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams
47a6(mdo sde): cad bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems/ 
47a7(mdo sde): dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chags par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdegs pa/ 
47a8(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams ngag gis longs spyod mi zad pa yin/ bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/ mthon dman gyi yid med pas sems sa dang mtshungs pa yin/ 
47b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa 'byor pa yin/ mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum/ 
47b2(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no// ji lta phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'pho
47b3(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de
47b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsag
47b5(mdo sde): shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sang / sa rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems
47b6(mdo sde): can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ zag pa zad pa'i bya
47b7(mdo sde): bshes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su
47b8(mdo sde): sbyang bar bya ba char phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pas/ spyan lnga yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas/ mngon par shes pa thams cad
48a1(mdo sde): yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ngag chags yang dag par bcad pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu bskang ba char phyin pa yin// 
48a2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyangs par bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang skur ba thob pas
48a3(mdo sde): sa bcu yongs su sbyangs par bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyong bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang
48a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yA sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yi na no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya
48a5(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/ ri gas kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can
48a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod de/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba'am/ 
48a7(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba'am/ sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i
48a8(mdo sde): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yin no// 
48b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor rtog pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi
48b2(mdo sde): yol lo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos
48b3(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu thams cad zed pas bri ba'am/ gang ba med do// de bzhin du byang chub
48b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zed pas chos kyi dbyings dbri ba'am gang bar mi byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshon tshad med do// de bzhin du byang chub
48b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cang
48b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
48b7(mdo sde): dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// 'di ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
48b8(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'achags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhe na/ chags pa
49a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta kun nas ldang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad 'das pa yin no// 
49a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni na mkha'i dkyil la mi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa yang sems can thams cad la mi chags so// yang
49a3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sprad pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni dran pa'o// spyad pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o// de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob yang yin ste/ de
49a4(mdo sde): la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gong chos rnams la mi shes pa'o// snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs rab med pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob/ 
49a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag rang drung gi ye shes la mngon par
49a6(mdo sde): gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes bstan nga 'di la gzhan gyi dri nga la mi 'jog cing rang gis
49a7(mdo sde): ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig lta ba
49a8(mdo sde): kun las sems dben zhing / mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la/ mtshan ma ldang ba yongs su spangs nas su byang chub phyir bsngos de ni zang mi 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang nga
49b1(mdo sde): rgyal kun spangs nas/ de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed// mtha' yas blo ldan na mkha'i ngo bo nyid// kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs
49b2(mdo sde): rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te// nang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyu ba// de ni mthun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran// chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin
49b3(mdo sde): dben zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med// gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur pa// de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa yin// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/ 
49b4(mdo sde): stong nga mtshan med smon las rnam par grol// de la sems me nga dran dang 'jug pa med// de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin// phung po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong / 
49b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par 'dor// skyem sa pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag/ 'di ni gtong / ba legs par rjes su dran// tshul khrims zag pa med cing
49b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med// 'byung ba med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa// de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin// lha gang dag cing dri med nyon mongs med// 
49b7(mdo sde): dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur pa// sems can dag pa de dag 'dir dran zhing // bdag kyang myur du 'drar 'gyur snyam sems// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni// nyon
49b8(mdo sde): mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi byed// chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol// de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin// rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang gnyis pa// chos kyi
50a1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing // gang gis rdul med mtha' 'di rab shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag/ 
50a2(mdo sde): chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtog pa// de ni sems ngag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gdon phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed// sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing // 
50a3(mdo sde): de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med// lta ba nor pa rab tu spang bar ston// de 'dra de ni sems can mang po sbyong // 'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa// des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab
50a4(mdo sde): tu bstan/ sangs rgyas yul ni na mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni// brag cha 'dra ba de yis
50a5(mdo sde): rab mthong zhing // de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par/ de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs 'thob po// kun tu 'dzi na dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang // chos rnams bstan pa'i
50a6(mdo sde): rnam par rab bshad kyang // bdag dang sems can chos su rlom sems med// de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis gzungs pa 'dzin byed cing legs par gsungs pas
50a7(mdo sde): sems can tshim byed pa// dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur// gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/ chos ni rnam pa kun tu bsags med pas// chos la mi 'phro 'phros pa med pa
50a8(mdo sde): 'ang min// dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar// de ltar de yang chos kyi char 'bebs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chad mi 'gyur bar// 
50b1(mdo sde): mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chang// sems can dbang por sems can 'du shes med// sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du// rgyun mi 'chad par chos ni rab ston cing // bsam pa ji
50b2(mdo sde): bzhin sems can tshim par byed// spobs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// chos 'di thams cad na mkha' 'dra ba zhes// gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la// sems
50b3(mdo sde): can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin// sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med// su yi bzod 'di dri med 'od
50b4(mdo sde): gsal ba/ de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin// phung po/ yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong // chos dbyings ci 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes// dbang po drug ni grong stong 'dra
50b5(mdo sde): mthong ba/ de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'da'// sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams// bgayod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing // chos la mi rtog
50b6(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa// de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye med shes// 'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med// chos rnams 'ongs med song ba med shes
50b7(mdo sde): pa de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro// gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing // byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med// bdag dang sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug/ de ni
50b8(mdo sde): dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul lo// rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong // 'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min// 'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba// de ni sem
51a1(mdo sde): pa'i rdzib med pa yin// pha rol tshe rol gang la'ang mi chags la// chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing // sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med// mnyam pa
51a2(mdo sde): zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de// srid pa gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang // stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing // lam gyi rims kyis rtag tu sems can sbrel// de ni ded dpon bdud
51a3(mdo sde): rtsilam ston pa// 'dzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshun mi mkhas// chos rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren
51a4(mdo sde): ces bya// sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur// se mas ni sems la nams kyang 'tshams mi sbyor// 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems
51a5(mdo sde): dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla/ ltar// chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ce sa// nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa// sems can
51a6(mdo sde): dag pa de ni ma smad pa// gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun// sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang // gsog dang brdzun dang rtag pa med par shes// de ni byang chub snying por myur du
51a7(mdo sde): 'gro chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa
51a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzin rten gyi/ 
51b1(mdo sde): khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi las kya 'gyur to// lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang bkrol nas
51b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dong ba yin no// gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan
51b3(mdo sde): 'das rnams byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ chos 'di
51b4(mdo sde): lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong ba ru 'gyur ro zhes tshad du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas
51b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhus pa lung bstan pas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' mdzod mngon tu rangs par mdzad pas mu tog gi dra ba 'od dri ma med
51b6(mdo sde): cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
51b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ye shes ni chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// bstan pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing / dbang po
51b8(mdo sde): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to// 
52a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'di yang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la yang chos kyi
52a2(mdo sde): snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma
52a3(mdo sde): mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o// // bam po bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'khor de nyid du
52a4(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi dbu gang khyod kyi ming na mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ ci na mkha'
52a5(mdo sde): khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do// myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu na mkha'i mdzod kyi bye bag bdag cag
52a6(mdo sde): gis kyang blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis na mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems
52a7(mdo sde): dpa' na mkha'i mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos na mkha' las char dbab bo// de nas/ 
52a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'amyur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams cad rnam
52b1(mdo sde): par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma rma ni rgyang grags kyi chang/ mdab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po// 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab/ 
52b2(mdo sde): pa kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri bsnams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur pa de bdag
52b3(mdo sde): gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char phob shig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dang 'amyur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'
52b4(mdo sde): mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ na mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba 'i pad+ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ de na 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri tsher zhing mthong bas dga' ba'i zas
52b5(mdo sde): shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas
52b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi brlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs legs so legs so// sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig/ 
52b7(mdo sde): de na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod ces bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis na mkha'
52b8(mdo sde): las gser phye'i char phob shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod lan mkha' las gsar phye'i char mngon par phab po// de nas
53a1(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha mdzod la 'di skad smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis na mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char pong/ 
53a2(mdo sde): shig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag du/ de'i mod la phyogs bcu na ji tsam rin po che grangs med dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa kha dog tha dad pa yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/ 
53a3(mdo sde): gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen byi ru dang / zla
53a4(mdo sde): ba'i 'od dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling 'od dang / me 'od dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / an da rnyil dang / 
53a5(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung gnas dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang / mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig gi bzod pa dang / 
53a6(mdo sde): brgya byin thogs pa dang / rgyal ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can dang / 'jig rten snang byed dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin
53a7(mdo sde): dang / zla gam dang / 'dzam bu'i chu 'od dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang / me 'od dang / rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha bzhi byed dang / gdung ba med pa dang / 
53a8(mdo sde): nad sel dang / mig sbyong dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skyong dang / yan lag rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po
53b1(mdo sde): dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu bab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi
53b2(mdo sde): ming bskal par yang zad par slab ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu mi
53b3(mdo sde): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba zas dang skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su
53b4(mdo sde): zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi sgras yog pa/ mchil ma dang ngar snabs dang / khrag dang / rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i se mas can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir/ zas dang skom dang / gos kyi
53b5(mdo sde): char khyod kyis phog shig/ de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sem sa dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / myang ba dang bldag pa sna tshogs kyi
