53b6(mdo sde): char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang btung ba thams cad kyi char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo// gos kha dog du ma dang kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du
53b7(mdo sde): ma dang / pha zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i char rab tu bab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / yi dgas
53b8(mdo sde): thams cad kun tshim par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba
54a1(mdo sde): g.yog med pa/ nang du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du/ sman chen po'i char gang gis na bde dag thams cad nad las yongasu thar par 'gyur ba phob cig/ de
54a2(mdo sde): nas de ma thag du bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nad thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des// / 
54a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig/ de nas de ma thag du bar snang las 'od rab tu btang ste/ sems
54a4(mdo sde): can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / dgashin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/ 
54a5(mdo sde): ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di/ ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
54a6(mdo sde): dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / 
54a7(mdo sde): slas dang / rta dang bal glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / gzhon pa dang / khyim dang grong dang / grong khyer dang / grol rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 
54a8(mdo sde): bskyed mo'i tshal dang / yang tog dang / khang brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / khri dang khyogs dang / gling bzhi pa dang / gling bcu drug pa nas rta cang shwe
54b1(mdo sde): stong gis dra ba dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu bab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
54b2(mdo sde): tshogs chen po la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag long la byin cig/ yongasu gtong bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul
54b3(mdo sde): khrims kyi brgyan ces bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni phab na/ de yang tshul khrims kyi pha
54b4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i char phob shig/ des tshogs de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi
54b5(mdo sde): bsngags pa ji snyed rjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan rang bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo // de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
54b6(mdo sde): rab kyi yon+dan gyi sgra yang ji tsam phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad
54b7(mdo sde): mchad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo // chos kyi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// de na tshad med grangs
54b8(mdo sde): med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongasu smin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi
55a1(mdo sde): bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' shig na 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis/ 
55a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun tu rtogs pa sems kyis shes so// shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu dri
55a3(mdo sde): ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang bas
55a4(mdo sde): lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ de'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
55a5(mdo sde): 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa dang / chos kyi/ sgra thams cad grag pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang ma ched ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i/ 
55a6(mdo sde): bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung bar mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin gyis rlabs grub pa de ni
55a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lar yang gcig char sangs rgyas kyis zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
55a8(mdo sde): de na sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i
55b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis/ rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sems
55b2(mdo sde): can rnams byang chub sems skyes so// de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs mo lnga brgya byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'an mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub
55b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la yang khyo rtsol cig/ de nas de ma thag tu byang
55b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bud ma da de dag gi sngon gyi khyo'i kha dog dang mtshan ma dang dbying sa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgyan mkha' las babs
55b5(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'anamakha'i mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod/ ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi sa bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo dag
55b6(mdo sde): bdag bdag go khyo lta ba bzhin du khrid cig/ de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi khyim
55b7(mdo sde): du dong ngo / de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar smin par byas so// de nas yang bud
55b8(mdo sde): med lnga brgya po dag byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra/ chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma
56a1(mdo sde): 'tshal de byer khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la nges smin bgyis// chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste/ g.yo ba med/ 
56a2(mdo sde): cing byed med snga nas stong // zag med ye shes ngag gis rab rtogs te// slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad 'gron
56a3(mdo sde): du gnyer bar bgyi// sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab// 'dren mchog thub pas de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur
56a4(mdo sde): ba ni/ spyad pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag/ shin tu dul/ zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshe na mi/ lnga brgya gsad par chad de gsad du khri ba las// de dag gis
56a5(mdo sde): bar snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rna mas la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis// de la khyod
56a6(mdo sde): cag phyag 'tshol cig dang / gsad pa 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes smra zhig thos so// de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra skad gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'
56a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po na mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig skad ces smras so// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ skad cig de nyid la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs te der lhags nas
56a8(mdo sde): gshed ma mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag gsad de ci rung / nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la/ nged cag gi srog chod de mi dag khyad cig/ 
56b1(mdo sde): de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir/ gsad par chad pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gsad do// de nas mi gsad pa las gtang ba de dag gsad pas 'jigs
56b2(mdo sde): shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// byang
56b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la yang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag cag gi srog dang / dbyin pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag
56b4(mdo sde): cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas bdag la smon pa dang / gzhan la sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan/ dpa bdag cag la stsal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa'
56b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / 
56b6(mdo sde): gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod
56b7(mdo sde): kyis brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te// grogs po dag ras bcos bzung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin
56b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa
57a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod
57a2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad mi dengs pa'i nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon/ na mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam
57a3(mdo sde): du sems cin mkha' skam pa 'am zad pa yod dam/ dengs par 'gyur ram/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub de ni nam mkha'i
57a4(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam sa der bsngos pas de bas na mkha' la mdzod mi skam ngas mi zad mi dengs so// yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod
57a5(mdo sde): bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba ni/ kho bos byang chub tu sem sa bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do// smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon/ 
57a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pas mkhyen to// de nas gnas bstan shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod
57a7(mdo sde): kyis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams
57a8(mdo sde): myos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'din sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag mchis kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
57b1(mdo sde): pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur te/ 
57b2(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la de lta bar bgrang ba dang mtshan mar bzhag pas de snyed kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi/ 
57b3(mdo sde): ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang
57b4(mdo sde): med do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi thang nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi sa// dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin gshegs/ 
57b5(mdo sde): pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ ka' stsal pa/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi
57b6(mdo sde): zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten
57b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin tu byung ba/ rin po che'i
57b8(mdo sde): gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de dag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas
58a1(mdo sde): kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du gyur te/ byang chub sems
58a2(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba
58a3(mdo sde): zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub sum khri drug stong yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi
58a4(mdo sde): ming yang med do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshetshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub po// de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi
58a5(mdo sde): bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bya/ sa te/ nyin gcig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong snyed kyi rin po che'i phung po zad par gyur pa de lta bus bsnyen bkur
58a6(mdo sde): dang / rim gro byas so// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang 'khor rnams dang bcas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
58a7(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de
58a8(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
58b1(mdo sde): la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab
58b2(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pa 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam
58b3(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod 'di gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / sti stang byas te/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangaso// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub
58b4(mdo sde): kyi sems yongs su dag pas bsam pa yongs su sbyangs te/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba
58b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang
58b6(mdo sde): ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
58b7(mdo sde): dag pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs// 
58b8(mdo sde): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu/ 
59a1(mdo sde): phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas
59a2(mdo sde): thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / 
59a3(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag pas/ 
59a4(mdo sde): byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje che na po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du/ 
59a5(mdo sde): yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pad/ nga / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongasu dag pas/ skyes
59a6(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongasu spangaso// de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongasu dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar
59a7(mdo sde): du des gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas/ na mkha' mdzod 'di yongs su dag par/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so// 
59a8(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'dis na mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar na mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i
59b1(mdo sde): smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la yang zad pa med do// des na 'di na mkha'i mdzod ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa/ 
59b2(mdo sde): dang / lag na rin po che dang / na mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'
59b3(mdo sde): mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrag pa'i mdzod mnyan to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang / 
59b4(mdo sde): bcas par 'dug la/ nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad/ 
59b5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas na mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do// de na sa byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // nam
59b6(mdo sde): mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyi// thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin// de la 'jug par rab bstan gyis// khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis// na mkha' la ni mtho ba med// dam 'ba'ang
59b7(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin te// gang gis chos nyid mthon dman med// de la 'dud pa ga la yod// na mkha' la ni skye ba med// 'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// de la rnam
59b8(mdo sde): par 'jig pa med// na mkha' la ni 'bri ba med// gang ba dag kyang mi dmigs so// chos rnams gang med 'bri med de// na mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// na mkha' la ni mun pa med// 
60a1(mdo sde): de ni de yis ston mi slongs// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de bas nams kyang ston slongs med// nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis// na mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te/ 
60a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang // gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba med// mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' la ni ston mongs med// de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis// rgyal
60a3(mdo sde): ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs// bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis// nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med// rnyed dang sti stangs thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed// bstod pa dang ni smad pa la// 
60a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' yongs su mi rtog ste// de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo// sa dag g.yas par gyur kyang ni// nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba med// 'jig/ 
60a5(mdo sde): rten 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med// bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na/ ji ltar na mkha' mi 'tshig pa// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad
60a6(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' bstan mi gdung // skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med// ji ltar na mkha' gnas pa bzhin// chos rnams 'ong med 'gro ba'ang med// chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas
60a7(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// nam mkha' las ni thams cad 'byung // chos su snang ba ji snyed pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings la 'byung // mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa// nam mkha' ltar yod/ 
60a8(mdo sde): ma yin te/ de ltar sems rnams rab shes na// na mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// ming tsam pa ni na mkha' ste// de la kha dog dbyibs kyang med// sems dang yid dang rnam shes kyang / 
60b1(mdo sde): ming gis yongs su bstan pa'o// ji ltar na mkha' mtha' med cing // thams cad du yang gzung du med// de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang // na mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid mtshungs// sems can/ 
60b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' 'gro med kyi// de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med// sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang // de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma min// ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yis lus na mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra
60b3(mdo sde): ba de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs// khams bzhi dag kyang na mkha' dang // mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs// 'di ltar bsregs pa'i bskal pa la'ang
60b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di gsungs// ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis// nams kyang yongs su gang mi nus/ de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang // sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang
60b5(mdo sde): po 'tshig chen seng ge'i sgra dag gis// 'jig rten mgo/ na gyis gsungs pa ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes ra ba gang // de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms// ji ltar na mkha'
60b6(mdo sde): rgya che bas// mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang // mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas chos// gang
60b7(mdo sde): gis yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing // dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so// dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing // yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa// dngos
60b8(mdo sde): po dang ni dngos med par// lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to// stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags// sgral stong pa nyid med de// de ni sgra med brjod pa med// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas
61a1(mdo sde): kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du med// gang de stong zhes bya ba yang // de yi don ni brjod du med// sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang // mig yor dang ni brag/ 
61a2(mdo sde): cha rnams de la sogs pa bshad pa yis// 'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to// sems can rnams ni dra ba'i phyir// dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te// rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la// gnyen po
61a3(mdo sde): rnams ni mi dmigs so// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan// mtshan gzhi mtshan gzhi med pa dag/ chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs so// mtshan gzhi na mkha'i
61a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' 'ang mtshan nyid med pa yin// gang gis tshul 'dir ba rtogs pa// de dag byang chub sa mas dpa' yin// chags pa med cing bcings pa med// shin
61a5(mdo sde): tu cung zad med pa ste// spros med spros dang bral ba de// byang / chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can las ni de ma grol// sems can la yang mi gnas shing // sems can
61a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin ye shes kyis// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya// sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nas dngang bar mi byed de// gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo dag gi go cha 'di// sgyu ma byed
61a7(mdo sde): pa sems can dag/ mang du sprul nas der gsad kyang // de la gsad pa gang yang med// sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no// sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang / mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun
61a8(mdo sde): tu rang bzhin cig/ rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs// nam mkha' las ni nam mkha'i mdzod// mi zad pa'i mdzod grub ste// sems can thams cad mgu byed cing // mdzod de zad par mi 'gyur ro// 
61b1(mdo sde): tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste// chos rnams la'ang 'pho med par// chos rnams chos nyid blta bar bya// rgyu la brten te byung ba yi// chos rnams thams cad rab
61b2(mdo sde): shes na// de yi mdzod ni mi zad de// chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab// chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad par// 'jig rten mgon pos rab gsungs te// sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems// de bzhin sangs
61b3(mdo sde): rgyas chos rnams so// de ste de dag rdzas yin na// de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi// de dag med pas mi zad ces// de bas de ni mi zad gsungs// chos ni rab tu skad cig pa// zad pa chos ni mi zad do// 
61b4(mdo sde): mi zad de la zad pa med// de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya// byang chu ba sems dpa' gang zhig gis// chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na// des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'// byang chub nyid la yang
61b5(mdo sde): dgazhugs/ tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba na// bya nga chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong
61b6(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di
61b7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgra 'di ga la byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la dris shig
61b8(mdo sde): dang / 'di khyod la lan ldon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ltad mor
62a1(mdo sde): 'dzin par gyur to// na mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha'i sgra ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed
62a2(mdo sde): las brag cha'i sgra 'byung ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu brag cha la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs sam/ kha dog gam/ dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni med do// smras pa rigs
62a3(mdo sde): kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji ltar brag cha yongs su ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin du/ nam mkha' yongs su ma grub ste/ sgra dang skad go bar byed par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar
62a4(mdo sde): byed pa su gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par rigs pa bsam gyis mi khya bu ste/ kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsams pa de bar
62a5(mdo sde): snang 'di las byung yang / sems de der 'gro ba yang med/ de/ 'dir 'ong ba'ang med mod kyi sgra'i sgra brnyan yang 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa la
62a6(mdo sde): ltos/ gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang rgyu 'bras bu 'grub pa mi 'pho la/ rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa'i chos 'di
62a7(mdo sde): gnyi ga la yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do// gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par
62a8(mdo sde): byang ba zhes gsungs so// kun nas nyon mongs pa bstsal pas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs
62b1(mdo sde): pa dang rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyi ga yang brda'i tshig go// don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dmigs su med do// dom dam pa'i mtha' sa ba ni mtha' ma yin te/ gang 'di
62b2(mdo sde): mtha' ma yin pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha'o// gang bdag gi mtha' de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o// 
62b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni de'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha'/ nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni/ chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes
62b4(mdo sde): rnyed do// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ltad mo can zhes ming sus btags/ smras pa/ btsun pa
62b5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang / brtson pa dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
62b6(mdo sde): kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du ltung mo dang ldan te/ de'i phyir kho bos ltad mo can zhes bya'o// 
62b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ de'i phyir kho bo la ltad mo can zhes bya'o// 
62b8(mdo sde): gang la kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/ 'jug pa de gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang du kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud
63a1(mdo sde): kyilas thams cad kyigapas med de'i phyingan la ba ltang ma can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas bdun gari bus 'dzi ga ces gsal / 
63a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi chags te/ chags pa ma mchis par
63a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston ngo mtshar to// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpa' zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'
63a4(mdo sde): mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ti dang nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa la brtsams te/ gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis shig
63a5(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' ma 'od kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la' de skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
63a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying por thogs pa med par 'gro ba bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med
63a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de dag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems yongs su
63a8(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na rnyog pa med par 'gyur ro// mngon
63b1(mdo sde): par 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'khyil pa zhes
63b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yas phyogs kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyu dang lta ba las rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// dga' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge
63b3(mdo sde): 'dzin ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rjes su song zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sbyin gnas yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
63b4(mdo sde): sems mi 'dzum par 'gyur ro// mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro// byed pa la 'jug pa zhes
63b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ las rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa ra 'gyur ro// seng ge'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jigs pa spu zing zhes byed pa med par 'gyur ro// sems
63b6(mdo sde): dpa' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro// pad+ma bkod pa zhes
63b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rjes su chags
63b8(mdo sde): ba dang khong khro ba spang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyur ro// skar 'da' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na
64a1(mdo sde): bag chags thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i
64a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 
64a3(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje'i lus mi phyed par 'gyur ro// snying po dang
64a4(mdo sde): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam bcas pa thams cadanyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa las mi nyams par/ 
64a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang / chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu ni sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur
64a6(mdo sde): ro/ spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chags pa dang zhe sdang med par
64a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs thams
64a8(mdo sde): cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtse gcig tu 'gyur ro// rnam pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad yongs su dag par
64b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi 'khor la
64b2(mdo sde): yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// klog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// legs par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
64b3(mdo sde): 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i
64b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ra 'gyur ro// ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pas sems can thams cad kyi
64b5(mdo sde): sems mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi rgyun ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin las nyams par 'gyur ro// brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 
64b6(mdo sde): mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can tha dad par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod
64b7(mdo sde): pa'i go bgos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa'i rnam pa
64b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya/ 
65a1(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin na sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// lhun po'i smon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcung rnam par lta bar 'gyur/ 
65a2(mdo sde): shes rab kyi skar mda' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las dang bya
65a3(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lta ba thams cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi dmigs pa
65a4(mdo sde): dang lha thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// smon pa med
65a5(mdo sde): pab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang sems pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// 
65a6(mdo sde): sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dran pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya
65a7(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa'i snod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro// mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// rin chen bkod pa zhes
65a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lag na rin po che rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting
65b1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro// blo gros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mos
65b2(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting
65b3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gtong ba
65b4(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phung po thams cad rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhe/ sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la
65b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro// lha rjesu dran pa zhes bya ba'i/ ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i chos la kha na ma tho ba med/ par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
65b6(mdo sde): 'dzin ni chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya
65b7(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rgyud chags pa dang rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yi ge thams cad dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la
65b8(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan bI/ 
66a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad cu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de/ 
66a2(mdo sde): re re la yang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de dag thams cad bsdoms na ting nge 'dzin bzhi khrir 'gyur te/ de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bas ting nge 'dzin brgyad
66a3(mdo sde): khrir 'gyur ro// de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i ye shes kyis ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa chos kyi sgo mo yang de snyed chos/ 
66a4(mdo sde): kyi phung po yang de snyed de de'i phyir sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri ba zhi stong la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ba zhi stong de bzhin gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o// rigs
66a5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sem sa can rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi mdo'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dag dang / sems can gyi
66a6(mdo sde): spyod pa mtha' dag la 'jug pa de ni tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bskal pa brgya stong gi mthar 'dug kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di yongs su bstan cing ting nge
66a7(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu
66a8(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam
66b1(mdo sde): pa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di bstan pa ni legs par smras te/ lus mngon sum pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
66b2(mdo sde): yongs su brjod pa 'di shin tu yongs su bstan pa ni legs so legs so// / bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
66b3(mdo sde): rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis thog mar na mkha' 'di las rin po che
66b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi char rab tu phab/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
66b5(mdo sde): kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
66b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
66b7(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ ska rigs shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yon tan gyi 'od ces bya ba'i
66b8(mdo sde): bskal pa la 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu ska rags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang 'byor pa/ bde ba lo legs pa rgyas pa skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ rin po che sna
67a1(mdo sde): bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing gnyen pa/ gos ka tsa lin 'di ka ltar reg na bdeb/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsal bsnga
67a2(mdo sde): tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs
67a3(mdo sde): spyod dang / kun spyod pa ltar 'dug go// mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur cing bsams pas zas dang skem rab tu 'byor to// de yang rigs
67a4(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od ze dar gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'byung ngo // 
67a5(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba/ 'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhig byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu rgyal
67a6(mdo sde): po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de'i khang pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su brtsigs par gyur te/ shar phyogs su yang dpag tshad bzhi/ nub phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / byang phyogasu
67a7(mdo sde): yang dpag tshad bzhi bzhi bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ bskyed mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i
67a8(mdo sde): btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go/ khye'u brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang tshan chen po'i stobs dang / drag shul 'chang ba sha stag/ 
67b1(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brdzun pa la btsun mo rin po che gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi gzi brjid/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi 'ong ngo // rgyal po bsod nams/ 
67b2(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ btsun mo'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ lha mo de gnyis kyi ngang pa nas khye'u gnyis byung ste/ rdzus te skyes pa sngon gyi sbyor
67b3(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa/ smon lam rdzogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge zhes bya/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge'i rtsal gyis
67b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ de gnyis byung ma thag tu sgra skad dbyangs pa/ cig tu/ pha bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngon byas dge dang mi dge chud mi za/ 
67b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas chud mi za// bsams pa bya/ chub sems kyang chud mi za// bsgrub pa gcor byed thos pa chud mi za// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chud mi za// bzod dang des
67b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang chud mi za// byas pa gzo zhing dge ba'i las bya'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang tshud mi za// rtse gcig bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar sems// nges par rtog dang shes rab sems mi nyams// 
67b7(mdo sde): ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te// mi 'khrugs chos las byang chub rnyed mi dka'// de ni nyon mongs pa yis mi gos te// da ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas shing // de ni pad+ma'i snying por rdzus te
67b8(mdo sde): skyemi gos pa ni pad+ma chu las ltar// shar phyogs logs kyi rgyal ba sman pa'i rgyal// dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa yis// bde gshegs dri med 'od kyi gan nas su// chos 'dod// 
68a1(mdo sde): phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'ongs// u dum pa ra'i me tog ji lta bar// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dkas// de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta slad du/ 
68a2(mdo sde): bde gshegs thang du yab kyang bzhud par bgyi// rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa 'di thos nas// bu dang btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu// srog chags bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te// rgyal ba
68a3(mdo sde): de'i gan du nye bar dong // me tog dri zhom byug par bcas pa yis// de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas nas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal rab tu bskor byas te// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas spyan ngar 'dug
68a4(mdo sde): seng ge dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro yang // de bzhin gshegs/ dpa'i zhabs la bzung nas su// gtugs nas chos dang / dadon ldan mkhas pa yis// 'phags pa des ni tshigs bcad
68a5(mdo sde): 'di dag smras// khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gnyen te/ 'jig rten ldongs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur// sems ca na rnams kyi bsam spyod gyur la mkhas// ji ltar mos pa de bzhin
68a6(mdo sde): gnas par mdzad// rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas myong // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang bcas pas bcings// nam yang ston pa la ni mchod phyir yang // nye bar mi 'chi chos lta ga la nyan// mgon pos
68a7(mdo sde): thugs rje rab tu bskyed mdzod la// ji ltar de kun lhan cig thos nas su// theg pa mchog las ldog par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub lam mchog de ni legs par ston// bcom ldan mgon po ta la brgyad
68a8(mdo sde): nu srid// namakhar 'phags bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs// nga'i chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon la// thos nas de la tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// 'dod pa mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog/ srog ni
68b1(mdo sde): rtsa yi zil pa'i thogs pa 'dra// rtse ba de bzhin 'dod pa de rmi lam 'dra// mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dga' ba bskyed// sems can gang yang 'dod pas ngoms med de// phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pas
68b2(mdo sde): skom zhing rgyug/ byis pa ngoms mi shes shing yul la gnas// shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin tu ngoms// sgyu ma slu zhing snying po med pa ltar// de bzhin phung po lnga yang sgyu ma 'dra// khams
68b3(mdo sde): rnams 'di dag sbrul gdug bzhin du bstan// dbang po drug ni stong pa'i grong dang 'dra// bu dang chung ma rgyal srid yul 'khor yang // 'chi bar gnas pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba med// sbyin dul
68b4(mdo sde): kun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni// de dag pha rol 'gro ba'i grogs yin no// nga'i gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzogs// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci 'dra rab ltos la// gal te 'di
68b5(mdo sde): 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sem/ sa skyed cig/ rgyal po bal glang des ni chos thos nas/ srog chags bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dang // sras dang btsun mo
68b6(mdo sde): stobs bcas grong mi rnams// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems bskyed de// bdag cag mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer bar gyi// byang chub spyod mchog
68b7(mdo sde): yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur par bgyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des// bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong
68b8(mdo sde): gi bar du rung ba yid du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad dang / yongs su longs spyod pa thams cad kyis rim gro byas so// khye'u seng ge dang seng ge'i sbrul gyis 'gro ba de gnyis// bcom ldan
69a1(mdo sde): 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri yang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas seng ge dang seng
69a2(mdo sde): ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / dben par spyod pa la sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par/ mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// de dag
69a3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa rnyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis kyis sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su
69a4(mdo sde): smin par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis
69a5(mdo sde): brgyan pa de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po gal ba/ der song ba dang / des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // 
69a6(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya sa na/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas ngas ma byas pa ci zhig byas snyam
69a7(mdo sde): du brnyas pa'i sems skyes so// rigs kyi bu de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems pa mkhyen nas/ 
69a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab dang mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyis stobs ston la 'khor
69b1(mdo sde): thams cad dga' bar gyis shig/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog pos gyis shig/ byang chub kyi lam 'bar bar gyis shig/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig/ phas kyi rgol ba
69b2(mdo sde): thams cad tshar chod cig/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar gyis shig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa ston cig/ de nas de'i byang chub sems
69b3(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas de'i dus na/ nam mkha' la lag pas byugs nas/ de'i nam mkha' lag pas byugs pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu
69b4(mdo sde): g.yos so// de yang na mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas de'i che bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya/ da stong ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo // des yang na mkha' la lag
69b5(mdo sde): pas byugs pa dang / de nas bar snang las sngon ma mthong ma thos pa dri zhim zhing 'jam ba ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i me tog rnams kyi char bab bo// des yang na mkha' la lag
69b6(mdo sde): pas byugs pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu mngon par bab/ longs spyod kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab bo// ji lta bur stong gsum gyi stong
69b7(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yo byad thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang skom dang bro'i char mngon par rab tu bab bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i
69b8(mdo sde): 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyi brgyan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang ba dang / rin po che'i char 'bab pa 'di
70a1(mdo sde): gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i char 'di ni dper bgyi ba yang sla ba ma lags te/ de tsam du tshang ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang
70a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dod na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char mngon par 'bebs
70a3(mdo sde): so/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngoms shing tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang sa bla'i lha rnams kyis ma
70a4(mdo sde): la 'di sems bskyed ma thag tu/ nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa las na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni na mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba
70a5(mdo sde): snyam zhes sgra byung ngo // ji ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra byung / ba de bzhin du/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris/ dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / 
70a6(mdo sde): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang / ma la 'di sems bskyed ma thag 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char rab tu 'bab pa las na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa'
70a7(mdo sde): 'di ni nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra byung bas/ ming de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po de rjes su yid rang ngo // gang la des
70a8(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba de gang gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal
70b1(mdo sde): gyis 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs de mthong nas/ khye'u rgyal ba'i blo gros shes bya ba rgyal por bcug te/ dad pas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ 
70b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa 'di ni sems kun tu chags pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sems yongs su dag pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang ngag gi bgegs so// rab tu byung ba'i ni lus dang ngag yongs su sbyong ba'o// 
70b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa 'di ni bgegs chen po'o// rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni rtsa dang lo ma'o// rab tu byung ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o// sbyin pa
70b4(mdo sde): ni nga'i ba dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba wa ma bskyed pa'o// 
70b5(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba ni lta ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa' di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo'i sbyor ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes pa'i sa'o snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin
70b6(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor zhing / sems de lta bu dang bsam pa de lta bus de ltar rab tu byung ste/ gcig pu mi 'dre ba/ bag yod pa/ brtson pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par
70b7(mdo sde): shes pa lnga bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan par gyur de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
70b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'di ni/ de'i
71a1(mdo sde): che de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ des thog mar na mkha'i mdzod las rin po che'i char phab bo// de tshun chad
71a2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med par nam yang na mkha' mdzod las rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i mngon par shes pa las ma nyams so// rigs kyi bu nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus
71a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge zhes bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan
71a4(mdo sde): pas rgyal por bcug pa'o// rigs kyi bu de'i gsungs rab kyang 'di ltar dga' zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnas su gyur to// 
71a5(mdo sde): sems can ji snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur
71a6(mdo sde): to sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
71a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang lags// de skad ces gsol pa
71a8(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin
71b1(mdo sde): pa drug dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
71b2(mdo sde): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// 'jig rten zhes bya ba
71b3(mdo sde): ni phung po lnga'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtags par rig nas/ sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs sdug bsngal bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs bdag med par rig/ gzugs
71b4(mdo sde): zhi bar rig/ gzugs stong par rig/ gzugs mtshan ma med par rig/ gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ gzugs ma skyes par rig/ gzugs ma
71b5(mdo sde): byung bar rig/ gzugs rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rig/ gzugs dben par rig/ gzugs gzung ba med par ri// ga/ gzugs kun gzhi med par rig/ gzugs 'byung ba/ 
71b6(mdo sde): med par rig/ gzugs sgyu ma lta bur rig/ gzugs rmi lam lta bur rig/ gzugs rmig rgyu lta bur rig/ gzugs chu zla lta bur rig/ gzugs brag cha lta bur rig/ gzugs mig yor
71b7(mdo sde): lta bur rig/ gzugs gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam lta bur rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la
71b8(mdo sde): 'jug go// sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid
72a1(mdo sde): dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams
72a2(mdo sde): cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
72a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa
72a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med par rig/ rnam par shes pa/ zhi bar rig/ rnam par shes pa stong par rig/ rnam par/ shes pa mtshan ma med par rig/ rnam par shes pa smon pa
72a5(mdo sde): med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma skyes par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar
72a6(mdo sde): rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa dben par rig/ rnam par shes pa bzung ba med par rig/ rnam par shes pa kun bzhi med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mi 'byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa sku
72a7(mdo sde): ma lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rmi lam lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa brag cha lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa mig yor lta
72a8(mdo sde): bur rig rnam par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ sbyin pa sbyin te/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ sbyin
72b1(mdo sde): nga'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de
72b2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
72b3(mdo sde): nyid de ni de bzhin nyid do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las
72b4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims srung ba nas/ gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / 
72b5(mdo sde): lam dang gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung ngo // de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// tshul/ khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// tshul khrims kyi de
72b6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyis de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de
72b7(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de
72b8(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// 
73a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims srung ba nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan
73a2(mdo sde): nyid kyi bar du rig nas/ tshul khrims srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid
73a3(mdo sde): dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de
73a4(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams ca da kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor pa de bzhin
73a5(mdo sde): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes/ su shes pas/ tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ byang / chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// 
73a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ bzod pa sgom pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjes su shes pa 'di lta bus brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan
73a7(mdo sde): mnyam par 'jog go// shes rab rnam par dpyod do// des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta/ 
73a8(mdo sde): bu'i bar du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo
73b1(mdo sde): ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de
73b2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
73b3(mdo sde): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ shes rab rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du
73b4(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab rnam dpar dpyod pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med
73b5(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid
73b6(mdo sde): kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag
73b7(mdo sde): gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rje su sheso// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin/ 
73b8(mdo sde): pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas
74a1(mdo sde): gzugs mi rtag par rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa nas/ gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yod lta bu'i/ 
74a2(mdo sde): bar du rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes
74a3(mdo sde): nas/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// 
74a4(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom ste/ lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byung
74a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// / bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ rgya cher de bzhin
74a6(mdo sde): du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams kyang rgyas par byas te/ gzugs mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa
74a7(mdo sde): nas/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
74a8(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar
74b1(mdo sde): rig nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de ltar phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid
74b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do// sems can gyi de
74b3(mdo sde): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor
74b4(mdo sde): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhi dra/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam
74b5(mdo sde): par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog ste/ gang de ltar rje su shes pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar dran pa nye bar
74b6(mdo sde): gzhag pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
74b7(mdo sde): po dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga yang de bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ des gzugs mi rtag par rig
74b8(mdo sde): nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed de/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / gzugs bdag med pa dang / gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med pa dang / 
75a1(mdo sde): gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang / gzung ba
75a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / 
75a3(mdo sde): gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon pa sgrub bo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
75a4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ mngon par shes pa nga'i ye shes mngon par sgrub ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug pa sngal bar rig/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa dang / rnam par
75a5(mdo sde): shes pa zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / mtshan ma/ med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ 
75a6(mdo sde): dang / dben pa dang / gzung du med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs
75a7(mdo sde): brnyan lta bu dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa der ngon par shes
75a8(mdo sde): nga'i de bzhin nyid do// mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ 
75b1(mdo sde): pade sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de
75b2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rab tu sgrub ste/ 
75b3(mdo sde): gang de ltar rjes su shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa
75b4(mdo sde): ste/ gzugs 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
75b5(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
75b6(mdo sde): ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// gang phung po'i 'jig rten las rgal ba de ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i 'jig rten la yang mi chags te/ de mi chags pas 'gro ba lngar skyes
75b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig rten 'jig par mi byed pa de ltar chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de 'jig
75b8(mdo sde): par mi byed do// 'jig rten ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid/ smon pa med pa'i/ 
76a1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bar du ste/ 'jig rten de 'jig par mi byed pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub
76a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa'o// gang lam yongs su dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lam log pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos
76a3(mdo sde): kyi snang ba chen po byed do// de dag snang ba rnyed nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de nyid la rab tu gnas so// byang chub kyi snying po 'thob par byed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni rab kyi mchog go// mi dge ba
76a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mchog go// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo rnyed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni dam pa'o// chu bo thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir/ lam 'di
76a5(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa'o// nyi tshe ba'i lam thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gong na med pa'o// gnyen po mi mi gas pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'o// sngon
76a6(mdo sde): gyi sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par 'gro ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni bde bar 'gro ba'o// mngon par shes
76a7(mdo sde): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi thogs par 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyis snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mun pa mun nag med pa'o// 
76a8(mdo sde): sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni drang po'o// sems gya gyu med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gsal ba'o// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam pa'o// sems/ 
76b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la go byed pa'i bying / lam 'don tu che ba'o// pan chun du gnod par mi 'gyur bas/ lam 'dini yangs pa'o// yongs su ma skyo bar 'gro bas lam 'di ni rnal du 'gro ba'o// sbyin
76b2(mdo sde): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni bsod nams kyis brtan pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni gdung ba med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni 'jigs pa med
76b3(mdo sde): pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni mi zlogs pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di/ 
76b4(mdo sde): ni na mkha' dang mnyam par 'gro ba'o// nga rgyal med pas lam 'di ni ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas lam 'di ni sangs
76b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu sgom pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// sngon thos pa mi slu ba'i phyir lam 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo/ sa rab tu skor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni
76b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongasu dag pa ste/ lam yong su dag pa gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dang 'go cha chen po bgos te/ theg pa chen po de
76b7(mdo sde): la zhugs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der 'gro ba'o// de la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha ste/ gru chen po yang dag par sbyor bas ma rgal ba sgrol ba'i go cha'o// nyon mongs pa dang / 
76b8(mdo sde): lta ba'i bcings pa thams cad las yongs su 'grol bas ma grol ba 'grol ba'i mchoga'o// yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'dor bas dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin pa'i go
77a1(mdo sde): cha'o// med pa la phyin ci log tu gyur pa mnyam pa nyid du ston pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mya ngan las zla ba'i go cha'o// bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / 
77a2(mdo sde): gang zag mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i go cha'o// lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i go cha'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sogs pas
77a3(mdo sde): ngoms mi myong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha'o// sbyin pa'i tshogs sna tshogs sogs pas/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po lus kyi rgyan gyi go cha'o// mngon par shes pa
77a4(mdo sde): thob pas bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba'i go cha'o// so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ sems can thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa'i go cha'o// gzungs
77a5(mdo sde): kyi ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang chol ba rigo cha'o// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams ca kyi sems la lta ba'i go cha'o// shes rab kyi ye shes kyis
77a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i go cha'o// shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs yang dag par sgrub pas stobs bcu yongs su skong ba'i go cha'o// thams cad du
77a7(mdo sde): sems gong ba med pas mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i go cha'o// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
77a8(mdo sde): yongs su skong ba'i go cha'o// chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / chu zla lta bur thos kyang / mi skrag mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de ni byang chub
77b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skrag pa'i go cha'o// sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang sems can yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
77b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i go cha'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar thos kyang tshe dang
77b3(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dang skye ba kun tu ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha'o// chos thams cad nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes shing / 'du byed thams
77b4(mdo sde): cad skye ba med par rig kyang 'gog par mi ltung zhing 'bras bu ma / na sum du'ang mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs mi 'khrugs pa'i go cha'o// go cha
77b5(mdo sde): chen po nyi shu po de dag bgos nas/ de theg pa chen po la mngon bar zhugs pa yin no// theg pa chen po de ni bsdu ba'i dngos pos pang lo bzhi dang legs par ldan par byas pa/ bsam
77b6(mdo sde): pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas rtsibs shin tu sbyar ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye shes lhag par che bas lte ba zab cing legs par byas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi khur bskye ba'i
77b7(mdo sde): srog shing dang zhing shin tu bzung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pas shing rta'i mda' brtan par sbyar pa/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pas rin
77b8(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi kha ran gyis bskor ba/ sngon dam bcas pa kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i 'breng bas bcings pa/ thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pas gnya'
78a1(mdo sde): shing gi khur khyer ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bu gar legs par sbyar ba/ bden pa bzhi yongs su shes pa'i stobs kyi 'gros can/ cang shes stong rab tu 'bad
78a2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba/ dran pa'i ru dag rin po che'i 'breng ba'i slad bus bcings pa/ sems can thams cad shong bas rgya che zhing yangs
78a3(mdo sde): par rgyu ba dang / ngagra dang bdud kyi dgra 'dul ba/ legs par bya ba byas pa/ rigs pa dang ye shes rab tu sbyor ba/ byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
78a4(mdo sde): cad kyis dgongs pa/ seng ge'i khri shin tu brgyan pa/ lha dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis mngon par bstod/ pa/ gzugs bzang zhing blta bas mi ngoms pa// blta na
78a5(mdo sde): sdug pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan bas dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba/ kha lo sgyur bas shin tu bsdus shing bzung ba/ rtag tu byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro/ 
78a6(mdo sde): ba smon lam gyi yon tan yongasu rdzogs pa'i rjes su song bas gar dga' dgur 'gro ba/ phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i lha'i mig gi snang ba thob pa/ phyogs bcu snang bar byed pa'i phyir/ 'od yangs pa rnam
