227b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'din byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid skyeng ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni le lo can rnams kyi brtson 'grus bskyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin
227b3(mdo sde): brjed nges pa rnams kyi bsam gtan bskyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams la snang bar byed pa'o// tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
227b4(mdo sde): thams cad shin tu legs par gnas so// de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags pa bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa
227b5(mdo sde): drug tu g.yos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bu la leg so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
227b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'dis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ tshangs pa lha'i bu 'dis sangs
227b7(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te tshangs pa lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i rtog 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du
227b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang yang de'i bar du sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag thams cad la yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bskur stir byed
228a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang thos par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / 
228a2(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma dang / lA dang / klu dang / gan sbyin dang / dr-i ba gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dal bzang par ba tu zab pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa che gang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni
228a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag ni byang chub mi 'tshal/ 
228a4(mdo sde): mi smon mngon par mi dga' mngon par ma chags/ mi dmig sa/ mi sems/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i sgra dad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan/ bcom ldan
228a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lha'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu la la zhig gis rtswa dang shing dang yal ga dang / lo ma dang mdab/ ma dag mer bcug nas 'di skad du rtswa dang shing dang yal ga dang lo ma dang / 
228a6(mdo sde): mngab ma dag ma tshig shig ces smras na/ de de'i dbang gis mi 'tshig pa ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi/ 
228a7(mdo sde): dmigs/ mi 'dod mi smon mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog kyang sangs rgyas thams cad lung ston te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags mi
228a8(mdo sde): dmigs/ mi 'dod mi smon/ mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lung ston to// de nas 'khar der lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
228b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'tshal/ ma sman ma rtog/ rnam par mi rtag na/ ci'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
228b2(mdo sde): bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de/ 
228b3(mdo sde): dag gis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ 
228b4(mdo sde): pa 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon mi sems mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de byang
228b5(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis steng gi phyogs na/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu
228b6(mdo sde): mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bdag cig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
228b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs
228b8(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa dag gi rna lam du gda' bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang / de dag la
229a1(mdo sde): bdu ngas/ bdud byings kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang yongs su brdung dang gi cha chen po bkon te/ blan med pa yang dga'
229a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi nyams par byin gyis brlab par gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang byon gyis brlab pa dang / yun ring du gnas par bya
229a3(mdo sde): phyir lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad kyis nyon cig/ 
229a4(mdo sde): rig pa dang ni sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs dkyi bu ma ches smra ba de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zad dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen/ 
229a5(mdo sde): bdang grul bus rnams kyis yongs su bsrung b.rab tu 'thob ste/ hA gas kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma de dag la ma'am/ lam lag pa rangam/ gtsug lag khang dusong ngam/ gnas yang dus ngam/ 'cha/ 
229a6(mdo sde): ngal zhugs sam/ 'khor gyi nang du song yang rung ste/ srung bar byed do// spobs pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te/ de la pha rol gyi rgol ba 'am/ pas kyi dgra glags
229a7(mdo sde): chol bdag gi glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de dran zhing shes bzhin du ldang bar 'gyur/ 'chags par 'gyur// 'jug par 'gyur/ nyas par 'gyur// 'jam dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
229a8(mdo sde): ud+hu d+hu d+hA re/ man+da da Te/ tsang Te/ ge tsa re shi la mi/ hi ma~M mi li/ dza mi thi mi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ e bang Te/ be ta re/ kha kha re/ tha re/ kha ra ke/ A san ne/ gti ma hi le/ mAn sha ta ne mA na se bar gan d+he/ sarba pu
229b1(mdo sde): dwangag te/ san du len mo bud+he d+d+ha/ tsA d+he/ na me d+ha d+hA ya/ ni drA ni/ nam sa g+ha la/ pra ti ta pe/ byub shAn tan/ sarba pA pan ma dzA mAM/ sarba b+hu b+h+ya/ sa tun rje ga brah+ma badz+re/ mthanga' / brags// 
229b2(mdo sde): tra tiSh+Than te sarba b+hu ta gra ta/ na ma sarba bud+d+he b+h+ya/ sid d+han tu me man tra pa dA swA hA/ 'jam dpal rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson pa/ rtag tu shes bzhin
229b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mi rked pa/ khengs pa med pa sems mi g.yengs pa/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba/ sogs pa dang bral ba chog shes pa/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ba/ 'du 'dzi nyung ba/ lus dang / 
229b4(mdo sde): sems dben pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje la mngon par dga' / chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i chog la rab tu ga/ nus pa/ mi slu ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba
229b5(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / ye/ byad bsnyung ba la mngon par dga' ba/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sems
229b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ 'khor bas 'jig shing skrag pa/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sems mnyam pa/ 'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba/ lus dang srog 'dor ba dngos po thams cad la mi
229b7(mdo sde): blta ba/ spyod pa dang cho ga phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba/ bzod pa dang nges pa mang ba/ ngan du zer ba bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ sems can/ 
229b8(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la brtson pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa khro gnyer dang bral ba/ gsong por smra ba/ nga rgyal bcom pa/ des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
230a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mos 'jam dpal sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na/ chos smra bde che 'di nyid la stobs bskyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 
230a2(mdo sde): mi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / mdo sde'i tshul khong du chud pas rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / sdom pa dang spyod pa
230a3(mdo sde): mi gtong bas dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas thos pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / thos pa thams cad yongs
230a4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi sa brlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa drang / mngon pa shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab mo'i stobs bskyed
230a5(mdo sde): ba dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa/ sa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos smra ba gang rig pa dang / sngags kyi chog
230a6(mdo sde): 'di rab tu 'don pa de ni stobs bskyed pa de bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi skrag cing ba spu langs par gyur te/ g.yog brgya stong/ 
230a7(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
230a8(mdo sde): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par bgyid pa ste/ gnyen pa shes dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo chos sna ba dang / 
230b1(mdo sde): chos ston pa gang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang / klog pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de dag grong ngam grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam
230b2(mdo sde): ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas kyang rung / khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi stobs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
230b3(mdo sde): dedag gi rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o// bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spro ba dang / spobs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi rtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag spro'o// bcom ldan
230b4(mdo sde): 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyad par 'gyur ba ris phyogs der dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu lha 'am// klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ grul bum gyis glags mi snyed do// de nas rgyal po
230b5(mdo sde): chen po 'phags skyes pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la bu dang / gnyen bshes dang / bran dang 'khor rnams tsam chis pa// de dang bdag cag 'grogs bcas pas// bdag po de dag rim
230b6(mdo sde): / gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// chos las skyes pa chos kyi sprul// khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu// zhugs pa de dag rim gro bgyid// 
230b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams// de dag phyogs bcu rnam su yang // bdag gis kun tu srung bar
230b8(mdo sde): bgyi/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus tshigasu bcad ba 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa// de la ci 'dra 'os pa yi// de 'dra'i mchod pa bgyid par ni// sems can kun gyis mi nus so// 
231a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba des rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs gsol nas// tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol
231a2(mdo sde): to// de bzhin gshegs las bdag nyid kyis// chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi// pha rol la yang bstan par bgyi// bdag gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag sems dang // sngon gyi spyad pa
231a3(mdo sde): 'dra mkhyen// ji ltar bdag gis sems bdud pa// bdag ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'gyur// sangs rgyas dpag med skyob pa la// bdag gi gdugs 'di phul ba yi// bdag ni thub pa khyod 'dra bar// smyo gtsug ltar
231a4(mdo sde): 'ang mo gdar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bud ma yang // bdag gis dbyams pas bltas pa yis// yongs su dag pa'i mig thob ste/ rgyal bam pa ma blta bar bgyi// de shes par 'a phyin pa 'i// rten
231a5(mdo sde): pas de nas lung bstan te// khyed na 'di nas phyi ngas na// dga' ldan du/ ngaskye bar 'gyur// dga' ldan nas ni shi'i phos nas// rgyal ba mas pa mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni// mchod
231a6(mdo sde): pabyas nas 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod ni rab tu byung nas kyang // tshangs par spyad parabaspyod de// bskal ba bzang 'dir gang byung ba// bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad la yang mchod byas te// tshangs par spyod pa spyad
231a7(mdo sde): nas ni// bskal pa bye ba drug cun// de nas khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa// rin chen gdugs shes bya bar ni// byang chub sems dpa' sha dag la// khyod ni chos rnams ston par 'gyur/ 
231a8(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad ni bskal par 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'i ngam chos kyang // ma 'dres bskal pa byed du gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis g.yog brgya
231b1(mdo sde): stong phrag dum dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos sgrub mang sde 'di 'chang bde bsrung ba dang / yongs su bzung bar 'gyi'o// bsnyen bkur dang rim gror yang brgyam/ 
231b2(mdo sde): gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am// klog pa der ci nas kyang chos smra ba de'i stobs dang mthu dang chos kyi mtshams sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos nyan du mchi'o// de nas
231b3(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu sbed byed ces bya ba des/ do shal rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub pa bdag 'dir mngon sum ste// dzi/ 
231b4(mdo sde): ltar khyod kyi sngon spyad pa// de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes tshol bar bsgrub par bgyi// khyod kyis sngan chad ma stsal bar// yongs su ma btang ci ma mchis// bdog pa thams cad gtong ba yi
231b5(mdo sde): bdag kyang rjes su bslab par bgyi// khyod kyi mdo sde 'di yang ni// 'jig rten mgon las mngon du blangs// yang dang yang du bsha/ da par bgyi// bdag po khyed la bgyi pa gzo// mdo sde 'di la su
231b6(mdo sde): dga' ba// de dag bdag gi ston pa 'dra// bdag ni sangs rgyas chos 'chol bas// de la rtag tu rim gro bgyid// dam pa'i chos rnams yongs srung ba// mgon po nyan thos mi nus te// phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po/ 
231b7(mdo sde): che/ sa/ bdag gis yongs su bsrung bar bgyi// mgon po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol// lha rnams the tsom bcad du gsol// thub pa khyu mchog khyed 'dra bar// ji srid yun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// kun mkhyen ye
231b8(mdo sde): mkhas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan// nga ni ci 'dra de 'dra bar// khyod kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba phrag stong dang // bskal pa bye ba brgya yi tshe// 'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// 
232a1(mdo sde): ming ni ye shes 'byung zhes bya// byang chub zhi ba thob nas kyang // bdud rnams rab tu btul nas ni// sems can bye ba phrag stong rnams// byang chub la yang 'god par 'gyur// de nas/ 
232a2(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan la gnas pa yang btang ste// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang
232a3(mdo sde): dag par ston pa de la chos nyan du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa ni 'di las skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bgyi'o// 
232a4(mdo sde): de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod drar 'os pa lags so// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// 
232a5(mdo sde): dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma// gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// skye bo kun gyi mchod rten de/ gal te mdo sde 'di la ni// sems can gcig 'ga' btsud na
232a6(mdo sde): yang 'gro ba'i mgon po bdag sprob// chos smra ba ni de dag la// khri bstan gang la de mchis te// mdo sde 'di ni rab ston par// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du// me tog dgram par bdag spro'o// gang gi
232a7(mdo sde): lag nas mdo sde 'di// phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur ba// de la a la la zhes ni// legs smras legs zhes brjod par bgyi// gang na mdo sde 'di mchis par// me yi phung po gang ba yi// bye ba snyed kyi zhing rgal
232a8(mdo sde): nas// skye mi 'tshal bar 'chi bar bgyi// rin chen phung po ri rab tsam// dga' bzhin du ni phul nas kyang // sangs rgyas kyi yang lam sbyong ba// mdo sde 'di yang mnyan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
232b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul mngon par du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas bdud sdig can dadung gi stobs bzhi dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags
232b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dpung dang bcas// g.yog dang bcas pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
232b3(mdo sde): dam bcas te/ gang ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ljongs kyi phyogs der chos nyan pa dang / chos smra bdag la bdud kyi las mi bgyi ba'i steng du bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar yang bgyi'o// 
232b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bus/ sad ngas rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyad par mdzad de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ 
232b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos yongasasu gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grang
232b6(mdo sde): 'di yun ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' rangs yid bde bar gyur nas spos thams cad dang phreng ba thams cad
232b7(mdo sde): dang / thug pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas/ tshig kyang 'di skad ces e ma he chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas pa dang / 
232b8(mdo sde): rgyas par gyur cig ces 'dzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
233a1(mdo sde): bzung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung dang / bsas pa dang / klag pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bstan pa 'gyur/ 
233a2(mdo sde): khyo la yongs su gtong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la ston tam/ yi ger bris pa la mchod pa bgyid na/ de bsod nams
233a3(mdo sde): mam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bde ba'i yo
233a4(mdo sde): byang thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang / glog pa de ni de bas kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed do// kun dga' bo
233a5(mdo sde): gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi/ rnam grangs glegs bam du bris te/ mchod na de'i tshe 'di nyid la gter 'thob pa bcu thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu
233a6(mdo sde): thob pas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang / lha'i rna bas rab tu thos pas chos nyan pa'i gter dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rab tu thob pas/ dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi
233a7(mdo sde): shes pa'i longs spyod kyi gter dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas gzugs kyi gter dang / g.yog mi phyed pas g.yog gi gter dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang / spobs
233a8(mdo sde): pa rab tu thob pas dran pa'i gter dang / pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe bas bsod nams kyi gter ro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan
233b1(mdo sde): pan byang chub sems dpa' sa ya khrag khrig drag bdun cu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub la rab tu zhug so// sems can tshad med pa yang len pa med par rnam
233b2(mdo sde): par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ni tsi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
233b3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ sangs rgyas kyi brgyan bkod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa
233b4(mdo sde): zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar chu ngashig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshangs pa khyad par
233b5(mdo sde): sems dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam pa nyid lag zhes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'adra ba can gyi 'od dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
233b6(mdo sde): dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te
233b7(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / d+harma pA la dang / dzi na mi
233b8(mdo sde): tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de d+harmA ta shI la dang / bar zhus kyi lo tsa ba ban sde deben dra shil dang / ku ma ra shI la la sogs pas nus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
234a1(mdo sde): rgya ga skad du/ Ar+ya du ma kinan rapar dring tshan ma ma hA yAn sUt+ma// bo skad du/ 'phags pa mi'amatsho'i rgyal po ljon pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
234a2(mdo sde): ma rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thes padris gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal por byad na/ byanang kyi phung po rol/ dge na drug granyis nga ga dun
234a3(mdo sde): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la cher phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dul bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa chags pa
234a4(mdo sde): med pa// ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi byed pa/ sangs rgyas
234a5(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la sbyar ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhag pa'i bas ma ba khyad par 'phags pa la zhugs pa/ bdag nyid byang chub kyi/ sems mi 'dor ba/ sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag
234a6(mdo sde): par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ yongasu bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems
234a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa'i stobs kyi shin tu bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du brtson
234a8(mdo sde): 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dben pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs
234b1(mdo sde): ngachags pa med pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes la mkhas pa/ lhun po'i di ltar sems g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byams pa chen
234b2(mdo sde): po la gnas te/ 'od zer thogs pa med pa/ snying rje chen po la gnas te/ rtag tu sems can la lta bar brtson pa/ dga' ba chen po la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' ba la dga' ba dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms chen
234b3(mdo sde): po la gnas te/ gnyis su med pa shes pa thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las rab tu
234b4(mdo sde): 'das pa/ phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cadu kun tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i rgol ba bcom pa/ u dum pa ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar da
234b5(mdo sde): ba/ gsol ba ma btab pang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bsha sa gnyen byed pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ba/ na du mdza' ba/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
234b6(mdo sde): zab mo dang mi 'jigs pasgrogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ mi 'khrugs par phyin par lung bstan pa/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang
234b7(mdo sde): zla ba mog mog por byed pa phyogs bcur sgra bsgrogs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
234b8(mdo sde): rigs mi gcod par yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pas rnam par gnon pa/ rtag par
235a1(mdo sde): rgyun tu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog
235a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba la mkhas pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'jug pa dang / btags pa la bde brag tu mkhas pa/ 
235a3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas/ mtshan dang dpe byad
235a4(mdo sde): bzang po yong su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs pa sngags pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa/ rnam par grol ba/ smon lam shin tu
235a5(mdo sde): btab pa/ sems can dang / chos thams cad rgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / nI/ lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig
235a6(mdo sde): gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rtog pa/ rtogs par khong du chud pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin
235a7(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs kyis shin tu sogs pa'i lam thams cad
235a8(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gyi/ 
235b1(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'dug pa'i shes pa mkhas pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos dkon mchog gi sgron ma 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par blta ba/ sems can
235b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi byab so sor nye bar gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
235b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su rjod kyang mthar mi byin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dga'
235b4(mdo sde): 'byung dang / lag na rin po che dang / rin po che me tog dang / rin po che da'i tog dang / mthong dga' dang / dga' ba'i blo gros dang / dmig gis mthong dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / dga' zhing mchog tu
235b5(mdo sde): dga' byed dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal chen dang / bdud thul dang / me tog mnad ra'i dring 8/ rlung lha dang / bden dga' dang / mnyam lta dang / mnyam mi mnyam
235b6(mdo sde): lta dang / kha lo sgyur dang / gsol ba ma btab par sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / byams pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i mchog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od
235b7(mdo sde): / dngal dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / sngon sum blo gros dang / 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs cod pan dang / mdzes pa'i mig gis lta ba dang / lag bzang dang / legs par bsams pa sems pa dang / 'khor
235b8(mdo sde): mang ba gnas dang / mi g.yonang pas rnam gan dang / rje rje nang bas rnam gnan dang / rkang bas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / dpa' brebs dang / rlabs myur dang / slobs pa'i 'chad pa dang / spobs pabyi/ 
236a1(mdo sde): gyis brlabs dang / 'jam sgra dang / sems can thams cad tshims byed dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshims byed dang / 'gro 'dzin dang / lha'i rgyam
236a2(mdo sde): bos mchod dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / thogs med sems dang / skya reng blo gros dang / mi skyod pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub blo gros dang / sna tshogs me tog dang / lha'i me tog rgyal po dang / tshangs dbyangs
236a3(mdo sde): dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha dang / 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang
236a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang / thabs cig tu bzhug so/ 8/ gang stong gsum gyi stang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa lta
236a5(mdo sde): dadapang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha 'alding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi 'am mim/ yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen/ 
236a6(mdo sde): bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen
236a7(mdo sde): po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas
236a8(mdo sde): pa'i lha ngas la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod // 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma
236b1(mdo sde): mdzad/ khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan// snang ba bsnyes shing nyon mongs dri stsal ba// 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba// dul ba btul
236b2(mdo sde): ba gdul bya'i pha rol phyin// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa// gdul ba mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra// dge
236b3(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan gyis dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms zhing // phas kyi rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba// sems
236b4(mdo sde): can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// thugs rje mchog ldan khyo/ dra la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bas dal ba// mtsho bdag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas// lha yi lha/ 
236b5(mdo sde): mchog dri med dri ma bral// pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag tshal lo// bde gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa/ dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dgas// rdul skyon gti mug/ 
236b6(mdo sde): rnyog pa mi mnga' ba// nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung // mig sbyin bdud brtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum
236b7(mdo sde): rgyu ba 'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang mi yis mchod pa'i mthu bo che// mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa// mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mchod pa yi// mi mchog dam pa/ 
236b8(mdo sde): khyad la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu bden sdud dam pa'i chos la dgyes// mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur// yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag
237a1(mdo sde): 'tshalo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung // dbyangs kyi yan lag rab tshul kun rdzogs pa// bden bstan gsu
237a2(mdo sde): khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral// zab mo ltar dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// thar la 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan// thar pa'i lam nges khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la rten
237a3(mdo sde): pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mnga' ba// las rnams rnam smin kho na'i 'bras bu gsung // lta ba'i mun bral khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma
237a4(mdo sde): lags// rtag tu bden pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba// smigargyu sgyu bzhin nga'i mi mnga' ba// dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba mi skye gang du'ang skye ma lags// skye dang 'jig
237a5(mdo sde): dang gang du'ang mi bas pa// chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas// gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nga zhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsungs// rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid/ 
237a6(mdo sde): la bzhugs// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du grags// skyes bu
237a7(mdo sde): mchog la nu ba zhus pa rnams// 'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyer gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis// tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshog su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das
237a8(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas nu ba lung bstan pa'i slang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
237b1(mdo sde): rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin
237b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
237b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
237b4(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams
237b5(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cadakyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkha/ sa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor
237b6(mdo sde): rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
237b7(mdo sde): rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
237b8(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzing pa'i rkyen gyis rgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji/ 
238a1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
238a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par brgyal ba rnams lag
238a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang
238a4(mdo sde): ston pa/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams la/ dgas/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la yang blta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 
238a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par blta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji lta/ ran byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang
238a6(mdo sde): kun tu gda' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam par ma mchis
238a7(mdo sde): pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la bab pa rnams la rnam
238a8(mdo sde): par bye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
238b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
238b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis pa'i slob dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
238b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags ji ltar na
238b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang ba skur ba thob pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
238b5(mdo sde): lha'i cod pan la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs na leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bom nga po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che
238b6(mdo sde): don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba dang / thegs pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas
238b7(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di 'dri bar yongs su sems pa ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad
238b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces
239a1(mdo sde): bka' sul to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos pazhidang ldanan/ spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga zhen/ 'dis ste/ sa
239a2(mdo sde): can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa me pa rnams yin te/ rin po che dang phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba la gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog
239a3(mdo sde): cing rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / chos mnyan pa'am/ chos bgo ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
239a4(mdo sde): gyi phyir ram/ mtshan mo 'dug par skul na mchog tu dga' ba dang lha na ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / bzang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa ste rigs kyi bu byang chub
239a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sem sa dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la
239a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed
239a7(mdo sde): thams cad gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa
239a8(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa 'jug pa shes pa mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog
239b1(mdo sde): dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra nan tu sbyangs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pas
239b2(mdo sde): rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang
239b3(mdo sde): po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
239b4(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems can gzud pa she sa pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang / bdag gi sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs
239b5(mdo sde): par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
239b6(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi mdzud pa dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang
239b7(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa la zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
239b8(mdo sde): spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa
240a1(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ bzhig zhe na/ chad par sgrub ma yin pa dang / rtag par smrab ma yin pa dang / rgyung bya ba dang las ci 'bras bu la yang dag pa rda lta ba bzhin du
240a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la chos su smra'o// 'di bdag dang bdag gis mo smra ba ste/ de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu chud mi gzon pa ste/ rigs
240a3(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
240a4(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa na dmas yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin/ dpe byad bzang
240a5(mdo sde): pos rnam par smras pa rnams yin/ gzugs blta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ lag na rin po che thob pas loH/ sa spyod mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
240a6(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ 
240a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor lo sgyu ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
240a8(mdo sde): potshangs par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin/ 
240b1(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pong dag dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa/ 
240b2(mdo sde): rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ tshangs pa'i skang dang / dgrang byangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ kal ba dka'i sgra dang rdza sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skye bo mang pos mchod/ 
240b3(mdo sde): na dga' ba dang / sdug cing yid du 'ongs pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yi ma la brtan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bzod
240b4(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyibu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ brtson 'gru sa kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
240b5(mdo sde): dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chung bar bya ba'i cho ga shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam brtan pa rnams yin// pha rol/ gyis gnan pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/ 
240b6(mdo sde): bya ba ci yod ces bya ba mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/ thos pa'i tshogs sogs pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir/ yid yongs
240b7(mdo sde): su mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
240b8(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa rnams yin/ mu tsher smra ba med pa rnams yin/ cang shes
241a1(mdo sde): kyi sems mi 'dong brnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos pan po 'di dag nga ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brtan pa rnams su dag par bya/ 
241a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / 
241a3(mdo sde): skyes bu dang / gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshigs thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the/ 
241a4(mdo sde): tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
241a5(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dpung / gnyen du bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / 
241a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos thams cad la dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir/ 
241a7(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
241a8(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi bsdud pa'i shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i thab/ 
241b1(mdo sde): shes pa dang / rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos shes pa dang / sangs rgyas la lta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 
241b2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi
241b3(mdo sde): ba dang / pha rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
241b4(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin/ no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dargal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
241b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo yang ra ba tu shes la bsams bzhin du yang skye ba dang / lta ba'i chu bo yang
241b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings pa yang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
241b7(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can
241b8(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / chos thams
242a1(mdo sde): cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par/ 
242a2(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma
242a3(mdo sde): brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
242a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yi dam mi mdor ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
242a5(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
242a6(mdo sde): khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / chos rang bzhin
242a7(mdo sde): med pas sems can rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang med par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba
242a8(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs pa la yang rnam par lta la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
242b1(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ sbyor ba 'khor ba la gnas pa
242b2(mdo sde): rnams yin sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su spang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
242b3(mdo sde): dpa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor
242b4(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal po chen po la mos pa'i sems can gdul ba'i phyir/ bas dra nams kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i
242b5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i rgyu/ 8/ dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang / slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing nor med par
242b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyis
242b7(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa yin la/ thabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
242b8(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang / 'du byed thams cad bzod ma nas sdug bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar
243a1(mdo sde): byur ba yangs su byu bdang / myang na las 'das pan pad mnas na shes le shes pa 'jug paste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshas ban pa 'ang dag ba zhun/ 
243a2(mdo sde): a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i skal 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bani gang zhe na/ 
243a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
243a4(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub dasems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyasakyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs
243a5(mdo sde): kyibu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ chos pa/ na la dbab pa rnams la rnam par byel shin tu rnam par 'byed pa mas yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mam
243a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang / bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnas su shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang
243a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
243a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 'jig rten las
243b1(mdo sde): sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
243b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
243b3(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis ltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang
243b4(mdo sde): phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// gzhan dag gi bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
243b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gan/ gas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhig nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams sangs rgyas la lta ba
243b6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyon pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sangs
243b7(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no// 
243b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu ngul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab
244a1(mdo sde): kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta bas bzhin dang / bag chags kyi
244a2(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
244a3(mdo sde): ldan na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin te/ 
244a4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pa rgya che ba rnams yin
244a5(mdo sde): gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de sems can thams cad kyi ched// du yin gyi/ bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
244a6(mdo sde): ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin te/ 
244a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar
244a8(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tshe'i/ zang zing gis 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 
244b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi ston pa gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin te/ 
244b2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chang pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa la shes pa 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing / 
244b3(mdo sde): mi byed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos ban pa 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la skor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
244b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur bathob pa rnams yin te/ bzhig ni na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa
244b5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa las mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams yin/ bsams na zhi dri che dang 'chi 'bo dang skye ba yang ston la/ phyir mi ldog pa ni/ 
244b6(mdo sde): phyag rgyas btab pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhing sa bcus nges par byung nas/ sa nas sar 'bar ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
244b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi pa ning ga dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
244b8(mdo sde): pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba khrag
245a1(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glung dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man ra'i char rab tu banas/ 'di sad ces kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa
245a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyed cing bshad de
245a3(mdo sde): rab tu bstan to// bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang
245a4(mdo sde): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa
245a5(mdo sde): ma lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar/ seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang mi dang lham du bcas pa'i 'jig
245a6(mdo sde): rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
245a7(mdo sde): brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
245a8(mdo sde): tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cang
245b1(mdo sde): pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i mang sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang d+ha cher rab tu ston pa
245b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta
245b3(mdo sde): bu 'dzin pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de dag
245b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sem das can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med de/ shin tu byam/ 
245b5(mdo sde): bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod de chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur/ 
245b6(mdo sde): bdang / thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dge ba'i rtsabs
245b7(mdo sde): brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs te/ smon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom
245b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba te/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dgal yang rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa'adi dag ni chos brgyang po 'di dag
246a1(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum
246a2(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag sa phyogs mtho dman can dang / ri nag po dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang
246a3(mdo sde): bar gyur to// sa chen po 'di dag thams cad kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to// chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
246a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon pa ded/ ga thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs/ skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud
246a5(mdo sde): mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tsho gas skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par
246a6(mdo sde): btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// sa chen po las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam sna tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'thon to// snang ba chen
246a7(mdo sde): bos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyad par gyur to// mi snang zhing mi dkrol bar yang steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grag par gyur to// 
246a8(mdo sde): riri rgyal pogs pa ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dring byung ste/ dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri
246b1(mdo sde): zhim po mnam par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang de las me tog gi char chen po bab ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon
246b2(mdo sde): bar bab nas/ sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to// me tog gi shing de dag las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi
246b3(mdo sde): sgra dag kyang byung ngo // steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag drug cu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig
246b4(mdo sde): gi rgyan phreng dang / rin po che'i 'dril bu g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to// dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa
246b5(mdo sde): chags par byed pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams 'digo bar byas par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di
246b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dga' bar bgyod pa/ mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
246b7(mdo sde): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa gda' ba 'di su'i snga bltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni mo'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ri'i rgyal po spos dang ldang
246b8(mdo sde): nas 'khor mi 'am ci stong phrag du ma dang 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor lha stang phrag du ma dang / 'ong ba de'i snga bltas so// de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig da la mi 'amatsha
247a1(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pa sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chu bo'i char
247a2(mdo sde): 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
247a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi bang gi khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi bas ma le'u
247a4(mdo sde): can sa le sbram dang / nor bu dang / rin po che du mas spras pa/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs te/ sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu
247a5(mdo sde): grags par byed do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang de blang sa ma thag tu de nas pi Thag sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to// pi
247a6(mdo sde): wang gi sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis gnan te mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas pi wang gi sgra des bskul pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i
247a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bor te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
247a8(mdo sde): gyi khams 'di shing dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / grangs can dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / btang zung dang / btang zung chen po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang / rtsa dang shing
247b1(mdo sde): gel ba dang / sman dang nags thal nga snyed pa de dag thams cad sdig ba tu ldeg/ kun tu ba tu ldeg go// gsor btug po/ kun tu btug pa/ 'gul ba tu 'phrul to// 'das ste/ dper na chung
247b2(mdo sde): gis ra ra ba'ang 'khor rab tu 'khyod kun tu rab tu 'khyor ba de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang / ri thams cad kyang 'dud/ rab tu 'arung / kun tu rab tu 'dud // tsha'amatsho'i rgyal ba sdang bas
247b3(mdo sde): bi wang log pa be rgyu las byas pa blangs ma thag tA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor kyang kyil 'khor de 'dus pa'i nang nas/ byer mi sdig pa byang chung sems dpa' ma gtogs para'ang/ 
247b4(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gan sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
247b5(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / 
247b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi wang gi sgra de thos pa dang / pi wang gi sgra de ma bzod nas rang rang gi stan las langs te/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud/ 
247b7(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'dud do// gar byed rab tu gar byed/ kun tu rab tu gar byed do// nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang
247b8(mdo sde): 'khrugs nas byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos
248a1(mdo sde): chen po dganyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing // 
248a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston// nyan thos chen po de dag gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba sdong pos pi wang 'di blangs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu
248a3(mdo sde): dbyangs sbyar bas pi wang gi sgra des bdag cag la dbang med par bdag gi lus rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi 'ga' zhing 'dar rab tu 'dar kun tu rab tu 'dar te/ sems rnam par bzhag
248a4(mdo sde): par yang ma nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rgas gtugs
248a5(mdo sde): 'khogs pa 'dod pa nyung ba/ cho ga shos pa sbyangs pa'i yon te/ na 'dzin pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten du gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzin par mi nus
248a6(mdo sde): shing gnas brtan du gyur byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dper na rlung rnam par 'thor byed langs pa na/ shing dang nags dang
248a7(mdo sde): ri thams cad 'di ltar bdag rnam par bzhag pa'i stobs med mthu med de/ de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab tu g.yo/ 'gul rab tu 'gul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'di mi 'am tsa'i
248a8(mdo sde): rgyal ba ljon pas pa wang blangs pa de'i sgra brags pas/ bdag cag rlung rnam par 'thor byed kyis ri chen po 'das pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus par gyur to// de ci 'byor zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i
248b1(mdo sde): smon lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ des nyan thos kyi bsod nams dang ye shes dang / gzi brjid thams cad zil gyis non to// byang chub sems dpa'/ 
248b2(mdo sde): cod pan gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs la gang gi phyir pi wang gi sgra des bskul pa'am/ 
248b3(mdo sde): bskyod par mi nus pas/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyi tshe ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang
248b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid don pi wang gi sgra 'das zil gyis non to// gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de la ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa la ltos
248b5(mdo sde): de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang gi sgra de sgrog pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mau'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pi wang de dang sil snyan
248b6(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben// zhi ba stong pa mi
248b7(mdo sde): 'gyur 'khrug pa med// bzod nas dag ste dri med na mkha' bzhin// gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi// sems can kun mnyam sems can sems can med// sems can skad du sgra rnams
248b8(mdo sde): 'byung ba yang // chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang med// zhing rnams thams cad zhing mnyam zhing min te// bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par snang // 'phel ba ma yin mi bzad ma skyes
249a1(mdo sde): te/ gsog gsob namakha' lta bur rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min// chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa med pa ste// tshul
249a2(mdo sde): khrims shes rab ye shes rnam grol mnyam// mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid med// nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol// rtog dang rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog/ nang na
249a3(mdo sde): rgyu ba ma yin phyi rol min// 'du shes mdud pa phyin ci log las gyur// rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings ming btags pa// ming de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rjes
249a4(mdo sde): rtogs pa/ de dag rtag tu mi chags 'jig rten spyod// gang rnam sa 'das pa'i bde gshegs grangs med pa// de dag gis ni ga/ dang gsungs chos mang po// gzod nas zad cing dengs dang 'jig las
249a5(mdo sde): dben/ de dag yul dang phyogasu 'gro ma yin// chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste// yi ge de dag sems can zad pa'i chos/ yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na// chos rnams kun la
249a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog mi byed// sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyud ma yin// rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa med// sems dang sems byung chos mtha' med shes pas// 'phags pa rnams
249a7(mdo sde): ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/ mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad// thog ma tha ma dam mnyam par gyur// dus gsum dag ni dben pa shes pa mnyam// shes pa de yang mtha' yod
249a8(mdo sde): ma yin no// skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags// mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na// bdag dang sems can rnam par
249b1(mdo sde): rtog ma yin// bdag las ldang brtag tu ldang ba ma yin// chos de kun ni spang ba med pa ste// gang dag ldang dang ldang ba med rtogs pa// de dag bzod ma mnyam nyid rjes su 'thun
249b2(mdo sde): chos kun rtag tu bdag med rang bzhin te// sprin dang klog dang nam mkha' lta bu gsog/ bdag dang sems can rtag tu rang bzhin stong // 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyas 'jug pa yin// 
249b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mtshan med par// gang gi thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam rtogs nas// thug pa med pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang // chos la yongs su rtog pa mi byed do// 
249b4(mdo sde): tham 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos 'di dag ni yi ge rnams kyis brjod// yi ge rnams la rnam par rtag mi byed// de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin// 
249b5(mdo sde): don dang tshig 'bru gnyis la mi 'jug ste// gnyis med rta ga tu don ni sgra dang bral// gang gis mtha' ni dben parashes gyur pa// de yi sngon gyi mtha' ni nye bar chad// gang dag
249b6(mdo sde): sngon mtha' nye bar chad pa rnams// grol ba'i don du 'dus byas rnams la spyod// yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes// de yi byams dang snying rje shin tu dag/ gang gi byams dang snying rje rnam
249b7(mdo sde): dag pa/ sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba mtshungs mnyam sbyor// rgod dang khengs pa ma yin brtan pa yin// skyes bu mchog gi don gyi go cha shes// chos kyi tshul 'di zhi zhing bden pa ste// 'chad pa na
249b8(mdo sde): ni dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur// nam yang 'phel ba med cing 'bri ba med// chos nyid 'di ni ngar 'dzin med cing zhi// bar snang lam gyi sgra ni gzung med de// gang gi bshad pa med kyang grag par 'gyur// 
250a1(mdo sde): gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams// de dag thams cad brdzun pa ya marla// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na// byang chub sems dpa'/ 
250a2(mdo sde): brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bkum pa 'di lta bu
250a3(mdo sde): 'di dag ga las byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la dris shig dang / des de'i lan glon par 'gyur ro// de nas byang
250a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'am ci'i bdag po tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dgag las byung / 
250a5(mdo sde): smras pa rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ga las 'byung ba las byung ngo // smras pa mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ga las 'byung / smras pa rigs
250a6(mdo sde): kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ni nam mkha' las 'byung ngo // smras pa mi'am tso'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi sgra skad khong pa'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems
250a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad lus kyi khong nas 'byung ngam/ 'on te sems las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po lus las kyang ma yin/ sems las kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe
250a8(mdo sde): na/ lus ni bems po g.yob med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtsadang bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / mig yor lta bu'o// sems ni gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa/ 
250b1(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'o// smras pa// rigs kyi bu lus dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi
250b2(mdo sde): sgra ni yid la byed pa las 'byung bar btags so// smras pa/ gal te na mkha' med na sgra ga las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po nam mkha' ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung
250b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra'i tha snyad gang snyed 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni/ nam mkha' las byung bar rig par bya'o// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ni sgra ste/ 
250b4(mdo sde): rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gag go// 'gags nas nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du yang dag par gnas so// de'i phyir chos tham das cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste rnam par rig pa
250b5(mdo sde): med pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin mod kyi/ sgra dang sgra'i brdas brjod do// brjod pa de yang tha snyad do// gang sgra sa brjod pa 'di 'dra bar rab tu shes pa de ni chos gang la yang
250b6(mdo sde): mngon par mi chags so// gang mngon par mi chags pa de ni rnam par mi 'gro'o// gang rnam par mi 'phro ba de ni mi 'khor ro// gang mi 'khor ba de ni mi phyed pa'o// gang mi phyed pa de ni
250b7(mdo sde): mi skye'o// gang mi skye ba de mi 'jig par 'dod do// gang mi 'jig pa de dang ba'o// gang dang ba de dag pa'o// gang dag pa de dri ma med pa'o// gang dri ma med pa de 'od gsal ba'o// 
250b8(mdo sde): gang 'od gsal ba de sems kyi rang bzhin no// sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o// gang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa'o// gang mtshan ma thams cad
251a1(mdo sde): gnon pa de skyon med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa gang yin bden/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'tho
251a2(mdo sde): bste/ de na skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o// gang bzod pa thob pa des thams cad bzod de/ de stong par yang bzod de gang zag du yang
251a3(mdo sde): bzod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag las stong pa gzhan ma yin te/ gang zag nyid stong pa'o// de mtshan mar yang bzod/ de mtshan ma med par yang bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
251a4(mdo sde): mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o// de smon par yang ba bzod/ de smon par med par bzod do// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan ma smon pa med pa'o// 
251a5(mdo sde): de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'a nges par yang bzod/ de sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba/ dang skye bar yang bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'chi 'pho dang /
