276a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur// sems kyang ji ltar dang bar 'gyur// chos thos nas ni ji lta bur// de dag the tshom skye mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas rjes
276a4(mdo sde): su dran bsgoms pa// des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// the tshom med cing bsam dag pas// chos thos nas ni som nyi med// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod
276a5(mdo sde): nams tshogs ni ji lta bur// ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra na ga/ de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la// rtsom pa yang ni ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis
276a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs// 'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te// chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo // sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 
276a7(mdo sde): dedagazhin spyod yul gang // de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu// de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig/ de dag sbyor ba'ang ci lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag spyad
276a8(mdo sde): yul stong pa nyid// gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam// gnas pa bsam gtan bani rnams te// sems can rab dgre la sbyor ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bdud rtsi
276b1(mdo sde): las gang yin// sangs rgyas phrin las ji lta bur// ci 'dra ba yi las byas nas// byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ 
276b2(mdo sde): theg pa dman pa bdud kyi las/ sangs rgyas phrin las theg pa che// sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni// byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 
276b3(mdo sde): dag grags brten ji lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig/ log par bltal mi gnas shing // ji ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams
276b4(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa/ rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o// byang chub sems/ las gang zlog pa// de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes/ 
276b5(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ lam du 'jug par 'a gyur pa yi// lta ba drang po ji lta bu// sbyor ba ra rnam par shes nas su// ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed/ 
276b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni// de dag drang por lta ba yin// log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas// lta ba de dag 'dzag mi byed/ 
276b7(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar dam pa'i chos srung zhing // sems can yongs su smin par byed// ji ltar bu yi thabs kyis ni// de dag byang chub sgrub par 'gyur/ 
276b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// brtson 'grus kyis ni chos srung ste// bsdu bas yongs su smin par byed// mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa ni// byang chub
277a1(mdo sde): bsgrub par byed pa yin// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag shes pa'i lam ci 'dra// nga rgyal las ni dzilta bu// ji ltar bka' blo bde bdang / 
277a2(mdo sde): thams cad dus su 'thun par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ rtsod pa med pa shes pa'i las// nga rgyal las ni brjod pa 'byung // nges pa bka' blo bde
277a3(mdo sde): bste// gus pa yis ni 'thun par 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag lam du ji lta bu// log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig/ bla med byang chub lam du ni// ji ltar
277a4(mdo sde): sems can rab tu 'god// byang chub sems dpa'i gzu dgas rnams kyis smras pa/ lam ni pha rol phyin pa drug/ theg pa dman pa log pa'i lam// shes rab thabs la slab
277a5(mdo sde): pa ni// sems can lam la mdzud pa'o// sil snyan rnam sa kyis smras pa/ ji lta bur na nor chen 'gyur// de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu/ 
277a6(mdo sde): gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ nor bdun dang ni rtag tu ldan// chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o// de dag gter ni gzugs yin te// 
277a7(mdo sde): rab tu rnyed nas tshim par byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni pha ma gang // nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/ gang gis mkhas pa de dag
277a8(mdo sde): mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ ma ni shes rab pha rol thabs// nye du byang chub phyogs rnams yin// dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te// des
277b1(mdo sde): ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas ni// byams pas 'gro ba khyab par byed// bdag med pa dang byams pa dag/ de la ji ltar mtshung
277b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang dag stong nyid rab tu shes// de ni bdag med khong du chud// gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa// de ni de'i byams
277b3(mdo sde): pa mchog/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med na// las dang las kyi rnam par smin// ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur// byang chub
277b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dam pa'i don du/ 'ongs med de// gang du'ang 'gro ba yod ma yin// kun rdzob tu na lam 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa nye bar ston// / 
277b5(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon lam rnam par spangs par ni// mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas// de kho na ni ji ltar shes// byang chub sems
277b6(mdo sde): dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med// mtshan mngon du gnyer med pa// mtshan nyid cig cing don gcig ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgor ston to// sil snyan rnams
277b7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// stong par rtog pa ci lta bu// sems can lta bu ji lta bu// yongs su smin byed ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras
277b8(mdo sde): pa/ shes rab kyis ni stong par rtog/ thabs kyis sems can rnams la lta// snying rjes yongs su smin par byed// des ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 
278a1(mdo sde): chos 'di dag na chos nyid kyis// skyeb med cing 'byung med par// tshul mchog 'di 'du shes nas ni// gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur/ byang
278a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba// de ni shes rab spyod yul lo// bsams bzhin du ni gang skye ba// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sil snyan
278a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ gtong la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur// ji lta bur na phyir mi ldog/ ji ltar bzod pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnam/ 
278a4(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog/ mi skye ba la bzod pa ste// chos shes nas ni rnam par nges// si la snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar byang chub snying po gang // 
278a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang // ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras pa/ byang chub
278a6(mdo sde): snying po na mkha' ste// byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang kun nas gti mug med// de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs// de nas mi 'am tsa'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad
278a7(mdo sde): pa 'di thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// de dag bzod pa thob nas/ rang rang gis gos dang rgyan bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// 
278a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu thos pas sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gis ched du byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs 'di dag las
278b1(mdo sde): the tsom 'dri ba'i sgra 'di lta bu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa de dag thams cad kyi lan btab 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag cag
278b2(mdo sde): kyang chos kyi snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sil snyan de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na/ byang chub sems
278b3(mdo sde): dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ bzhin bzangs dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs su blta'o// 
278b4(mdo sde): bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'byung / na/ sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin bzang
278b5(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis/ 
278b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas mi'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig kha dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas/ 
278b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
278b8(mdo sde): la mngon par bkab bo// mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ 
279a1(mdo sde): mu tig do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa/ 
279a2(mdo sde): cha mnyam pa/ ngos shin tu rnam par phye ba sha stag go// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag ni rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsab yang rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i res bcos bu'i zung dum bkram pa
279a3(mdo sde): dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo // de
279a4(mdo sde): nas mi 'am tso mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi/ cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu ste yi/ da rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te
279a5(mdo sde): bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag byang chub tu semasas bskyed nas/ dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste dang ba thob
279a6(mdo sde): nas thams cad kyis sgra skad dang dbyangs cig tu tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung
279a7(mdo sde): ba/ don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab// don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslabs pa// sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags zhe sdang
279a8(mdo sde): gti mug zab 'jig/ dgon par zhugs dgyes bsnyengs pa mi mngarab// rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa bo// bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan lnga dri bral
279b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs mi mnga' ba// sa yi dbang po pa rol dgra bcom pa// pad+mal bur srid gsum mi gos pa// bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nang na mig dang
279b2(mdo sde): 'drar spyod cing // nyi zla 'di yi 'od ni spa bkong ba// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes// 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ming dang gzugs la nam
279b3(mdo sde): yang mi chags shing // mgon dang dpung dang sbubs su mnga' ba rnyes gyur// khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa gal zhig/ mtha' yas dbyangs mngar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// brnyes dang
279b4(mdo sde): brnyes la nam yang chags ma mnga'// 'jig rten chos rnams dazil gyis mnan te bzhugs// chags srong 'khri shing dadra ba 'grol mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag
279b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab zhugs shing / 'gro la zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsol ba// smyon pa'i gnas la
279b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// smra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pa// lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs// 'jam zhing snum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung ba// srid pa gsum la
279b7(mdo sde): 'gapa khrag 'tshal lo// mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs// 'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa// bcom ldan bran 'dra
279b8(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag pa ston mdzad pa// chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug/ ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'grel/ 
280a1(mdo sde): 'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gser gyi kha dog 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo// ston gyi zla
280a2(mdo sde): 'dra'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// skye dgu 'di dag bsgral dka' chu bzhi sgrol// bsdam
280a3(mdo sde): shing dbang po dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// khyod la skyabs su 'chi bar mchid kyis 'tshal// thub pa sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab sul// bslangs na dbang po dgyes par rab 'gyur ba/ 
280a4(mdo sde): pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog stsal ba// gtong dpa' bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems canang rgyal rgya/ sa khengs gti mug pa// d+hu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'ga' ba kyang
280a5(mdo sde): rnams// 'phags pa blan med pa'i lam mchags/ rnam par 'dren pa chen pa khyod kyis bkong // phung rje/ rang bzhin gyis na snang mkhyen nas// las dang nyan mangs
280a6(mdo sde): zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod// bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bden pa'i chos la brtson zhing mnyam par bzhag
280a7(mdo sde): chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog/ bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcos pa mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral/ 
280a8(mdo sde): bdud kyi bde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs pa che// mi mchog la mdang lam ma lags la mkhas// rlung mar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'// gzir bar gyur bsal pha rol shin/ 
280b1(mdo sde): tu gnas// thub pa bas pa ma 'tshal bang mdzod mnga'// spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang ga yi// bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod// mthu brnyes ma g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// chags
280b2(mdo sde): pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs// gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis sten// de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs// tshe rabs bye ba
280b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab dgongs// bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis// 'jigs pa chen po 'dra ba rab tu 'dral// 'dren pa mi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud// phyag
280b4(mdo sde): dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing // bkra shis pa/ las 'jam pa'i ran slong ba// bcom ldan bkra shi/ sa mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs rnams la ni dbang gi
280b5(mdo sde): pha rol phyin// zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol// thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab rdung ba// chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phye ga 'tshal lo// shAkya'i rigs rus rgyal po las byung ba/ 
280b6(mdo sde): dbang bzhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu ni// ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa// bde gshegs ni thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno ba yi/ 
280b7(mdo sde): ral gyi thogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang // khyod kyi baspu tsam yang ma g.yos te// bcom ldan lhun po 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol pha rol phyin// sku
280b8(mdo sde): rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis kyang bzod// yang 'byung ba dang skye ba dang 'chibs pa// bzod gsungs bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/ 
281a1(mdo sde): gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod// chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
281a2(mdo sde): 'dus bgyis nyam chung snying po med par mkhyen// skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel// khyod kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags// ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// 
281a3(mdo sde): sems long sdug bsngal mgon med pa// de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum tshom bgyis// khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa// bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal// 
281a4(mdo sde): stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms// khyod kyis bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom// srid pa rnams kyi de nang na mchog gyur pa// thub pa dbang ba bsgoms la phyag
281a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'dun pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos gsan pa// mchu/ ngas med byang chub la ni chags mi mnga'// grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsung ba// bcom ldan gdugs 'dra
281a6(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa mi 'dra chos rnams thugs su chud// 'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmo 'dra rab tu bskor// 'dus bgyis yang dag tu na rmi lam 'drar// mkhyen nas sems
281a7(mdo sde): can mang po dran par mdzad// chos kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'// ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs// ljags ni pad+ma mdab ma brgya lta bu// ljags
281a8(mdo sde): skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sring gsum kun la chags pa ma mnga' ba// 'gro ba rnams la bdun pa'i skyon mi gsung // 'dun pa'i 'dod chags bral ba ma smad pa
281b1(mdo sde): byang chub mchog la srog chags 'dun par mdzad// nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa// ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'// mi'i dam pa gser ltar dpal
281b2(mdo sde): sdug pa// khyod kyis mtshan dang grangs pa chub par grags// gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas// 'di na bzhugs zhing 'gro ba'i mig tu gyur// gnas dang yig 'bru
281b3(mdo sde): tshig gi don bslabs pas// khyod kyis chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags// glang po rin tang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad// 'dren pa mi dang lhag rnams sgrol ba po// khyod kyi yon tan
281b4(mdo sde): mtha' ma mi rnyed de// mgon po khyod la bdag ni thal mo sbyor// / mi yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas// mi mjed la// dzam bu'i rgyal por gyur lags na// 'dir ni dbang po dang bas// 
281b5(mdo sde): thal sbyar nas// skyabs su nye bar mchi ba smos ci 'tshal// phu nga po gsog ste nyams chung snying po med// stong pa sgyu ma chu zla 'dra bar ni// go'u tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen// 
281b6(mdo sde): phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa'i srad bus dam du mdud bor te// sred pa'i 'gro la dra bar rab grags pa// srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de// bde gshegs
281b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dral// tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung rjod pa// sho ba ma lags mi 'gyur 'drid ma lags// phun tshegs gsung ba de dag thos nas ni// 
281b8(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te skyabs su nye bar mchi// phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir rig pa na// nags tshal bcas par rnam pa drug g.yos kyang // 'dir ni zhabs la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis
282a1(mdo sde): bdud phyogs dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha yi rgyal po chen dang mkhas pa gang // khyod kyi chos don nyer zhing mchis pa rnams// de dag
282a2(mdo sde): so sor chos bstan thos nas su// zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu gtug pa bgyid// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
282a3(mdo sde): bar bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs na/ babud med kyi
282a4(mdo sde): dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bdagacag bud med kyi dngos po las byung ste/ skyes pa'i dngos po
282a5(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu/ bkyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta buchos de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par
282a6(mdo sde): bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag de'i phyir legs par
282a7(mdo sde): rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
282a8(mdo sde): pabar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyed la bshad par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
282b1(mdo sde): nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag chos gcig par ldan na// bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te// skye ba'i dngos po 'thob
282b2(mdo sde): cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems
282b3(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
282b4(mdo sde): thams cad la brjed pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ sring mo// dag chos gcig pu 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med/ kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur
282b5(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzha na yang chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po
282b6(mdo sde): las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag
282b7(mdo sde): dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sring mo dag chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang
282b8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ 
283a1(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gsum
283a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa'o// sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di
283a3(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
283a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dbud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
283a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par sbyin pa byin kha dang / g.yo med par bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yo
283a6(mdo sde): med par tshul khrims sten pa dang / g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / 
283a7(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ 
283a8(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba
283b1(mdo sde): dang chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang / rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa'i lus 'thob par sems skyes pa dang / ji skad
283b2(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
283b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos
283b4(mdo sde): bo 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / 
283b5(mdo sde): mnyen pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / gsal ba dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ sri nga mo chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi
283b6(mdo sde): dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo gzhan yang
283b7(mdo sde): chos bdun dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs
283b8(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i
284a1(mdo sde): phyir/ chos rjes su dran pa dang / rang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdus pa'i phyir/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / smon lam yongs
284a2(mdo sde): su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su dor ba'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
284a3(mdo sde): lha rjes su dran pa dang / de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i
284a4(mdo sde): dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuradar ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na// bud
284a5(mdo sde): med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob ce nga/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubab kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ brgyad
284a6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zas la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skom la sred pa ma yin pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang / 
284a7(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal du 'gro ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dgod pa dang 'jo ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / glu dang gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dga'
284a8(mdo sde): bdang rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/ sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi
284b1(mdo sde): dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan
284b2(mdo sde): yang chos dgu dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par
284b3(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang / bdag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du smra ba ma
284b4(mdo sde): yin pa dang / srog tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / gang zag du smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la
284b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin te/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang
284b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes
284b7(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
284b8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang / srog gi phyir yang
285a1(mdo sde): brdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang / tshig khyal ba mi smra bdang / pha rol pa
285a2(mdo sde): dga' zhing rtse ba la phra dog med cing gnod sems kyi bag la nyal mngon par mi sgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / ldan par gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring/ 
285a3(mdo sde): mo dag chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las log te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
285a4(mdo sde): bapar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dgagazhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/ da gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis
285a5(mdo sde): rgyags shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu bu/ ra so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur
285a6(mdo sde): ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la mig rgyu ba lta bur so sor rtog ste bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed skyes
285a7(mdo sde): ba'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur mo sor rtog pa ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying pa med par rtogs nas/ 'du byed thams cad la ma
285a8(mdo sde): gnas shing de la tshogs pa mi skyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtog pa nas/ chos thams
285b1(mdo sde): cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med gti mug med pa dang / lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang / chu'i khams
285b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus la sa se re rtag go// lus 'di ni bsdus pa rtswa dang shing dang / bang ba dang / rtsig pa dang / 
285b3(mdo sde): mig yor lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi/ phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las
285b4(mdo sde): kyis byung ba'o// gzhan yang bud med mig la kha zas la/ des skyes pa'i sha'i gong bu ba nyid kyis stong pa rang / bzhin gyis dben pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs pa
285b5(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lde dang / lus dang / yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rang bzhin gyis dpe na bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa sor rtog pa'o// gzhan
285b6(mdo sde): yang bud med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / ngag la brag cha lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o// sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na bud med kyi dngos
285b7(mdo sde): bo las gyur te/ skyes bu'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po
285b8(mdo sde): ljon pa'i slas de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das las bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas
286a1(mdo sde): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
286a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// dri med dri bral dri ma bcod mdzad pa// rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mnga'// pad+ma'i mdab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs/ 
286a3(mdo sde): dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad zhing mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa// dga' ba ston brtag tu dgon par dgyes// rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga'
286a4(mdo sde): ba/ yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'jom// pad+ma lta bur stong mchog bka' mtshad gsung // lam
286a5(mdo sde): mchog sogs shing dam pa'i don ston pa// mchog tu da/ ga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi bka' mtshad gsungs// sa la rgyu ba 'di
286a6(mdo sde): mig stsol mdzad pa// 'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba// rdul med phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rdul bsal dam pa mthu bo che// mgon po 'gro la
286a7(mdo sde): mchog gi don mdzad pa// bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad pa// bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa'i khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa med// brnyes
286a8(mdo sde): pa dag dang ma brnyes mtshungs pa'i thugs// 'jig rten mthar 'byin snang ba'i sgron mdzad pa// rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'// 
286b1(mdo sde): sbyin pastsol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyes// dul bzhi gnas yon tan pha rol phyin// nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa stsol// 
286b2(mdo sde): skye bo'i 'dren pa lha yi mchog pas mchog/ sems dang stobs dang bzod pa nges par dgyes// mchod 'os bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mar me lta bur dri med zla ba 'dra/ 
286b3(mdo sde): phyi nang nyon mongs dri ma bcod mdzad pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter// zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong zhi mdzad pa// ston pa skye mched
286b4(mdo sde): drug las thar mdzad pa// rjes su dran drug shin tu yongs dgadran// rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// da'adom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta// gsung snyan dam pa
286b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs// bcom ldan gang zag dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum ni mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs rtag tu dka' thub
286b6(mdo sde): brtul zhugs rab tu spyad// de bzhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin min de gsung // mun par sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bder gshegs grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal/ 
286b7(mdo sde): de dag nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa// yon tan brjod pa mthong zhing grags bsgrags pa/ mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bsngags pa gnas shing brtul zhugs dka'
286b8(mdo sde): thung 'phags// khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa// ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog/ skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ka la bing ga tshangs
287a1(mdo sde): byas drugs sa// 'ad cad nga ma ga/ ru bas sam khyen pa khas pa pa ba gshegs/ An na
287a2(mdo sde): mchags la phyag 'tshal la/ ban tan sbyin pa yin tan shA ma tshang bya/  / ga/ 'ashi tugs par gal/ 'dum rnas rdza drugs ba gdu mdzadag/ 
287a3(mdo sde): bdung rnapas 'joms mdzad byed la phyag 'tshal lo// banyam thugs pa la stsu ba bdu thugs/ kun gyis mngan pa ma pa ma pa mam lags/ rngubab mtshag/ 
287a4(mdo sde): gsung chen pa'i bgaga' mtshangasan/ bde gshegs matsam thugs kyid la phyag 'tshal tshwa/ nam ldan pa shin tu 'jam pa 'jungs// drung kyi ba mang
287a5(mdo sde): 'dzem mdza dang rgyal dang // lhag pa'ing rgyal med ma 'tshul mi 'chos// thub pa dge sbyong rgyal la / ga 'tshal lo// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam
287a6(mdo sde): gtan ces// / gtu dang chags sbyin dang rab gru// 'de bar gshegs pa mag gnasas bdugs// gangs brgyam tshag mang mkhyong laphyag 'tsham mo// phyag
287a7(mdo sde): dang nabaman du meng drabs 'brel// s+yo dang na dang 'chib ma mnga' ga// rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal// nam mkha' mnyam thugs kyad la phyag 'tshal la/ 
287a8(mdo sde): de nas mi 'amaci'i rgyam pa ldan pa'i blas ma'am tsha'i bum brgyad khri ba ni steng pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pas la gtugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa bsam pa
287b1(mdo sde): mkhyen nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
287b2(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog dum sna tshogs po byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lnga
287b3(mdo sde): bu'o// de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par gyur te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil du rlag par
287b4(mdo sde): byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'ig tsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las
287b5(mdo sde): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ zhes dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par/ bcom ldan
287b6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar babatud de/ tshogs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don nus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum sten
287b7(mdo sde): pazla ba dri ma med zhal khyod la nu // dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la nu// gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la gu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slas 'dzum ston pa// dam pa'i gzugs
287b8(mdo sde): / rnams mnga' ba khyed la zhu// 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu// lha mi rnams kyis mchod pa khyed la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci smang 'dzum ston pa// sbyin dang dul la brtson
288a1(mdo sde): 'khyod la ru// tshul khrims yongs su dag gyur khyod la du// bzong pa'i stobs dang stobs rtsol khyod la su// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad
288a2(mdo sde): 'dzum ston pa// brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la nu// bsam gtan mngon shes dgyes pa khyod la zhu// shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs
288a3(mdo sde): pa ci slang 'dzum ston pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyed la nu// rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu// dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa
288a4(mdo sde): slad 'dzum sten pa// srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la// / spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la nu// bdud rtsi da chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs
288a5(mdo sde): pa ci slang 'dzum ston pa// bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod lan// ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'jom pa khyod la nu/ bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyod la nu/ 
288a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa ci slang 'dzum ston pa// stobs bcu dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu// the tshom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la nu// yon tan stong gis rgyas pa khyod la zhu// de skad
288a7(mdo sde): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyed kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras rnams nga las dge ba'i
288a8(mdo sde): rtsab bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bas me pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur zhing / skyes pa'i dngos po thob par bya
288b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ nga'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ma'amatshan
288b2(mdo sde): slas brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dis 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas dga' ldan
288b3(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
288b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na/ brnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun 'gro ba byed par
288b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad la yang rim gyi brnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kun bgro bar byed par 'gyur
288b6(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu rdzogs par byas nas gang gi tshe mo 'am tsa'i rgyal po ljon pa bla na
288b7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshede dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
288b8(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag
289a1(mdo sde): cag lasangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad tri shul bkum mo// bde 'gro thams cad kyi shul rnam par sbyangs
289a2(mdo sde): so bdag cag byang chub kyi shul la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag chos kyi gter bstan to// bdag cag ye shes kyi sa la bkod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar mdzad/ 
289a3(mdo sde): do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to// thabs la mkhas pa bstan to// bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du stsal to// chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga'
289a4(mdo sde): bar mdzad do// dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba sgo dab pas yang dag par gzeng bstod do// chos zad mo bzod pa la dga' bar mdzad do// bdag cag phyir mi ldog
289a5(mdo sde): pa'i sa la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa gzo ba lags kyi byas pa rmi gzob ma lags kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
289a6(mdo sde): sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mkhan na/ gzhan gyis lan ljon par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang tsa 'tshal/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di
289a7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ mal mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'da'i mngon
289a8(mdo sde): nad ces bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpe'i dge 'dun ni rdo skad cig tu 'byung / longs spyod dang yangs su spyad pan ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ de sramams can bkod pa dang / 
289b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni co 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas
289b2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi
289b3(mdo sde): zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas te/ sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas/ lha dang mo dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dun par
289b4(mdo sde): byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du/ bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ba
289b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sngon chad ma mdzad pa'i 'dzum pa mthong nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas
289b6(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu
289b7(mdo sde): bcad pas gsol pa/ bde bor gshegs pa'i 'dzum pa ci 'dra ba// de ring phyung ste thug med pa yi zhing // rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang ga'i klung mtha' yas// khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yong ma/ 
289b8(mdo sde): mthong // tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba 'ang // mi dbang gzi brjid kyi ni zil du rlag/ 'dzum mdzad 'di'i rgya ni lung bstan gsol// su yi ched du
290a1(mdo sde): dpa'o khyod kyis 'od phyung bas// 'dir ni ngan song gsum ni byang chub yan lag rdzogs// chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnams kyi dogs bsol// mi rnams
290a2(mdo sde): kyi ni yid gnyis ma las par ni 'khum// 'khor kun dga' bas rtog bgyid na// su slad de ring 'dzum pa bstan// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su
290a3(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor ba byas te/ rang gi stan la 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzigs nas/ cha
290a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyed mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang / rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang / rnam pa 'di lta bu
290a5(mdo sde): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong / ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// 
290a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
290a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med ces bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
290a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
290b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // kun dga' di 'jig rten gyi khams zla badrim med pa de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ bai n+d+ha / rab
290b2(mdo sde): las grub pa lta bur snang ba/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ mching bu med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par 'gyur te/ 
290b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nam mkha' la khang
290b4(mdo sde): pabartsegs pa na longs spyod do// de dag na mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas pa na/ bai DUr+ya dkar po las grub pa'i sa chen po der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi
290b5(mdo sde): rgyal po snang ba de'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ro// deng / gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs pa rnyan lta bu'o zhes dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
290b6(mdo sde): dpa' gang chos gang la the tsom za ba na/ de de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar gyur pa de la nu bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la zhus pa'i lung
290b7(mdo sde): bstan pas sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na
290b8(mdo sde): grong dang grong khyer dang / grang rdal dang / ldangs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal ba'i ba brang la khor yod par ma 'gyur ro// sems can dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' 'a kha
291a1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa na 'khod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bud med du gdags pa'ang med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang ba
291a2(mdo sde): snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas su gdags pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i zas can du
291a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na theg pa gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la nges par 'gyur ba dag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul
291a4(mdo sde): khrims log par zhugs pa'am/ lta ba log par zhugs pa 'am/ cho ga log par zhugs pa 'am/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro// 
291a5(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad ni nan tan dang ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur/ ba sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam bdud kyi ris
291a6(mdo sde): kyi lha 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i srid/ 
291a7(mdo sde): yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming du btags pa tsam dang / 'du shes can tsam ma gtogs lha dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro// 
291a8(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyod pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan tan gyi rgyal/ 
291b1(mdo sde): bopor snang ba de yang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir/ bar gyi bskal pa bcu thams tshang bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
291b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar 'di nga'i 'og tu
291b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya
291b4(mdo sde): ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur dab bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs
291b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nas/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bar gyi
291b6(mdo sde): bskal pa der yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi bskal pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba
291b7(mdo sde): zhes brjod do// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ 
291b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang la shing rta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang pa rgya cher spel ba dang / dge/ 
292a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i'aphyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'ang
292a2(mdo sde): ngadag gi smras so// chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang // dri ma med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na// de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor gyur// rmi lam bzhin
292a3(mdo sde): du mthong ba cung zad med// thams cad med de gzung med gso ba dang gsog/ chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skye ba med// la la sgyu ma'i rta dang
292a4(mdo sde): glang chen dang / shing rta dpung bu chung dang gzhon mthong ba// dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar// phung po 'di dag sgra 'dra snying po med// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba rngas pa bzhin
292a5(mdo sde): tshor ba 'di ni chu'i chu bur 'dra// 'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs// 'dus byas thams cad chu shing snyi po med// srid gsum 'di na sems yid rnam par shes/ 
292a6(mdo sde): rgyal bas de bzhin rgyu 'dra gsog tu gsung // gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skye ba med// khams bzhi po 'di chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang // skye
292a7(mdo sde): mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang // chos 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin// rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang // de bzhin tshul khrims
292a8(mdo sde): rnam dag tshul khrims dang // rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad// stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag/ bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang // de ltar shes rab
292b1(mdo sde): chags med ma spos par// rang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur pa de// pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin// bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam// nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag
292b2(mdo sde): zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi// lam 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu ni// bsdu ba bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di// rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs// 'dzin pa med
292b3(mdo sde): cing rnam rtog gang med pa// de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin// sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med// srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do// dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar// 
292b4(mdo sde): gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// de ni gang du'ang ba/ dag med rlom sems meng // gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa// sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal
292b5(mdo sde): ldan// chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra// gang du'ang mi 'ong/ nam yang 'gro mi 'gyur// chos dbyings 'di yi gnas par rig nas ni// rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas
292b6(mdo sde): gang na'ang yod pa'am med pa med mod kyi// rgyu las brten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na// mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni// sems kyi khri shing de ltar shes par bya// rlung ni ni
292b7(mdo sde): mkha' mi chags rgyu ba bzhin// gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas// nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur ro// 
292b8(mdo sde): lus ni rtsig pargya dang le ma 'dra// bems po rje med rdo shing ngan pa ltar// de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas// lus kyi ches la gnas par mi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang
293a1(mdo sde): 'dra ri dang phug gi brag cha lta bu ste// de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa// sgra rnams kun la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags med// bdag ni na mkha'i ngos
293a2(mdo sde): gnas mi ltung ste// mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin// chos 'di na mkha' 'dra ba rab tu bsgoms nas ni// de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas// bskal pa brgya
293a3(mdo sde): phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni// ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig/ chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' 'drar shes pa// de sreg bskal tshe zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro// ri dang ri
293a4(mdo sde): ra' khor khor yug ri// de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnam sa kun// na mkha'i ngas kyis phye bar rig nas de/ rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i nang du 'gro// sa dang chu dang med/ 
293a5(mdo sde): rlung dag dang // sa gzhi 'di dag na mkha'i ngos mnyam par/ dpa'i tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag/ mkhas las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro// srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi
293a6(mdo sde): bag/ bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa// de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang // sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med// rang 'byung ba ni mtshan ma mchog ma yin// sems kyi chos kyi
293a7(mdo sde): gzugs kyis rab tu phye// sems dang yid ni mtshungs par dben par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam// sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad pa spyod cing // dge ba
293a8(mdo sde): brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni// byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa// grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur// chos rnams kun na rang yul yongs dag ste/ 
293b1(mdo sde): mtha' las phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam// mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa// yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur// bdag ni gzugs min tsher min 'du shes min// 
293b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma yin rnam par shes med kyang // byang chub khong du chud pas bdag lung bstan// phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan// bzod pa gang zhig bzod ma nas zho yis// 
293b3(mdo sde): skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra min la// mtshungs med mo skye ba la bzod pa na// mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to// chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam// bdag ni
293b4(mdo sde): bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te// stong pa nam mkha' 'dra dba'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang ba bzhin no// zad par bya phyir zad par shes mi nus// mi zad
293b5(mdo sde): pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur// zad pa'i sgo yi chos rnams kun ma skyes// bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ste/ na to// mtshan mod gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de/ 
293b6(mdo sde): yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol// ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min// de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan// gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na// 
293b7(mdo sde): chos lam tshul la mo mnyam sbyor ma yin// sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin// chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mnyam// khyed cag thams cad sa yi steng na/ 
293b8(mdo sde): 'khod// bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas na// srid pa gsum na chags med ye shes 'jug/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgya
294a1(mdo sde): po ljon pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ steng gi bar snang las babs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'dral phyag 'tshal te/ 
294a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi ched du byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub
294a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma smras pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i
294a4(mdo sde): slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems te/ mi 'am ci
294a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo// de
294a6(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
294a7(mdo sde): 'das mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
294a8(mdo sde): kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgyas pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la
294b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ 
294b2(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus
294b3(mdo sde): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug nur gyur te/ thams cad kyang / 
294b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa bla na med pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha sta/ ga go/ de'i tshe'i tshad na la bye ba phrag drug cu thub par
294b5(mdo sde): gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya ba de yang bai DUr+ya las grub pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i
294b6(mdo sde): ris lta bur khang khyim dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bza' ba dang btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan
294b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa med par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i
294b8(mdo sde): slas ni stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do// de'i bu ni stong tham pa yod de// dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa yan lag ma tshig gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go/ 
295a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu rgyal pos 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug rdul/ lo bye ba tham par yid/ 
295a2(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang / na bza' dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas
295a3(mdo sde): nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsabs nye bar bstan nas/ bud med bzhi stong po de dag dang bu stong
295a4(mdo sde): bo de dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems pa skyed do// de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang
295a5(mdo sde): bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung dro de la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gzhan zhig na bu thu/ khe brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas/ 
295a6(mdo sde): rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ skra dang kha spu dregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // den rgyal po'i bu de dag
295a7(mdo sde): gis kyang rim gyis bu thu bo re re rgyal po bcug nas/ nga'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to// 
295a8(mdo sde): rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chung snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te/ de ni chos kyi rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med
295b1(mdo sde): pa dang / mtshan cha med par chos 'thun par dbang byed du bcug go// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal pos 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas rdzog ma dang bar
295b2(mdo sde): ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya bar
295b3(mdo sde): gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur pa lta na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa
295b4(mdo sde): 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni ltar/ daphyags bcun byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// rigs
295b5(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de las bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// de bla na
295b6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad de'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar
295b7(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
295b8(mdo sde): rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung yang bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol
296a1(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang / 
296a2(mdo sde): ldan pas/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i rgyu bas na/ yun ring du lags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to// / 
296a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs
296a4(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mthong ba dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can tham sa cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud zad pa/ 'gags pa bral
296a5(mdo sde): ba rnam par gyur pa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyu da de dag byung ba dang rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ 
296a6(mdo sde): lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams
296a7(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa'am/ lung ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams
296a8(mdo sde): cad rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud dang sems
296b1(mdo sde): can gyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba
296b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar
296b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di
296b4(mdo sde): bshad pa na/ srog chags su 'bum gyis bla na med pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// / de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
296b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur nas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ 
296b6(mdo sde): rang gi khang khyim dang 'khor gyi khyams de yang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par
296b7(mdo sde): gsol/ de na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / 
296b8(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas
297a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
297a2(mdo sde): dag par zhugs su lags kyang / bdag cag ni sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dang gar la rab tu chags me tog dang / spos dang / gdug pa dang / byug pa
297a3(mdo sde): dang / phye ma bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na/ ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
297a4(mdo sde): chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'a ngas kyis bdag cag la stsal par gsol// de skad ces/ gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
297a5(mdo sde): po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzhin bzang dag de'i phyin chad sol snyan dang / glu dbyang sa de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug
297a6(mdo sde): cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / 
297a7(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / 
297a8(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med pa'i sgra dang / gang zag med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang bzod/ 
297b1(mdo sde): ba'i ng+ga dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / 'ongs pa med pa
297b2(mdo sde): sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod
297b3(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang
297b4(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gnag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang po'i sgra dang / stobs dkyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag go sgra dang / lam gyi sgra dang / 
297b5(mdo sde): zhi gnas kyi sgra dang / lhag ma mthong gi sgra dang thabs kyi sgra dang bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang / sems canayongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud tshar bcad pa'i
297b6(mdo sde): sgra dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa'i sgra dang / 
297b7(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i rtsa bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang / lbu ba'i dang / chu'i chu sbur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing gi phung po dang / sgyu ma dang / 
297b8(mdo sde): snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos sgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzang dag de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las gang gis
298a1(mdo sde): khyed pag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams bsgrub par 'gyur de bu lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
298a2(mdo sde): 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis
298a3(mdo sde): shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
298a4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin/ tu yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
298a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung
298a6(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do// de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag gi go cha gang gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du
298a7(mdo sde): gzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no// grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar nga da ltar bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yong su bzung
298a8(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba yin par rig par bya'o// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gso sman dang / 
298b1(mdo sde): yo byad rnams kyis rim gror byas pa ni sems can thams cad la rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar bar nye bar bsgrub pa ni/ sems can thams cad
298b2(mdo sde): la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can thams/ 
298b3(mdo sde): cad la snying rje chen po rab tu 'thab pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang
298b4(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dadri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / thams dacad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par
298b5(mdo sde): gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po/ kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gto ra to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di snyam du bsam/ 
298b6(mdo sde): tebacom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bdag gi gnas bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol gshegs pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag
298b7(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de yang
298b8(mdo sde): bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas de ltar na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas yid las byung ba'i rin po che sna
299a1(mdo sde): bdun gyi shing rta 'phang du dpag tshad ldapa khyon du dpag tshad lngab// kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis
299a2(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ rin po che'i skud pas mig mangs ris su bres pa mngon par sprul nas/ shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba/ blta/ 
299a3(mdo sde): na sdug pa/ 'bang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos bu zung brgya stong mang po bkram pa mngon par sprul/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor
299a4(mdo sde): mngon par sprul te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan ci/ nga zham ring du 'brang ba brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'dzi/ garten skyong ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa
299a5(mdo sde): dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de 'i steng du ni rigs par sprul to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba ldan pas de lta bu'i shing rta bkod par sprul nas thal ma sbyar
299a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan bshams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu
299a7(mdo sde): bzhugs su gsol de nas seng ge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs byang chub sems dpa' dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas mi'am/ 
299a8(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ shing rta bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la spags nas/ de nas mi 'am ci'o mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad
299b1(mdo sde): dang bu brgyad stong po de dag dang / gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang / mi 'am tsa'i rgyal po ljon pa nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing
299b2(mdo sde): rta la btags te/ nam mkha' las drangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la mi'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong
299b3(mdo sde): bo de dag gis sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs nas/ mchod pa byed de mdun du 'dong zhing / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// mi 'am ci mo
299b4(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong po// gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag / sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing // yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid// mtshan
299b5(mdo sde): mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur// gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs/ bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa// yon tan mtsho
299b6(mdo sde): chen khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra// g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong // ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g.yo ba// de ltar khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul
299b7(mdo sde): stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mnga'// bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang lha mon dbang
299b8(mdo sde): dang srin po dang // brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha// nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od// khyod kyi mdzod spus 'od ni mi mchis gyur// shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan/ 
300a1(mdo sde): sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// 'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tsha'o// 
300a2(mdo sde): bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba po// bden pa bzhi la bsgom zhing dpyod mdzad pa// rdzu 'phrul bzhi'i stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa
300a3(mdo sde): mdzes// bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' zhing // rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par gzhag/ legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang // khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma lags// 
300a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan// zhing brgya dag tu thog/ sa pa med par mchi// sgra de sems can gang gis thos gyur pa// de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur/ 
300a5(mdo sde): sems can kha lo sgyur ba spu gcig tu// stong gsum rgya mtsho' chab rnams zhugs gyur kyang // sems can rags pa na mas la'ang mi gnod la// rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yang ma
300a6(mdo sde): gda'// stong gsum gyi nor ribar bo dag/ phyag gcig gi ni mthil dung zhaganas su// ning mang bye bdag tu gshegs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis// bska
300a7(mdo sde): pa bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas nas// brtul zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang // sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu brlabs/ 
300a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba mngal bsnyen bkur mdzad// de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung // thugs rnga ldan zhing 'gro ba'i dzin gyi phyir// khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim
300b1(mdo sde): gro ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // rim gro bgyis pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags// dogs lta bur snyoms shing mi g.yo ste// 'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad+ma bzhin// chos
300b2(mdo sde): rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang // chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang // dbu ba rdos 'dra rmi lam klog 'dra dang // smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen// ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag
300b3(mdo sde): bdag ma mchis// gdod nas stong zhing mi g.yo rjes ma mchis// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis// dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams
300b4(mdo sde): las// byung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na// de phyir khyod ni rdzo dgas sangs rgyas shes bgyi// gang dag 'dren pa mthong / 
300b5(mdo sde): zhing thos gyur pa// de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te// srog chag sa de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags// bdag cag rnams
300b6(mdo sde): kyis gang zag dam pa khyod// kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su// byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te// gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam
300b7(mdo sde): mkha' la ni rtag tu nus kyang gda'// rgya mtsho'i cha ba ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'// nyi zla mkha' las sor ni ltung gda' yi// sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi gda'// de
300b8(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong
301a1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / byardo
301a2(mdo sde): phung po'i ri yang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta ngas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der gshegs so// de nas rgyal po 'i ba
301a3(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer na/ grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal pa dang / khyim bdag du bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
301a4(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ me tog dang bdug pa dang / spros dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
301a5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / bdan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsu phyir rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer rten po nas byung te/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bcom ldan 'das ga/ 
301a6(mdo sde): la ba der dong ngo // ljon pa'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do// mi 'am ci mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grags par gyur te// 
301a7(mdo sde): de ltar mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan
301a8(mdo sde): 'das shing rta de las babs nas/ rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
301b1(mdo sde): 'khor kyang shing rta de las babs nas / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te/ rang rang gi stan la
301b2(mdo sde): 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
301b3(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / 
301b4(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
301b5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'ad sa la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyal
301b6(mdo sde): tam/ bde ba reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
301b7(mdo sde): 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
301b8(mdo sde): po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon bslas dang bcas bu dang bcas g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang
