302a1(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur// sangs
302a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi nong du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du sla ba dran par
302a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ 
302a4(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi da'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yo dngas su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyi rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis/ 
302a5(mdo sde): khyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho bos kyang 'thob pa ra 'dod do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod
302a6(mdo sde): dang sems can thams cad la dbul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa de gang yang med
302a7(mdo sde): do// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi skyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams
302a8(mdo sde): cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de yang sems can
302b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang / 
302b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi phyir 'drang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gis phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/ de gnyis las khyed kyis dam/ 
302b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos thos nas/ des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ling tog chen pos mtshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas/ khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po
302b4(mdo sde): thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyed da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob/ cing gnas pas khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
302b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te/ ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge 'bru cig thos pa yang ba rjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 
302b6(mdo sde): kun tu bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
302b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces
302b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
303a1(mdo sde): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lamanye bar rton pa'i snod
303a2(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod du lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i
303a3(mdo sde): snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / 
303a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang
303a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rjed / chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang / rjes su
303a6(mdo sde): chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa tshol/ 
303a7(mdo sde): bas ngoms mi myong ba dang / mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la
303a8(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa'i chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i
303b1(mdo sde): snod gzungs dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod
303b2(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba srung ba'i snod zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa thams
303b3(mdo sde): cad yongs su spong ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrugs shing phyed par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
303b4(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod phyir pa mi ldog pa'i sa te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa 'u sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang
303b5(mdo sde): ldan na/ chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstan pa/ 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig
303b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces
303b7(mdo sde): smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyi 'khor 'di skyo bar gyur du 'ong gis khyod rang gi gnas su
303b8(mdo sde): song shig/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
304a1(mdo sde): ni skyob bzod par brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags/ ji ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba lags
304a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
304a3(mdo sde): gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pas
304a4(mdo sde): mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste8/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'a dri dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// 
304a5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhig/ nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med
304a6(mdo sde): pa de yang bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang
304a7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa bsogs pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub/ 
304a8(mdo sde): ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/ mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// 
304b1(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skyabs skyabs su nyan thos kyi theg
304b2(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa dang / skyabs skyabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang dag par
304b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am
304b4(mdo sde): ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang / ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu nyen nas kyang byang chub
304b5(mdo sde): kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'dod pa dang / lus dang srog kyang 'dor zhing da ma pa'i chos srung ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing
304b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am
304b7(mdo sde): ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba mthong na yongs su skyong ba dang / bsod
304b8(mdo sde): snyoms byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub
305a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
305a2(mdo sde): na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spong ba la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed cing / zhe 'gras pa'i sems med la/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer
305a3(mdo sde): med de/ tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms
305a4(mdo sde): shing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya che rab tu ston cing / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub
305a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu/ mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu
305a6(mdo sde): skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed
305a7(mdo sde): par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing / gong du mi tshol ba ste/ mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 
305a8(mdo sde): yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgo dang
305b1(mdo sde): gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge
305b2(mdo sde): ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir de la mi chags pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mo skyo bar rig par bya'o// de nas
305b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'dis/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la lan btab nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub
305b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi pa bsgrub pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam/ rgyal po sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lag so// bcom ldan
305b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar/ spyad par bya'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom
305b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal
305b7(mdo sde): po ljon pa la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu
305b8(mdo sde): bskang ba'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rang gis pi bang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so// pi bang de blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / 
306a1(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ pi bang gi sgra de las seng ges bsgyings pa ltar shing sa la du ma g.yos pa'i sgrar byang chub sems
306a2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang // chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su skyo ba
306a3(mdo sde): med par spyod// bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang // sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgya chen mo yin spyod pa med// brtan pa
306a4(mdo sde): spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyo// da pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyad pa yin// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa
306a5(mdo sde): dang dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang // bya chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ser sna med par spyad pa yin// tshul khrims spyod pa mnyams skyed pa dang // lus
306a6(mdo sde): dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'chal pa'i spyod pa med// brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang // khwa skyon yongs su gcod pa'i/ 
306a7(mdo sde): spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnong sems med par spyod pa yin// brtson 'grus skyed dang mthu rnams sbed pa dang // 'khor bar yongs su mi skye spyod pa dang // byang chub
306a8(mdo sde): mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang // lus dang sems na rab tu dben spyang dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyang ba/ 
306b1(mdo sde): de dag g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang // chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag shes rab 'chal
306b2(mdo sde): pa'i spyod pa med// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje sprod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag khro ba'i tha ba med par spyod// stong pa spyod dang / 
306b3(mdo sde): rab tu dben spyod dang // mtshan ma med pa yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon pa med par spyod pa yin// yang dag nyid dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang // shes pa
306b4(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog go / dad pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang chags pa med par spro// da// dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng ba med
306b5(mdo sde): pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// ded g.yongs su gcod pa med par spyod// bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa
306b6(mdo sde): dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag chags pa med par spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod pa// byang chub mchog
306b7(mdo sde): gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin// chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod
306b8(mdo sde): pa/ de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang // mtha' kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang
307a1(mdo sde): bar spyod pa med// dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang // nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongasu
307a2(mdo sde): gdung bar spyod pa med// bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun la 'jig med mchog spyod dang // byang chub mchog go spyod pa gang skyed pa// de dag smon lam spyod pa med pa yin// nyim
307a3(mdo sde): spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad+ma lta bur gos pa med spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang // dkar
307a4(mdo sde): po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang // byang chub mchogadage spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag bdud rnams sder bcas sgra dag par byed// mchog spyod pa dang khyad pa'i 'phags spyod dang / 
307a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags nyes pa thab gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog na/ spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med/ lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes rab mig na
307a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag kun tu rtog pa spyod pa med// dul ba skyed dang rab tu gi spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub
307a7(mdo sde): mchog gi spyad pa dag pa dang // de dag lha dang mi ni mang pos bstod// 'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa
307a8(mdo sde): gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa dang // dpa' ba spyad dang shin tu brtan spyod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams 'jigs par byed spyod dang // byang chub mchog go spyad pa gang spyad pa// de dag
307b1(mdo sde): byang chub snying por gnol ba yin// gzung ba spyod dang don yong spyod pa dang // gzugs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog ga spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang ma rig
307b2(mdo sde): spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dben rgyung dang // rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog go spyod pa gang spyad pa// de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin// gtso ba
307b3(mdo sde): spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang // 'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dman pa la ni spyod pa med// rigs pa spyod dang thabs
307b4(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan bde las log par spyod par dang // byang chub mchog go spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag/ mi shes spyod pa med pa yin// lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta
307b5(mdo sde): spyo dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs ba med par spyod pa yin// thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa
307b6(mdo sde): dang // dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ye shes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i tshigs su
307b7(mdo sde): bcad pa mngon bsgrub pa 'di po bang gi sgra de las byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang / rgyal po'i
307b8(mdo sde): khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
308a1(mdo sde): sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o// nan tan gyis/ 
308a2(mdo sde): bsgrub par bya'o// sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par 'dzin tu stsal bar bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po/ 
308a3(mdo sde): ljon pa 'gror gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bu dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ slas dang bcas/ gnyen mdab dang bcas/ 'khor dang
308a4(mdo sde): bcas ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'a tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor/ dab byas te/ bzod pa gsol nas/ sil snyan dkrol/ 
308a5(mdo sde): me tog gi char phab/ 'od zer gyi dra ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'ang sa kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid
308a6(mdo sde): la/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
308a7(mdo sde): ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ke'u shi ka/ mo'am ni'i rgyal po ldan pas
308a8(mdo sde): khyod 'ba' shig zil gyis gnan pa ma yin gyi/ ko'u shika/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa ma gtogs par/ gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
308b1(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zil gyis non to// de ci'i phyir
308b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
308b3(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis non to// ko'u shi ka/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis mi non to// gang byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis
308b4(mdo sde): gnon par sems pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung
308b5(mdo sde): ngo/ de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sang sa rgyas 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po ba rgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ 
308b6(mdo sde): mchi ma blags nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams
308b7(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu/ lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// yab
308b8(mdo sde): 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la bla na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed pa de ni sems
309a1(mdo sde): can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par
309a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o// yab skyon med pa la zhugs te/ rgyud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste/ theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa la bgyir ci mchis// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi
309a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu las stong tham pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
309a4(mdo sde): 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa// bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na btar ba ni bdag
309a5(mdo sde): la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa' gyur ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
309a6(mdo sde): las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa/ chung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
309a7(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang bdag gis thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bsgrubs pas/ chos de thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu/ 
309a8(mdo sde): 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa'adage ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams kyis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems
309b1(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ 
309b2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po
309b3(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ 
309b4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyi/ da la rnam pa rtse ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thab/ sa la mkhas pa la rnam par rtse ba dang / mngon par shes pa lngas
309b5(mdo sde): ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sem sa dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos
309b6(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po
309b7(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub tshol yang bu so rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshe la yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / skye
309b8(mdo sde): mched rnams la byang chub chol yang / skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub chol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma/ 
310a1(mdo sde): yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer
310a2(mdo sde): srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
310a3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang / dus su ma mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas chos
310a4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings su 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa de nyid kyi rjes su song bas na mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtog/ dpa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po
310a5(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bsta/ na pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ma
310a6(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis
310a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs
310a8(mdo sde): 'di gzung ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags so// bcom ldan 'das/ 
310b1(mdo sde): a la la ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / don bzang po dang / tshig 'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs
310b2(mdo sde): 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sgo ma bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang da chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten
310b3(mdo sde): nas 'bum gyur tu skyes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa/ blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mchis pa tha cad la zhugs par
310b4(mdo sde): gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta buni chos snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i
310b5(mdo sde): snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lnga dang ldan pa/ chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
310b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
310b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro// kun
310b8(mdo sde): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / stong phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye/ 
311a1(mdo sde): ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
311a2(mdo sde): snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
311a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i
311a4(mdo sde): shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bro gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos
311a5(mdo sde): pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan du ga la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor
311a6(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don tu gnyer ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / byams
311a7(mdo sde): pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa/ 
311a8(mdo sde): kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 
311b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs
311b2(mdo sde): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gang gis snga dro 'dus kyi che/ steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di don pa che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan
311b3(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir mo 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ 
311b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang / phye ma/ red kyi dus dang / nam gyi cha stong dang / nam gyi gung thung dang / tho rangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/ 
311b5(mdo sde): khams thams cad la rin pa che sna bdun gyis yongs su pa/ ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 'ardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byin pa dang / rnam
311b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di sa bus la gcig gam/ la brgya'am/ la stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na/ kun dga' bod ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bum de gni de las bas/ 
311b7(mdo sde): nams mang du skyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ste/ tshang ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig
311b8(mdo sde): bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung ba de yang chang ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bul pa/ kun dga' ba khyod mos
312a1(mdo sde): par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub don du gnyer ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang / sems can
312a2(mdo sde): rab tu thar par bya ba don tu gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
312a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na/ gang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// 
312a4(mdo sde): las tha na/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog pa'am/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang ston na/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni
312a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyis phan 'dogs pa de ni phan 'dogs pa
312a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi gding ba de ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
312a7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni/ lus brtan pa byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems
312a8(mdo sde): dpa' nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// byang
312b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni// yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan
312b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug
312b3(mdo sde): chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis brjod par 'gyur ba dang / 
312b4(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams bsrung bar 'gyur/ ba dang / las byas nas bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / 
312b5(mdo sde): na ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gra gas pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcu ra grags par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
312b6(mdo sde): glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su srung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
312b7(mdo sde): kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral
312b8(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chos nyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ba dang / sangs
313a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
313a2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid can gyi gzungs kyi sa bon sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mkhas pas g.yog bya bar 'gyur
313a3(mdo sde): ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten
313a4(mdo sde): gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de chos kyi gter zad mi shes pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin ba de/ 
313a5(mdo sde): yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnam sa kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
313a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzungs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/ 
313a7(mdo sde): mos par bgyi/ kun bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don tu gnyer ba'i slad du'o// de nas
313a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ ko'u shi ka/ khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ nga'i 'dun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legaso leg so// 
313b1(mdo sde): ko'u shi ka/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nga'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur/ lha rnams ni rgyal bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir
313b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos yang dag phul yin te/ ko'u shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka/ gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba
313b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo // ko'u shi ka/ gang mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'jed
313b4(mdo sde): kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma mchi sra ba gtang ste/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / yul
313b5(mdo sde): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar 'chi bar bgyi'o// mchis nas kyang chos
313b6(mdo sde): smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
313b7(mdo sde): skyong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di 'byung ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po bzhi po bdag
313b8(mdo sde): cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang / bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o// 
314a1(mdo sde): bdag cag gi 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lam dad pa de dag kyang / ci nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan bsrung ba'is du brtson pa
314a2(mdo sde): 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la brtson pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan
314a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa srungs ma mchis pa de dag bsrung ba'i ched du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kha ton bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
314a4(mdo sde): dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin lags pa dang / ga zhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams
314a5(mdo sde): shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ta ra be a ra be/ a no pe/ sar pe/ hu lu ma hA hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ A bad Te/ bi kad Te/ ba rits+tshe dA ni/ ni grih+Na ti/ be g+hA ta ni/ ing Ti ing Ti/ 
314a6(mdo sde): bod Ti bidi Ti/ ad tshe g+hats+tsha/ mA ra ni gra ha na sarba bar pra bA di ni gra ha na/ sarba ming rA pra yA TA nan ni gra ha na/ sarba b+hU ta ni gra ha na/ bud d+ha ha ba ra ni/ dA d+ha ma ni yan ta shA ya/ bud d+ha na bud d+he bar ni tA na/ tsa tur/ 
314a7(mdo sde): ma hA rA dza nir de sha na/ man tra ba lan/ a ba tA ra pri krI nA na gri hA ya// de nas bcom ldan 'as a byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal pa/ 
314a8(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa dag/ ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ci nas yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / nub par mi 'gyur bya ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis kyi
314b1(mdo sde): lag tu gzhag go gtad do// de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// 
314b2(mdo sde): rgyal bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba
314b3(mdo sde): dang / yongasu 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu bzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe srang ma'i dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / thos nas
314b4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid ba dang / 'chang ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byam sa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi
314b5(mdo sde): rlabs lags par rigs par bgyi'o// de nas bdud sdig ca na 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de/ gdong/ las mchi ma zag cing nga ro phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
314b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa de la ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so// 
314b7(mdo sde): gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyi 6/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/ sems can thams
314b8(mdo sde): cad kyi ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsung ba des bdag mya ngan gyi zung rngu dang ldan zhing bdag rnyis par gyur pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyag brkyang bsul du gsol// gang thos
315a1(mdo sde): pas bdag mya ngan gyi zung rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yang mi gsung bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig
315a2(mdo sde): can khyod dang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni meng / gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis mya ngan ma byed/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ sdig can 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 
315a3(mdo sde): sa'i steng nas rdul blangs pa rnyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so// sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos te/ de dag thams cad ni
315a4(mdo sde): khyod dang 'thun no// sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang ma/ thun gyis de bas na sdig can dga' bar gyis chos kyi rnam dgrangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang
315a5(mdo sde): chub la yang dag par zhugs// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgya khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
315a6(mdo sde): med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa
315a7(mdo sde): drug tu g.yos nas snang chen pos 'jig rten khyab par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan brgyad stong dag ni ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol lo// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni
315a8(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang las kye ma bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas/ 
315b1(mdo sde): sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'don grong khyer bA ra na ser chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad bde bas ches mchog go/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin
315b2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
315b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
315b4(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyed
315b5(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan
315b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
315b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
315b8(mdo sde): rdzogs s+ho// zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun po dang / ban d+he dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing // zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bi krAn ta tsan
316a1(mdo sde): tade ba pu tra pa ri bring tsha/ nA ma mA hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam
316a2(mdo sde): po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
316a3(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khro'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / 
316a4(mdo sde): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po stobs chen
316a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa na mkha' lding gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa
316a6(mdo sde): 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag bzangs la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po
316a7(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma/ 
316a8(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag la sogs pa 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos
316b1(mdo sde): ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
316b2(mdo sde): ldog pa/ rab rtsal sems kyang 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu rabartsal sems kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo
316b3(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
316b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la/ gras// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba rnam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams lags// ji/ 
316b5(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams ngag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags
316b6(mdo sde): ba ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po 'khor rnam
316b7(mdo sde): kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
316b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags// ji ltar
317a1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes/ 
317a2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
317a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems
317a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dgaka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ 
317a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams la gas// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
317a6(mdo sde): lhag pa'ang rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i slang du sdeng shing bsgrub pal mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams lags
317a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongasu/ 
317a8(mdo sde): smin par brtsi bdag thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems/ 
317b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyipha rol tu
317b2(mdo sde): son pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams
317b3(mdo sde): cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
317b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa mams pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags
317b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar/ na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la
317b6(mdo sde): slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags// de skad ces gsol
317b7(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab rtsal sems leg so legs so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad
317b8(mdo sde): las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas go cha bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa/ ded dpon chen po/ sems can dpag tu med pa'i
318a1(mdo sde): don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa zang bde ba la rab tu 'ged pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dngag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su
318a2(mdo sde): shu ba ni yang khyod legs so// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang
318a3(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
318a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po lag/ ngan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ thabs la maH/ 
318a5(mdo sde): pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa/ don dang chos kyisan bar bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam
318a6(mdo sde): bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i tsha pa shes pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldanan// theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// de la / 
318a7(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/ thabs la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi/ mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong du chud gyur cing // thams cad bskyab phyir rnying rje chen po yangs nga la// gnas pa'i byams pa
318a8(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub par byed gyur la// don dang chos la shin tu mags par 'gyur ba'o// so so yang dag rig la spobs pa tho 'gyur la// byang chub lam la smangon shes dag gis rnam chen// des ni gzhan gyi drangs/ 
318b1(mdo sde): 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i don
318b2(mdo sde): 'grus dang / bsam padag pa'i rtul pa dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su bsgrub pa la yid yang su mi skye ba dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
318b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu gnas pa med gyur cing // bsam pa rnyog pa med cing
318b4(mdo sde): yongasu dag gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing // sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yongs ni skyo// gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad par de yod pa// de ni byang chub
318b5(mdo sde): sems 'byung ba rtsam pa brtan 'gyur zhing // byang chub yan lag lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// rings ngo mo thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems
318b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms
318b7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug pa dang / sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs su bsngo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral/ 
318b8(mdo sde): bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'doms shing // byang chub
319a1(mdo sde): na su sa/  ga tu myu ga 'a dug //  m+b+ha 'du chu nga bya/ 
319a2(mdo sde): na segasas chu cang bye pa thams ca da// rnamam tshang sa byin nying sems parten pa byed pa yin//  bu byang chub sem med pa'i sems dpa' chen batshas pan nga ldazhin/  zhes kyim cha
319a3(mdo sde): med par drung pa rnams son te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byas pa'i byu ba rnams byed cing rgyal gyis byas pa rnam pa mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen la galam nang byin gyis rlob pa med
319a4(mdo sde): la gang thag ding bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid srung su du gyur cing / sems can thams cad mi gtong 'o dbusam padang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las pa
319a5(mdo sde): dgapa 'a ga skyem che drugasas su nas srung bste/ tsham pan bdag/ nga // des 'dis ces byaste/ gis par las byed de dgang rgyal ya nang/ 
319a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin ning do dgas meng la// stong cing skyed yul de dag sems can mi gting shing // chags ba kun lang 'das shang byon gnas pa med// chos mchog bani pa de la shin tu
319a7(mdo sde): gnas pa// shes ngas par brtson cing chags mo byung ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ches pazhi dang ldanan/ shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ 
319a8(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mas
319b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur mo sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bani pa de dag dang // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag
319b2(mdo sde): thos tshol ngoms ming tshul bzhin rtog byed cing // de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa tshol mi byed// nyon mongs sprin 'ang sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur lta// chos nyid tha dad mi byed de dag tshul
319b3(mdo sde): gcig 'jug/ che bdag chos bzhi de sten khyad par 'thob 'gyur zhing // shes rab smon 'das mun bsul zla ltar 'jig rten d+hu// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
319b4(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs/ pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / sems
319b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pa ston pa'i snying rje na na po dang / bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par
319b6(mdo sde): shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos kun chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing // de dag spobs ldan sems
319b7(mdo sde): can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag med ston byed cing // mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyon mongs bdud mang nyams// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po
319b8(mdo sde): dag gis 'jug na// 'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa med// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang / 
320a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ thos pa thams cad mi 'dzin pas thob pa dang mi ldan zhing bsgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / yi ge dang / 
320a2(mdo sde): sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag cha dang mtshungs pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa yongasu tshol zhing dga' mgur/ 
320a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i don la 'jug cing / brjod pa'i don la ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la mi/ 
320a4(mdo sde): rtog pas// byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams// / srid gsum sgra skad dbyangs dang tshig lam gang yod pa// dbrag cha 'drar shes de la don ldan sgra thos nas// don nyid
320a5(mdo sde): rtog cing dga' mgu nyes kun phyir mi 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du med// 'di ni don dang sgra skad thos par gyur pa las// 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed
320a6(mdo sde): cing 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bre mo gtam byed
320a7(mdo sde): pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po la rjes su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad las
320a8(mdo sde): dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gang che skye bo mang po'i dbus su son gyur pa// der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo
320b1(mdo sde): mang ngo 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la// mchi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya// de nas bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi// gtong la yi rang byas nas byang chub bsngo
320b2(mdo sde): bya zhing // gang tshe 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe// der ni dben par gzhol ba rab tu 'dod par bya// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// sangs
320b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thos pa sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de
320b4(mdo sde): bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pra ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nyams gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems mi
320b5(mdo sde): gtong // de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed// dka' blo bde 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug
320b6(mdo sde): de ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan smras bzhin byed 'gyur zhing // rtog brtson mi 'dor rjes 'thun bdag med ci yang med// rtag tu snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing // de ltar/ 
320b7(mdo sde): chos smra de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe
320b8(mdo sde): na bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / bsrungs pa dang / sgrol ba dang / brtul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan
321a1(mdo sde): las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / dgrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos
321a2(mdo sde): ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing / sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'gong bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos 'dod
321a3(mdo sde): cing chos 'dod pas gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston la// dul srungs legs btul shin tu
321a4(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das nas kyang // gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan las// ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor/ par 'dzud// de dag byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa nges gyur/ 
321a5(mdo sde): cing theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed// rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing // sems can rnam/ sa la de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston// lha'i bu byang chub
321a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa
321a7(mdo sde): dang rtag par rgyun tu rab tu dben par gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus dang sems mnyam nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
321a8(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing / dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la// shes pas zab mo'i bzod la nges pa thob gyur cing // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / 
321b1(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pa ste// de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs pa med pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing // de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dra la/ 
321b2(mdo sde): sems can mang po rnams kyang yongs su smin byed 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams yin te/ 
321b3(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod
321b4(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon dbar bsgrubs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mtshan
321b5(mdo sde): med stong pas nges pa'i bsam gtan bzhi sgom zhing // sems can yongs su bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod brtson 'grus thob 'gyur cing / 
321b6(mdo sde): kun tu thabs ldan pha rol phyin pa drug la 'jug/ de ltar spyod mkhas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs pa// de dag bdud bzhi dag las yang dag 'das gyur cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro/ 
321b7(mdo sde): ba mgon med rnams// mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin
321b8(mdo sde): te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib
322a1(mdo sde): pa med pa la sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi pa de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang // 
322a2(mdo sde): rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dga' 'gyur la// rtag tu ying byung chos la bsam bzhugs gyur cing // sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa'i// mkhas pa theg pa che la
322a3(mdo sde): brtan par rab gnas pa// blo rnams dag gis gting dpa ga dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing // chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag sgrub byed pa// de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dngag dka' ba yin// 
322a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bani dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mgos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / 
322a5(mdo sde): bstod pa dang / bde bas khengs pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang mi snyan pa dang / smad pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
322a6(mdo sde): phyir/ phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongs su shes bsrung shing dben par lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rnyed dang snyan dang bstod
322a7(mdo sde): dang bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag lani nims kyang khengs par 'gyur ba med// ma rnyed mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang // de dag pad+ma bzhin du chags med 'jig rten spyod// sems can
322a8(mdo sde): smin par bya phyir phung po yongs spyod cing // phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra la ma rlar shes pa// sems can phan bde'i don tu 'jig rten spyod byed kyang // 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos tshul khrims spos dang / 
322b1(mdo sde): ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med pa dang
322b2(mdo sde): sems can la sems can med pa dang / chos dben pa dang / shes pa chags pa med pas te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs su shes
322b3(mdo sde): gyur cing // sems can sems can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la// chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su rtogs gyur cing // mkha' la lag bzhin shes pa chags pa yod min pa'o// dpa' rnam
322b4(mdo sde): zab mo dag la yongs su spyod byed pa// spyod pa med la rtag tu spyod drar byed gyur cing // 'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang rnams bral bas// sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'// 
322b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi / nga ldan na// chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang // so so
322b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu tha chu / 
322b7(mdo sde): shes pas so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni// yang dag bsngags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su
322b8(mdo sde): ga byang nas// dadang dra ba'i ma rnam mi mangs du ldan pa byed/ dag nan pa 'bras du da pam yin te// de tsu kyang na 'ang nas myang ngan 'a par byed//  bu nga chub
323a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
323a2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing lta ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams thar par byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed
323a3(mdo sde): ba dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba len pa dang / thabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyis nges par byung ba ste/ chos bani/ 
323a4(mdo sde): bo de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas bcings grol byed cing // mtshan med gan ngas shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed// smon pa med la/ 
323a5(mdo sde): gnas shing sems can sprin bya'i phyir// bsams bzhin skye/ zhing gang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis nges byung rnam thar sgor gnas kyang // 'dus ma byas pa'i
323a6(mdo sde): dbyings ni dus min thob mi byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel bzhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams
323a7(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs
323a8(mdo sde): su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams cad la nem nur med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems mnyam chos kyi dbyingasu nges
323b1(mdo sde): par thung gyur cing // de dag rnams kyi sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong mi gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab byung bar// shes nas de las snrel zhing kun tu ston mi byed// chos 'di thams cad
323b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang // ma skyes ma 'gags ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin// lha'i bu bya
323b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang / mtho sa su sku
323b4(mdo sde): bab rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos dpa mi spong ba dang / bral ba'i rgyu skem pa mi spong ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// longs spyod che
323b5(mdo sde): rgyu sbyin pa mi spong de'i 'bras te// mtho ris skye ba'i tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras te// shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras te// rnam grol reg rgyu sgom par byed cing de'i 'bras de
323b6(mdo sde): rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas pa de dag ni// byang chub snying por dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan spyod// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral
323b7(mdo sde): zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar
323b8(mdo sde): yang mi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gag par lta zhing srid pa 'gag par yang mi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nam yang rtag par mi lta chad par
324a1(mdo sde): sung mi byed// des na chos rnams rten byung byed pa po dang ni// tshor ba ba med rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes// mngag nanas na sha'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba// 
324a2(mdo sde): rgyal bkun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang no// rkyen zang de phyir byin chad skye mo 'gyur shes gsungs// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su/ 
324a3(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsags pa la skye ba med pa/ 
324a4(mdo sde): dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'as yangs su tshol pa dang / sems can rnams kyims pa ji lta bde lta bu'i mos pa de'i thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnam
324a5(mdo sde): kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang // der 'di ska ces bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di na sems can rnam/ sal rten// dge dmigs shing 'dod pas yongs su skyo ba med// 
324a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems nan/ 
324a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang / chos ston pa mi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sems dang mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de
324a8(mdo sde): dgad ngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing // rtag tu chos kyis mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag mngon shes lnga po ma zad rtag mig so// rtag tu dran
324b1(mdo sde): ldan bsam pas dang 'dra ba yin// mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing // mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsher 'gyur zhing // byang
324b2(mdo sde): chub mchog phyir myur tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ 
324b3(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang / bden pa bzhi shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de
324b4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bya ste// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po de dag gis gnas byed cing // bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' dbyed la// bden bzhi po dag la 'jigs med dpa'o rnams// 'gro/ 
324b5(mdo sde): bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing // 'chad dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la// pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bde bas mgu
324b6(mdo sde): byed na// de phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ 
324b7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsrungs pa dang / bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags
324b8(mdo sde): pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol son// tshul 'chos med cing rtag tu nges la brtul zhugs
325a1(mdo sde): bzung // nags dang nags 'ad ba gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la// dran ldan bdag bde mo ltos kha na mtho lta// gang la rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yod pa// de dag rtag tu
325a2(mdo sde): sems can pan phyir 'artson 'gyur zhing // de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la// de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gnol 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan
325a3(mdo sde): na/ dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la ma smras pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por
325a4(mdo sde): yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa rnams te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag dang dang ldan la rtul ba brtan lnga/ na zhing // de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro
325a5(mdo sde): bkun la byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing // byang chub ched du 'ongasu sngol mkhas pa ste// de phyir dge ba kun la smras pa yod min zhing // zla ba nya ba'i zlab mkha' la skar ma yi// tshogs kyi dbus na
325a6(mdo sde): gnas pa rnam par mangs bltar// yang dang yang du dge bkun la rnam 'phel 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/ 
325a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / bla rab tu gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/ chos bani pa de dag dang // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
325a8(mdo sde): mkhas pa de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa snying por byed cing blor ba gnas// gang dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed cing // dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang / 
325b1(mdo sde): rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang ldan na/ chos dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
325b2(mdo sde): shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing / nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing / bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs
325b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gre/ shes rab stobs kyis blun
325b4(mdo sde): spangs lha rnams kun dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud rab ni spangs gyur la// spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs dkyis 'khrugs pa med// de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur/ 
325b5(mdo sde): / de phyir myur tu dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// lha'i bu bya'i/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhan/ 
325b6(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bag yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag po ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nga rgyal med cing bla ma gus pas gnas gyur la// kun nas bag yod byang
325b7(mdo sde): chub mchog la 'dun drag cing // bsam pa thag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing // tshul
325b8(mdo sde): dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor de la thal sbyar de la 'dud// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
326a1(mdo sde): po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
326a2(mdo sde): par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i slob pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad ldan zhing / dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ 
326a3(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas rtse// bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs med mi
326a4(mdo sde): dge bag chags kun spangs shing // dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskurathob par 'gyur ba ste// chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas kyu ra ba// de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i yan tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das
326a5(mdo sde): kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bstan pa na// lha dang mi rnams las sre ga chags sa ya nya 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par / gas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa'
326a6(mdo sde): nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ stong gsum gyi
326a7(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing // 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur ro// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu babacing / 
326a8(mdo sde): lha'i si la snyan dag gis sgra yang phyung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang / klu'i me tog gi char rab tu ba bo// lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
326b1(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / a la la chos/ a la la chos a la la chos
326b2(mdo sde): shes lan gsum chad du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas lha'i bu rabartsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
