326b3(mdo sde): dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang / tshig gi rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa de bka' stsal gyis/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi
326b4(mdo sde): don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' se dmas dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa
326b5(mdo sde): rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ga nga gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems sa gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
326b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams
326b7(mdo sde): cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de
326b8(mdo sde): ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
327a1(mdo sde): chen po bsod nams ngag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos/ 
327a2(mdo sde): kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
327a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyad pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
327a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa/ de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no// 
327a5(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang // bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
327a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
327a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba
327a8(mdo sde): rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par bye na/ mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
327b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
327b2(mdo sde): po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta
327b3(mdo sde): na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
327b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rten pa rnams yin// 'jadam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid
327b5(mdo sde): du shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dang / 'asems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam
327b6(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ 
327b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la brten par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
327b8(mdo sde): gsungs pa bzhin smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin// 'jam
328a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de lta na
328a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
328a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
328a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yog par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams
328a5(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar/ na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thal bar dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam
328a6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol
328a7(mdo sde): bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
328a8(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
328b1(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus
328b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
328b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
328b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab
328b5(mdo sde): mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur
328b6(mdo sde): bde lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dang ga dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
328b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang
328b8(mdo sde): bo thams cad la lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chas ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
329a1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
329a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres
329a3(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar bcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la
329a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' da chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar
329a5(mdo sde): byed la mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tsholazhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar
329a6(mdo sde): gcad pa'i phyir/ snrel zhing bsgrub pa mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas
329a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yon 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub
329a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyis bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta
329b1(mdo sde): ba'i rnam pa dang bral nang rten cing 'brel bar 'thung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos
329b2(mdo sde): thams cang bdag med pa byed bdes na/ lha bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen blta pa'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten pang 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams pan no// rtswa
329b3(mdo sde): rlas pa/ 'jam dpal nga ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yangs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal thom smras pa/ 
329b4(mdo sde): 'i bu gang gi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po darnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed pa de lta na dalha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sems can
329b5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba dag ma thabs la mkhas pa rnamasayin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
329b6(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par rtogs pa nyid yin
329b7(mdo sde): bar shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam
329b8(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe
330a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed lta bar byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
330a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
330a3(mdo sde): po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pa rol
330a4(mdo sde): las mthong bar byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
330a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
330a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub semasas dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnam
330a7(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
330a8(mdo sde): 'i bugang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snang ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
330b1(mdo sde): po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis
330b2(mdo sde): bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed spong
330b3(mdo sde): bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
330b4(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yi dan 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi/ 
330b5(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'dra bar shes pa ra byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
330b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
330b7(mdo sde): dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa mi 'byed pa de lta na/ 
330b8(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag snying por gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331a1(mdo sde): po chos dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yina'ajam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
331a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu
331a3(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal
331a4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing / tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul
331a5(mdo sde): gcig shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slong dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras
331a6(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
331a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang bsgrub par mo byed/ chos 'ga' yang sel bar byed pa de
331a8(mdo sde): lhan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma thob med cing / chu yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
331b1(mdo sde): bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams
331b2(mdo sde): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam
331b3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog go char dag mngon par rab tu laba'o// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / 
331b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yid rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshe gra 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur
331b5(mdo sde): cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa rdza lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa mi chod pa yang thob par gyur cig/ ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal
331b6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras te/ legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// 
331b7(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam
331b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du/ khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di las chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba
332a1(mdo sde): ni sred pa dang / 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/ chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni mig
332a2(mdo sde): gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar mi snang ba yin no// chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi
332a3(mdo sde): mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa yin no// 
332a4(mdo sde): chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i
332a5(mdo sde): phyir 'ong ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' na/ ma par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa yin no// 
332a6(mdo sde): chos 'di ni brtag cing sel ba dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni ni mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang
332a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma rtags
332a8(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang / kun tu ma bstan pa yin no// chos 'di ni skye ba dang // 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbying
332b1(mdo sde): su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas med par gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no// chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin/ 
332b2(mdo sde): no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni phas kyi rgol ba thams
332b3(mdo sde): cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin no// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa yin no// 
332b4(mdo sde): chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yi dan no// chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir/ smon pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa'i
332b5(mdo sde): phyir mi gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyi ra mi rten pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi rten pa'i phyir mi ga ba yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir
332b6(mdo sde): bdag med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i
332b7(mdo sde): phyir ma byung ba yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas yang
332b8(mdo sde): dag par rgyun chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi phyed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir na mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin
333a1(mdo sde): na lha'i bu de lta bu la chos kyi dgab pa ji lta bu zhig yod// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgab pa 'di kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no// la ma dpal
333a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu leg so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di'i dgab pa ni gang la lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyis rtul ba med pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni
333a3(mdo sde): gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pas de ni/ sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
333a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sgra dang / skad dang / dbyangs dang tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa
333a5(mdo sde): can yin no// 'bras bu thob pa mngon tu byed pas dge 'dun sde sa su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// nyon/ mongs pa gtan spong ba rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa
333a6(mdo sde): can yin no// skye ba la rten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma dul ba'i sbyin sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can
333a7(mdo sde): yin no// sems can la rten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams
333a8(mdo sde): pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems la nges par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// the tsom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 
333b1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus su 'du shes pa'i tsher
333b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba dang 'jigs par 'du shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i sems
333b3(mdo sde): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lta/ 
333b4(mdo sde): bas stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang/  chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 
333b5(mdo sde): byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam bsgom pa'i sems ni se mas rnyog pa can yin no// sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// kun
333b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'gog pa la zad par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lam bsgom pa la bsgom par 'du shes
333b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin te/ lha'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid lnga sgro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
333b8(mdo sde): dpal sems rnyog pa med pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha' la
334a1(mdo sde): sems chung dadakyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gA'i bu ltar rnam pa' sa sems med pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste/ 
334a2(mdo sde): gang gi sems de 'dra bde ni sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas de la su nig mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
334a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin na// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ 'ja ma dpal gyis
334a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sems na mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal
334a5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni/ lhag par byed/ yin no// mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// // de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang / mi
334a6(mdo sde): sdug pa dang / bdag dang bdag med par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa
334a7(mdo sde): medangapa zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// sgyu ma dang / rmelam dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / brag cha dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos
334a8(mdo sde): rnam par 'jog par byed mtshon par byed/ 'jug par byed/ ston par byed pa/ de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun
334b1(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba la skyon med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba la skyon du lta bar byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta bar
334b2(mdo sde): byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'ong rgyal can rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la ji ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 
334b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang / 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la/ skye ba
334b4(mdo sde): med pa skyed par yang mi byed cing / sgra thams cad kyis skra/ ga par yang mi byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang ba/ zhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de
334b5(mdo sde): ltar shes shing chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lta ga pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur
334b6(mdo sde): gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu nyi khri nyo stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
334b7(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyi stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
334b8(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis stong / 
335a1(mdo sde): yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la
335a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yod pa dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal
335a3(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa/ ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal
335a4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnam pa dar thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni/ rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la
335a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan/ byed pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam
335a6(mdo sde): dpal tsa las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ mtha' ni ngar 'dzin pa yin/ gnas ni khams
335a7(mdo sde): gsum yin/ 'khrugs pa nyon mongs pa rnams yin/ mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de la des lus ni rtsa ba med par shes/ ngar 'dzin pa ni mtha' med par shes/ 
335a8(mdo sde): khams gsum ni gnas med par shes/ nyan mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrugs par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnyis su med par shes pas na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ 
335b1(mdo sde): kho bos de las bsams nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gan med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi
335b2(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so// shA ri'i bus smras pa'ajam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
335b3(mdo sde): dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang
335b4(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / nyo// na mongs pa thams cad la mngon du byed kyang / semadas can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag
335b5(mdo sde): gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong b.rami byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' cha/ sa pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo'u
335b6(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa'
335b7(mdo sde): gang 'dus byas kyang mthob/ 'dus ma byas kyang mthob la/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no// rab 'byor
335b8(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos
336a1(mdo sde): thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol de/ tshul rol dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang mi spong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang / 
336a2(mdo sde): zhing bya ba thams cad kyang ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin no// byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
336a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thams cad kyis spobs par byed cing 'du byed thams cad mi rtog go zhes
336a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/ bskal pa stong phra dag rnams su don dang / tshig dang / yi ge ston pa rnams dkyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang / mthar thug par mi 'gyur/ 
336a5(mdo sde): na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos ston pa yin no// nam grus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa 'basam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
336a6(mdo sde): btsun pa nam gru gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed
336a7(mdo sde): de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du spyod par byed kyang / bsam gtan la gnas pa las g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no// nye bar
336a8(mdo sde): 'khor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams
336b1(mdo sde): gtan dul ba nyid du yang shes par byed cing / ltung ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral la ltung ba dang / nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed cing / de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs
336b2(mdo sde): par yang byed la/ byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no// ma 'gags pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
336b3(mdo sde): lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed la// gzugs
336b4(mdo sde): dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtog par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin no// bku las smras pa/ 
336b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe bya nga chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin
336b6(mdo sde): bar blta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yul med par lta na/ de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dbang po bsrungs pa yin no// sor mo'i 'phreng bas smras pa/ 'jam dngapa la ji ltar na
336b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang 'byang chub rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i byor/ mtshams med pa dang mnyam par lta ba byed na/ 
336b8(mdo sde): de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no// ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'amado sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam
337a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kat+ya'i bu chen po gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing tshig
337a2(mdo sde): gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/ ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / rnam par bya ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed
337a3(mdo sde): pa dang / chos nyid gnas pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ gnas thams cad la yang mi rten pa de ltar ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par byed pa la mkhas pa yin no// 
337a4(mdo sde): gsus po che chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bya chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
337a5(mdo sde): brjod du med pa don gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig ston pa dang / maung dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi
337a6(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / brag ca dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa
337a7(mdo sde): thob pa yin no// sgra can zin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra can gang gi tshe byang
337a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal ba'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na/ de
337b1(mdo sde): tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no// kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
337b2(mdo sde): btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa nyan par byed cing thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtog par byed la/ ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin par byed cing / 
337b3(mdo sde): ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// 
337b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan padag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ 'di skad bstan pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag cag la ni chos de dag las
337b5(mdo sde): 'ga' tsam yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na khyed cag nyan thos chen po mchog tu gyu/ rab ma yin par mi 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
337b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gnag rjes las brten na rdzing bu mchog yin pa de bzhin nyid du/ nyan thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang mchog yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho
337b7(mdo sde): chen po las brtan na 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no// lhag pa'i nga rgyal
337b8(mdo sde): med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te/ legs so// legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ nyan
338a1(mdo sde): thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsam
338a2(mdo sde): te de skad smra// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang sangs rgyas las brten na nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin la
338a3(mdo sde): nga rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
338a4(mdo sde): ni bdag la bstod par byed cing // gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na nga / byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub
338a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni bdag la bstod par byed cing / gzhan la/ smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ja/ ma dpal dza las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis
338a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin brjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar sems
338a7(mdo sde): can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur snyam nas/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos rjod par byed cing 'di la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ theg pa dman pa la
338a8(mdo sde): rnam par sdang bar byed ba yin pas/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la bstod par byed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la smon par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
338b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu 'ching bu'i bsngags pa ma yin brjod cing / nor bu rin
338b2(mdo sde): bo che bai DUr+ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ de yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin
338b3(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags brjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper
338b4(mdo sde): na/ skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing / khams kyi rgyal po la de lta ma yin na de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam
338b5(mdo sde): 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no// 2rngam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la bstod par byed cing // nyan thos
338b6(mdo sde): kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yang smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal leg so// legs so// khyod kyi
338b7(mdo sde): tshig de ni legs par smras te/ 'jam dpal theg pa chen po bsngags pa brjod pas ni theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad
338b8(mdo sde): ni de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang las
339a1(mdo sde): brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
339a2(mdo sde): pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu
339a3(mdo sde): sems skyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed
339a4(mdo sde): nas go cha gyon par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig la rten/ 'jam dpal gyi sa smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
339a5(mdo sde): thams cad la rten to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las brte/ na nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
339a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos thams cad jil rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad na rtsa ba med pa'i gnas la rten pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas
339a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang / mngon par skabs yod pa dang / nam mkha' la rten pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis
339a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na/ lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
339b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang de snyed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'on ci 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin nam 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de
339b2(mdo sde): bzhin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no// zhes
339b3(mdo sde): ston pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas sems
339b4(mdo sde): can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi rnam grangs kyis ni ma yi na no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro// lha'i
339b5(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar rtogs par thugs su/ chud/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can/ med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas so// lha'i bus
339b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te chung zad rjes su rtogs par byed na ni de stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
339b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no/ 
339b8(mdo sde): zhes ma gsungs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes
340a1(mdo sde): gsungs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ji zhig la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa
340a2(mdo sde): ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ lus dang / sems la gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
340a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de yang stong pas na/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong
340a4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'jam dpal gyi sa smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyi su med pa yin pas na/ 
340a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ra mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
340a6(mdo sde): smras pa// lha'i bu gnyi su med pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su med pa nyid yin gyi/ de la gnas pa gzhan med de/ de'i gnas pa gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa nyid kyang gnyis su med pa nyid yin no// 
340a7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis shes bya ba ni gang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de ni
340a8(mdo sde): gnyis so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// zhe sdang gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// gti mug dang / gti mug
340b1(mdo sde): med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis su med
340b2(mdo sde): pa'o// bdag dang bdag med par byed pa ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// lha'i bu smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
340b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni mi bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid
340b4(mdo sde): dang / bzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa nga / 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya/ 'jam dang / la gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir rang
340b5(mdo sde): bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni bzod ma nas gsal zhing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas
340b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni spros pa dang bral ba dang / de ni rgyu dang bral ba dang / de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pas de'i
340b7(mdo sde): phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes bdag
340b8(mdo sde): go/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag go/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
341a1(mdo sde): dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang
341a2(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang mi ldan zhes pa
341a3(mdo sde): ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / gzhan gyi dad pas yang dang yang du mi 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa sbyong bar mi byed
341a4(mdo sde): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan ci/ dag mi gnas pa de la ji skad ces bya/ 'jam dpalo gyis smras pa/ 
341a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni/ des na 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa yin la/ byang
341a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma byas pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems
341a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob na sems can rnams skyeb par mi byed cing / nyan thos su 'gyur bas/ 
341a8(mdo sde): de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa yin la/ 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyis yin na/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
341b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing so so'i skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas la yang mi gnas
341b2(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas la yang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas la mi
341b3(mdo sde): gnas pa yin pas 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pa yin to// de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas shos rtogs
341b4(mdo sde): bas ni 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chen po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par gyur la/ de nas mda' de na mkha' la mi gnas
341b5(mdo sde): par 'dug cings la yang mi ltung na/ lha'i bu de la dka' ba chung zad yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dka'o// / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub
341b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung zhing / 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongasu smin par
341b7(mdo sde): byed pa ni ches dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas sam gang las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jam dpal
341b8(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni
342a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon/ 
342a2(mdo sde): mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par
342a3(mdo sde): mi byed na/ de ni nyan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
342a4(mdo sde): gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / dathabs kyi shes pas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// 
342a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing / sa sa rgyas kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de ldan/ 
342a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir 'das byas la sbyor ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye
342a7(mdo sde): shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byasu mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas la
342a8(mdo sde): gnas te/ bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan
342b1(mdo sde): yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par
342b2(mdo sde): byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing // 
342b3(mdo sde): thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed par lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la
342b4(mdo sde): gnas te/ chos ston par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ zung zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed par de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ 
342b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te/ mya ngan las 'ad/ sa pa yongs su sbyong ba'i las byed cing / mya ngan las/ 'das pa la gnas te/ 'khor ba yongs su sbyang ba'i las byed
342b6(mdo sde): pade tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing / 'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / 
342b7(mdo sde): chos lta bas snang bar byed cing / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rjes su 'brel cing zhi ba dang / nye bar gyur pa dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar
342b8(mdo sde): bas tshig par mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spyod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing / nyan thos kyi rnam
343a1(mdo sde): par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi lcags kyu shes par byed cing chos kyi
343a2(mdo sde): lcags kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang / shes pas 'jug par byed cing / thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing / 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la sme bar byed pa dang / 
343a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dga' bar byed cing / chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa
343a4(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang
343a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khrini mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khrin spobs pa thogs pa med pa skyes so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye
343a6(mdo sde): dgu las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod padag byas so// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal soms
343a7(mdo sde): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dngapa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la rab tu gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems/ 
343a8(mdo sde): dpa' 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ zhe sdang spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang // 
343b1(mdo sde): gti mug spang ba'i byor yang chos ston par byed la // gti mug spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed la/ nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa de tsam gyis/ 
343b2(mdo sde): na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la smon pa med par ston par yang byed la/ stong pa nyid mngon du mi byed pa
343b3(mdo sde): dang / sems can rnams la mtshan ma med par ston par yang byed la/ mtshan ma med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la/ smon pa med pa mngon du
343b4(mdo sde): yang mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'du bye/ dab med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa
343b5(mdo sde): dang 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la/ 'gog pa mngon du ma/ nga mi byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam lag na/ sa pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems/ 
343b6(mdo sde): dpa' yongasu mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu
343b7(mdo sde): phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / brjed ngas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / bems po dang / lug ltar lkug pas shes rab
343b8(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
344a1(mdo sde): bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yong su ma gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / chos yongasu mi gtong ba dang / byang
344a2(mdo sde): chub kyi sems yongasu mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongasu mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul
344a3(mdo sde): khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par 'da' bas shes
344a4(mdo sde): rab dang shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas rnam par grob she/ sa bsgrub par byed de/ lha'i bu khyed kyis rnam grangs des/ dgang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bde/ tshul khrims kyi
344a5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// lha 'bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
344a6(mdo sde): kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// 
344a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis rtul bar mi byed cing / ngag dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
344a8(mdo sde): ba bsgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na yang sa gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la gang nyan thos dang / rang / 
344b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rjes ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas/ de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ rtswa dang / 
344b2(mdo sde): shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor dang / lug ltar lkug pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang / ye shes kyis
344b3(mdo sde): de ltar chos thams cad bem po dang lug ltar lkug pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam
344b4(mdo sde): sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gyi
344b5(mdo sde): las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing / lam gyi bya ba yang sgrub pa/ byed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnam sa kyang la ma la 'god par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems
344b6(mdo sde): dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang / chos thams cad btsal na mi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang / 
344b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ nyan
344b8(mdo sde): thos kyi lam gyi nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
345a1(mdo sde): lam yang thob par byed la/ lam nges kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin/ 
345a2(mdo sde): nos lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen
345a3(mdo sde): gyis mi gos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi
345a4(mdo sde): mthong ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin/ no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lam/ dran pa las lam yongasu tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongasu btsal
345a5(mdo sde): nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ja/ ma dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las la
345a6(mdo sde): yongasu tshol bar byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongasu tshol bar byed
345a7(mdo sde): kying bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
345a8(mdo sde): bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang / nyon mongs pa med pa nyid
345b1(mdo sde): du mi ltung ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston par byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par shes shing / skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la
345b2(mdo sde): yongs su spyod par byed kyang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston
345b3(mdo sde): kyang / yongs su shes pa de dag yongs su shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag/ mngon par sgrub par byed cing sems can/ 
345b4(mdo sde): rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang / nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yu dal nye bar ston par byed kyang bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrogs
345b5(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rje su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar
345b6(mdo sde): len par byed pas na/ de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la
345b7(mdo sde): spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bsam pa yongasu dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben ba nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la/ 
345b8(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi rjed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang / smras
346a1(mdo sde): pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan
346a2(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang / sems can la bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin pa rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa
346a3(mdo sde): dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 
346a4(mdo sde): yongasu rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir/ sdug bsngal la so sor to/ gra ba la spyod pa dang / phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ba dag med pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongasu shes
346a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta bu/ ra yongasu shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yong su shes pa la spro/ da pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la
346a6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gogs pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongasu shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa
346a7(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / sgra brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa
346a8(mdo sde): soso yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / tshogs 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes rton pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin
346a9(mdo sde): mdu ma'i phyir chags pa la byed pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir chos so sa yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / 
346b1(mdo sde): bston pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la ston pa la spyod pa dang / gang zag yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims
346b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / 
346b3(mdo sde): sems la dbang sgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang / mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang / bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa la
346b4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod pa dang / thams cad du rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs
346b5(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phyir sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa na yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang / rnam bar rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang / bdag
346b6(mdo sde): mi srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus
346b7(mdo sde): byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar gcad pa la spyod pa dang / 
346b8(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pas spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod pa
347a1(mdo sde): yin no// bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang / 
347a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / 
347a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin pa
347a4(mdo sde): dang / gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa/ dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
347a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ston pa ma yin pa de ni byang chub sem sa dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 
347a6(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma
347a7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te/ de skad smra/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang
347a8(mdo sde): ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas
347b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / ston pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang // 
347b2(mdo sde): gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can dang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos
347b3(mdo sde): thams cad la dad par byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa skyed cing // 'dzin
347b4(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams thar pa ru byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongasu tshol bar ra byed pa dang / 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan
347b5(mdo sde): las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'adad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i/ bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
347b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gong gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi
347b7(mdo sde): zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang / chos kyi gnas shing nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig
347b8(mdo sde): rten rgyang ban pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ chos
348a1(mdo sde): ma yin pa mi smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad
348a2(mdo sde): shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
348a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi cha byang chub sems
348a4(mdo sde): dpa' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang / la ma ya na lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang / sbyar ba yongasu
348a5(mdo sde): ma rdzogs par lam des nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phu na sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i/ 
348a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa
348a7(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa' ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogasu
348a8(mdo sde): ded pa rnams rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba mi gcod pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyang gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang / mya ngan
348b1(mdo sde): las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / lha dang mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa ston par byed pa dang / rlom semasu mi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / 
348b2(mdo sde): nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'dra/ 
348b3(mdo sde): pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sbyin gan su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang / phyir ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par
348b4(mdo sde): gzhol ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
348b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes nas/ sa mas can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin 'ong ba dang / 
348b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams yong su smin par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med par mthong ba dang / 'ong ba yang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi lnga
348b7(mdo sde): yongasu dag pas 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid mi spong ba dang / bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi la mnye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir
348b8(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang / byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pasra zhing mi phyed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin na// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i phyir
349a1(mdo sde): mi 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnamasu yang mi 'ong ba
349a2(mdo sde): dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs
349a3(mdo sde): par mi 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa/ rga shi med pa thob pa dang / mthar gnas pa dang / byas pa nges pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / rnam pa
349a4(mdo sde): med pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom
349a5(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub semasas dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir so/ mas can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba med cing zhe sdang gdul
349a6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems
349a7(mdo sde): ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / pad+ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams
349a8(mdo sde): cad kyis ma gos pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang // sangs
349b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa gnas par byed
349b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshur rol dang / pha rol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang / tshu rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyi sems can
349b3(mdo sde): gzhan thar bar byed pa de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dang 'dagra bcom pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
349b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can/ mas cad la mthos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul rnam sa la spyod par mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 
349b5(mdo sde): skyo ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang / bdag med pa dang / sems rje/ na med pa dang / rang bzhin gyi g.yo ba med pa sgregs par byed pa dang / 
349b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang / na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyus nye bar 'gro brtsoms shig ces
349b7(mdo sde): sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang / sgrogs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'chad pa yong su shes pa dang / so so yang
349b8(mdo sde): dag par rig pa mi zad pa/ thob pa dang / don dang tshig dang yig 'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / shes pa ston par byed pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston par byed pa
350a1(mdo sde): dang / zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam la spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 2
350a2(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang 'chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog
350a3(mdo sde): med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta
350a4(mdo sde): ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyo dgas kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang / mngon par shes pa'i
350a5(mdo sde): phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen sgrub par byed/ tsang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas byang chub mngon par rdzog/ sa par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skye bar
350a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas
350a7(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad bzod ma nas dben pa nyid
350a8(mdo sde): du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / mchog dang bar ma
350b1(mdo sde): thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang ginyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par
350b2(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems can dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus/ 
350b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems mas dnga'ade bzhin gshegs pa lam du 'gro ba
350b4(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gan sa pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi
350b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thabs/ dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs
350b6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / sems can yongasu thar par byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dang / 'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang
350b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na yang yin la/ de na yang ma yin pa dang / 'di na yang yin la 'di na yang ma yin pa dang / gnyi ga las dge ba dang / mun pa dang bral ba
350b8(mdo sde): dang rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub
351a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
351a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang / chu bo las rgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid
351a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang / khur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bas 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags bskul ba dang / lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang / 
351a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can labs na ba ma btang ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang / chu lon
351a5(mdo sde): dang zam pa legs par byas pa dang / mi gnas pas legs par ma/ thong ba dang / rtag tu bsgom pa las yid kyis brtson pa dang / sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang / srid pa thams cad
