351a6(mdo sde): las rnam par log pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad la thal bar rlog par byed pa dang / srid pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams kyi mchod pa
351a7(mdo sde): de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam
351a8(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 
351b1(mdo sde): lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / bsgribs pa rnams dang / chod pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa/ byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon
351b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dang mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa
351b3(mdo sde): nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub
351b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang ma nyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ra byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa dang / 
351b5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pad kyi marnam pa nyid dulta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i yongasu rtog pas kun nas blang ba
351b6(mdo sde): na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
351b7(mdo sde): dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yos pa'i chos can du
351b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / sems can/ 
352a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / the tsom
352a2(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / khams gsum pas phyag
352a3(mdo sde): byas pa dang / sems na mkha' dang mnyam zhing / khengs pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dgong ba dang / bshung ba dang / khro ba dang / spyod pa
352a4(mdo sde): dang / bsdigs pa thams cad dang / rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin leg/ sa par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying rtse ba dang / 
352a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chu ba sems dpa' ston pa yin/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can
352a6(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang 'thabs kyis so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ 
352a7(mdo sde): shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
352a8(mdo sde): dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la
352b1(mdo sde): kun tu chags par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon pa gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos
352b2(mdo sde): po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjesu chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'bras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no// lha'i
352b3(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags par
352b4(mdo sde): lta bar byed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la skyon du yang 'du shes la/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / 'du byed/ 
352b5(mdo sde): rnams spong bar byed pa dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag
352b6(mdo sde): par skyed par byed pa dang / sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par byed cing
352b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang / 'chi 'pho'i thabs thams cad dang 'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus
352b8(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang chung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas/ de la gang gi tshe byang
353a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos kyi ba nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa de shes par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ kun tu shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 
353a2(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlom sem su mi byed/ skyo bar mi byed cing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs par de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can
353a3(mdo sde): yono// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo ba de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi/ 
353a4(mdo sde): / chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams dpa' 'dres pa dang / sem sa can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phral ning spyod rgya chen po la 'god par byed
353a5(mdo sde): ba dang / don 'thun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad la mi ba sngags brjod par byed cing 'dun pa zlog pa dang phyir ldog par byed pa/ dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba
353a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas par yang mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
353a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi che byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yong su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang / 
353a8(mdo sde): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum
353b1(mdo sde): gyis 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang spyod par byed la/ gtan du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang
353b2(mdo sde): mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / rjesu stong
353b3(mdo sde): brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags drug khri ni
353b4(mdo sde): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bya/ sa pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ 
353b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur to// srog chag sa sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
353b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems
353b7(mdo sde): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'athabs dang shes rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu rab
353b8(mdo sde): rtsal sems la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags med pa// bla med byang chub sems yin te// sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni/ 
354a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni yongs sngo zhing // byang chub sems las rabartas pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams cad bdag med cing // mi bden yam rA gsog tu// gang tshe shes
354a2(mdo sde): pas shes byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing // bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pas// de na thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag
354a3(mdo sde): gtan du mthong bar mi byed cing // 'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// nang dang yang ni phyi rol dag/ thams cad yongasu gtong byed cing // sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba// de ni thabs kyi
354a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do// zhi zhing rab ni gtsang dag cing // tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la// lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing // gzhan yang tshul
354a5(mdo sde): khrims sbyor byed la// sangs rgyas tshul khrims sde byed la// de phyir thab sa shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad rab stong zhing / bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la// lus dang sems kyis ma smras
354a6(mdo sde): pa/ de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing // ngag dang sems kyis ma yin la// chos rnams kun la dben gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can kun gyi khro ba dang // bsod dang 'ching
354a7(mdo sde): ba bzod byed cing // sems can de dag mi spong ba// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sems can yongasu smin bya'i phyir// bsam gtan bde bar ba spangs nas// grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// 
354a8(mdo sde): tshul rolo ma yin pha rol min// 'thun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing // spros pa'i lta ba rgyun bcad pa// shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas// de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing // 
354b1(mdo sde): sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas gzung med mkha' 'dra bar// chos kyi sgonas lce byed cing // de tshe gzugs la zhen med pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas mtshan
354b2(mdo sde): nyid mchod 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren kun mchod du 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing // mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la// chos
354b3(mdo sde): 'ga' 'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos ni yongasu gzung ba'i phyir// lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing // 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pa// de ni thabs kyi sgra yin no// ches dbyings
354b4(mdo sde): gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing // de bzhin nyid las mi g.yobs// de ni shes rab sgo yin no// gang gis chos nyid ci 'dri ba// sems can de 'drar shes byed cing // de
354b5(mdo sde): ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni shes la pha rol phyin// chos kun 'chi 'pho yod min zhing // skye ba med par shes byed la// mi 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems
354b6(mdo sde): can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod dang gzugs rnams su// bsams bzhin du ni skye byed pa// de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab gnas byed cing // nyon mongs med la rab gnas
354b7(mdo sde): la/ bsam gtan rnam thar ston byed pa// de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yin// grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni// song na snyan gtam ston byed cing // mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas
354b8(mdo sde): payin// 'jig rten gsum pa thams cad las// skrag cing 'du 'dzi rten med la// bdag nyid du la zhing zhi gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// 'gro ba dag na 'dus chen dang // tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed pa// kun
355a1(mdo sde): na snang ba de dag ni// thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin// brten pa chags med spyod byed cing // yi ge don gnyer mi byed la// brjod med nges don don gnyer ba// de ni shes rab
355a2(mdo sde): pha rol phyin// mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na// snang zhing chos rnams ston byed pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi sngags brjod pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mngon shes shes pa mkhas gyur cing // zhi zhing dul la
355a3(mdo sde): zag med// bdeg med bzhag pa yod min pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing // zhing rnams bye bar 'gro byed la// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung
355a4(mdo sde): bsgyum 'drang shes shing // nyon mongs dngos med shes byas nas/ de dgang dung bzhini gyur pa// des ni shes rab pha rol phyin//  da rnams thams cad ston byed cing // bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur pa/ 
355a5(mdo sde): de las sems can thar byed pa// de ni thabs kyi sgra yon no//  na nga mtshan ma med pa dang // smon par byed pa yod min pa// rnam ra sgrol sten byed pa// de ni shes mtshan nyid yin// chags med sdang ba
355a6(mdo sde): yod min zhing // rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang // blang med dong ba yod min pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan yin// stong nyid rab tu sten gyur la// kun gyi pha rol son gyur pa// 
355a7(mdo sde): mnyam med 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin// zag med btul ba ma yin pa// de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i sprid yul de dag ni// sems can kun gyi grog su 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs kyis/ 
355a8(mdo sde): mngom ma pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yin// yan lag gnyis ldan la mngon// shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' ste// deng ni 'dran rnams nges par 'byung // thabs/ 
355b1(mdo sde): dang mi ldan shes rab kyi// ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba med// shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni// mkhas pa rab tu ni mi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa// de nyid kun tu 'dres gyur cing // gnyi gzung du 'jug
355b2(mdo sde): 'gyur na// de ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// gang dag bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rab bsngags shing // ye shes pha rol phyin gyur te// de ni chos rnams chos nyid do// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul
355b3(mdo sde): gyi// chos dbyings dbyer med dga' byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'i// rdul med byang chub rtogs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di
355b4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi yul ni ra nga gi yul dben pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
355b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bus smra sa pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtha' gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
355b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi gnas gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas ni chos thams cad kyi gnas
355b7(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sgo gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sgo ni kun nas sgo yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi rtsom pa gang yin/ 
355b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi rtsom pa ni sems can thams cad bdag med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ji dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni
356a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mnyam mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi 'grod pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi bgrod pa na
356a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yin no// byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni 'gro ba med par 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba med par 'gro ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub gang gi rgyu

356a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad/ kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ga las
356a6(mdo sde): btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa
356a7(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig gnas sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te 'phags pa'i lam gnyis su gyur pa zhig yin na ni/ 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par yang 'gyur/ 
356a8(mdo sde): bzhig na/ lha'i bu 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyis su gyur pa med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ lam gyis lam gyi byang
356b1(mdo sde): byas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi'i tshe btsal na nyon mongs pa rnams mi rnyed cing 'khor ba yang ma rnyed/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi rnyed pa de lta na/ lham gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa
356b2(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni lta ba'i rnam pa drug nucu gnyis dang / phyin ci log pan
356b3(mdo sde): dang / sgrub pa lnga dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la
356b4(mdo sde): sbyor ba yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams ma gtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sem
356b5(mdo sde): dpa' ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / byon ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa de dag nyid tshol bar byed de/ de tshol bar byed pa na/ sems can yang mi rnyed/ nyon mongs
356b6(mdo sde): ba rnams kyang mi rnyed do// ma rnyed na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar mi 'gyur te/ lha'i bu rnam grangs nges na nyon mongs pa tshochol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' lam yin la/ sems can tshol ba yang byang
356b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lam yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa' lam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag byang
356b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar mi nus la/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang btsal bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de la ni sa
357a1(mdo sde): dpa 'ad dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ gang la sems dang // yad dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa mi 'gyur bden bcal bar ma nus pa 'gyur ro// lha dus/ 
357a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal lam ji ltar mngon par rtog par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i lta ba yang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par
357a3(mdo sde): rtog pa yin no// yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang dang mnyam/ log pa'i rtog pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ngag kyang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa log
357a4(mdo sde): pa'i las kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang dang mnyam pa leg pa'i 'tshe ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang dang mnyam pa/ log pa'i rtsol ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang / 
357a5(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i dren pa gang dang mnyam pa/ log pa'i dran pa yang de dang mnya ma ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa/ log ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yi
357a6(mdo sde): bde ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid
357a7(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mkha' dang na mkha' la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
357a8(mdo sde): dadangal tha dad du bya ba chung zad kyang med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la yang tha dad du bya ba chung zad kyang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba gang
357b1(mdo sde): las rab tu phye ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu tha dad du bya ba ni mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa las rab tu phye ba yin te/ mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / 
357b2(mdo sde): spros pa gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni tha dad du bya ba med do// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba yod kyi rgya mtsho chen por zhugs
357b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul ni tha dad du bya ba med pa de bzhin du lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings yongs su ma shes pa la ni chos la tha dad du bya ba yod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa la ni chos la tha dad du bya ba med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 2
357b4(mdo sde): dpal ci chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su
357b5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'du ba yin la/ chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings yod/ su mi shes pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du/ ba'i chos de dag la gnyis su med par shes pa gang yin pa de ni yong su
357b6(mdo sde): shes pa zhes bya ste/ sems cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir/ de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu
357b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i snang ba la/ gzugs thams cad snang yang / gzugs de dag ni na mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang gis smras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi
357b8(mdo sde): sgo nas/ chos thams cad mthong yang / chos de dag gi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mgo smos pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
358a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu mgo smos pas go ba'i rang gi lta bas/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ chos ston par byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
358a2(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spros pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang gzhan du mi byed la/ bdag med pa yang gzhan du mi byed
358a3(mdo sde): na'o 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bkri ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa / lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'ga' yang khrid par mi byed na'o// lha'i bus
358a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas lhur len pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa'i gnas
358a5(mdo sde): las g.yo bar mi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang / la gang gis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs gsum po dang sa pa nyid dang ma nges pa nyid dang / log pa nyid du nges pa'i
358a6(mdo sde): tshogs dag la snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
358a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o// ma nges pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o// log pa nyid du nges pa ni de las sems can bsgral bar bya ba
358a8(mdo sde): la'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa thob cing / khom pa ma thob pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yod do// 
358b1(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa thob pa rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khom pa thob pa de dag
358b2(mdo sde): kyang yal bar 'jog par byedapa/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par grol ba'i tshogs de dag ni mi khom pa thob pa yin pas/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ngo // lha'i bus
358b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod mi khom pa thob pa yin nam/ 'on te khom pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni khom pa thob pa yang ma yin/ mi khom pa thob pa yang ma
358b4(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni thob pa yang ma yin/ yang dag par thob pa yang ma yin// khom pa yang ma
358b5(mdo sde): yin/ mi khom pa yang ma yin la/ khom pa dang / mi khom pa la cha gas pa yang mi byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni/ bdud kyi dkyil
358b6(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad tshar bcad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni phung po yongs su shes pa yang med/ nyon mongs pa sel ba yang med/ bdud las
358b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa yang med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nye bar sbyar bas gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar
358b8(mdo sde): 'di la mu stegs thams cad kyi spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi tog gtsugs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu snang ba med pa dang / mun pa med
359a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams
359a2(mdo sde): cad yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig byas/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag la snang ba yang
359a3(mdo sde): med la/ mun pa yang med pa de dag chos kyis snang bar byas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni
359a4(mdo sde): dkon no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la su dug mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur/ 
359a5(mdo sde): ba rnams so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'ching / khas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag 'dod chags
359a6(mdo sde): dang ra zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas thar pa tshol bar mi byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa mnyam pa
359a7(mdo sde): nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam par gyur pa dag ste/ de dag gis ni 'ching ba ma dmigs pas rnam par 'khrug par yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan
359a8(mdo sde): pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bdag cag gis kyang ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de bzhin
359b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag brnyes pa de bzhin du thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags
359b2(mdo sde): 'bum lhag tsam ni chos thams cad la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
359b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
359b4(mdo sde): bsnyen ma nyi khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i ra rdzab bskyed pa bdun khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la
359b5(mdo sde): bzod pa tho bar gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rna mas kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ 
359b6(mdo sde): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho kun nas yongs grol ba'i// dmigs med chos ni len par bshad// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis// shin tu legs par bshad pa byas
359b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
359b8(mdo sde): de dag gis lha dang mi'i mchod pa dag byas te/ steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang phab/ rin po che'i char dag kyang phab/ gos kyi char dag kyang phab/ bdun spos kyi char dag
360a1(mdo sde): dang / spos chu'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag kyang phab bo// lha'i bu rnams kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu bsil
360a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
360a3(mdo sde): mchod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas
360a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyid ba de dag la ni rab tu 'byung ba ma ma das lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te/ 
360a5(mdo sde): gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchi sa lags so// de dag la ni 'phags pa'i bsnyen par rdzog/ sangs bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang ma mchis lagaso// gang / 
360a6(mdo sde): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni dge slong gi tshul ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag
360a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de dag ni thob par yang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang // 
360a8(mdo sde): len par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa dang / snod 'tshal bar bgyid pa nas/ gzhan
360b1(mdo sde): dag la yang ston par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang / rjes su ston par bgyid pa dang / 'di la nan tan du sgrub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag kyang nan tan
360b2(mdo sde): gyis sgrub du stsol pa dang / nyams par mi bgyid pa de dag ni sems can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / 
360b3(mdo sde): gting rnyed pa dang / log par ltung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la
360b4(mdo sde): shin tu gus pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis dpa gzo zhing bgyis pa tshor ba lags shing // de dag ni 'ang/ sa pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
360b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang mchis lags so// de dag la ni chos kyi
360b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo skor ba yang mchis lags so// de dag ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes kyang gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
360b7(mdo sde): dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nya
360b8(mdo sde): stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
361a1(mdo sde): par grol lo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
361a2(mdo sde): dang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di ni gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas
361a3(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pazhi stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs so sor thob par gyur
361a4(mdo sde): to/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis ni gzungs dri ma me dra ba so sor thob par gyur to// de dag las byang chub se/ mas dpa' mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' byams pa khyod
361a5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par/ 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog par yang 'gyur te/ 
361a6(mdo sde): dag ni byams pa khyod kyis byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ 
361a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa bgyi ba'i slad du/ glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang ba
361a8(mdo sde): dang / tha na lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang / rna lam du grags par bgyid pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
361b1(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa'abyams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gsheg pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so byams pa de'i phyir legs
361b2(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// byams pa nan gyis dper na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las lha 'am/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
361b3(mdo sde): 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang bcas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byas thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa de bas
361b4(mdo sde): ni/ gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi geradabris te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhi na nyid du bsgrub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la ston par
361b5(mdo sde): byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring po mo thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar
361b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas spong bar mi byed cing / mos par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir
361b7(mdo sde): mi ldog pa nyid du lung ston to// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di na mong tsam thos pa de dag kyang 'bras bu yod par lung ston par byed na/ gang dag mos pa dang // yi ger
361b8(mdo sde): 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / klog pa
362a1(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dri bar byed pa dang / phebs par smra
362a2(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
362a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la ston par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro// de nas
362a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsa la pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyi/ kun dga'
362a5(mdo sde): bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ gzhan da/ ga la yang rgya cher ston cig/ kun dga' bos gso/ la pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
362a6(mdo sde): ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ 'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ lha'i bu
362a7(mdo sde): rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa chos thams cad rnam par gtan la dbab bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas 'khor de dag gi chos kyi
362a8(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa mang du
362b1(mdo sde): thos lags na/ dza ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye ste/ rgya cher bstan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung lags so// bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam
362b2(mdo sde): grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa ni sngon ma myong lags te/ de lta lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo
362b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid pa 'gyur ba dang / sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du
362b4(mdo sde): theg pa tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag bde 'grer mchi bar bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das kyi das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis rlab du gsol
362b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag gis gsuM lab btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur
362b6(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mo la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'o sa gzhi chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
362b7(mdo sde): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rang sa dang / spro ba dang / 
362b8(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
